column34: Fearless Canada
column35:
PLAIN LIES TOLD BY THE QUEBEC GOVERNMENT AND CORPORATE MEDIA

By: Maximilian C. Forte

The new norm is to report that those getting infected with Covid (or a variant), are ""not fully vaccinated."" Thus, this headline: ""Quebec reports close to 1,000 new COVID-19 cases, 772 not fully vaccinated."" (1) Of those newly testing positive (which itself means very little), 78% received a first dose of the vaccine.

According to the new norm, those who have received just one dose, are now not ""adequately vaccinated"" (when boosters become mandatory, two dose people will be deemed inadequately vaccinated). The impression one would get‚Äîif you have zero memory, or only now started reading news reports for the first time in your life‚Äîis that just one dose is tantamount to no protection at all.

Was that always the case? Of course not.

On January 5 of this year, the media reproduced with approval these statements from a loyal doctor: 

‚ÄúResearch has shown that the Pfizer vaccine achieves 90% effectiveness two weeks after the first dose has been administered. The second dose is a ‚Äòbooster‚Äô shot that enhances the already high level of protection.‚Äù (2)

Note how much just one dose mattered back then‚Äîand it matters almost not at all now.

On January 11, Premier Francois Legault insisted, ""the first dose does grant a fair level of immunity."" (3)

Earlier this year then, a single dose was still deemed effective, enough that the second dose could be delayed by a dozen weeks which was, after all, just a ""booster"" shot.

Indeed, the policy was to delay second doses, in order to ""protect"" the maximum number of people, because that is what we were told a first dose would do: protect. The delay in receiving a second dose simply did not matter: ""Please rest assured that this change will not affect your health or well-being."" (4)

The government of Quebec took to calling second doses, ""booster shots"". It insisted that it would be fine to delay receiving the second dose, by 90 days. (5)

Thus, either the Quebec government and its alleged advice from so-called ""Public Health"" was again wrong, and imposed measures not grounded in scientific fact‚Äîor it was the case that the so-called ""vaccines"" began failing from early on. If the former is true, then the government is either ignorant or incompetent. If the latter is true, then simply stating that X% of hospitalized people now are not ""fully vaccinated,"" is a way of masking the fact that was asserted earlier, that the effectiveness of the vaccines was and continues to be false.

--
1. https://montreal.ctvnews.ca/quebec-reports-close-to-1-000-new-covid-19-cases-772-not-fully-vaccinated-1.5581600
2. https://montreal.ctvnews.ca/pfizer-pushes-back-after-quebec-delays-second-vaccine-doses-says-data-doesn-t-exist-1.5254882
3. https://montreal.ctvnews.ca/pfizer-could-withdraw-vaccine-supply-from-quebec-if-two-dose-schedule-not-followed-legault-1.5262256
4. https://montreal.ctvnews.ca/quebec-following-new-vaccine-policy-to-the-letter-as-montreal-care-home-misses-second-shots-1.5253074
5. https://montreal.ctvnews.ca/quebec-to-allow-90-day-delay-before-second-vaccine-doses-more-than-double-what-national-panel-advises-1.5267173

column30: Vaccine effectiveness against SARS-CoV-2 infection with the Omicron. (We need a MD to tell us what the risks of boosters are in Omicron.) Vaccine effectiveness against the Omicron variant of 55.2% Vaccine effectiveness is significantly lower than that against Delta infection and declines rapidly over just a few months. Omicron, was classified as a variant of concern by the WHO and is currently spreading rapidly across the globe including in Denmark.1,2 Here, we estimate COVID-19 vaccine protection against infection with Omicron or Delta up to five months after primary vaccination using Danish nationwide data. By December 12, 2021, there were 5,767 identified Omicron cases in Denmark with a median age of 28 years (93% <60 years). Among those who had most recently completed primary vaccination, VE against Omicron was 55.2% (95% confidence interval: 23.5 to 73.7%) and 36.7% (-69.9 to 76.4%) for the BNT162b2 and mRNA-1273 vaccines, respectively, but with evidence of rapid waning over the course of five months. By comparison, VE against Delta was significantly higher and better preserved over the same period (see Figure and Table). VE among those who had received a booster dose 14 to 44 days earlier was 54.6% (30.4 to 70.4%) using those with only primary vaccination as comparison (analysis restricted to 60+ yearolds). www.medrxiv.org/content/10.1101/2021.12.20.21267966v3.full.pdf

column30: From the Netherlands
column34: Vrouwen voor Vrijheid
column35:
De overheid roept actief op om vanaf deze maand onze kinderen te laten vaccineren met het Covid-19 vaccin. Het wordt gepresenteerd als veilig en zonder ernstige bijwerkingen.

Er zijn echter veel tegengeluiden van wetenschappers en artsen die waarschuwen voor het vaccineren van gezonde kinderen. Dit tegengeluid krijgt echter nauwelijks aandacht.

Als Vrouwen voor Vrijheid staan wij voor informed consent. Ofwel toestemming geven gebaseerd op goede informatie bij medische interventies, medicatie en vaccins. 

Kun jij als ouder in deze tijd een werkelijk goede keuze maken als het gaat om het wel/niet vaccineren van je kind? Voel je daar de vrijheid toe of voel je je onder druk gezet? Heb je het idee dat je volledig ge√Ønformeerd bent? 

De volgende vragen kun je jezelf en anderen, zoals je arts of een ggd-medewerker, stellen om een goed ge√Ønformeerde keuze te maken:

- Wat is het doel van het vaccineren van mijn kind? 
- Welke voordelen heeft het vaccineren met het Covid-19 vaccin? 
- Wat zijn de risico‚Äôs van dit vaccin? Wat zijn de bijwerkingen? Op korte en lange termijn? 
- Wat zijn bijwerkingen die bekend zijn uit andere landen die al langer vaccineren bij kinderen?
- Wat zijn alternatieven (bijv. een ander vaccin, medicatie, preventie, supplementen) om een vergelijkbaar doel/voordeel te bereiken? 
- Is dit vaccin eenmalig of moeten kinderen straks ook boosters krijgen?
-Welke gevolgen of risico‚Äôs zijn er voor mijn kind als ik nu niets doe en kies voor niet vaccineren?

Wanneer je paracetamol of een ander zelfzorg middel gaat kopen bij een bekende drogist dan wordt er altijd gevraagd of je bekend bent met het middel en de bijsluiter en of je weet hoe je het kunt gebruiken. 

Maar deze vraag wordt je niet gesteld bij het vaccineren van je kind. Laat staan dat je vooraf gevraagd wordt of je bekend bent met de bijsluiter. Is er eigenlijk een bijsluiter beschikbaar van dit vaccin? En specifiek voor kinderen? Hoe uitgebreid is het onderzocht op kinderen? 

Je hebt recht op al deze informatie. Want het gaat hier om meer dan paracetamol. Het gaat over de gezondheid van jouw kind op korte en lange termijn. Geen enkel medicijn of vaccin is zonder bijwerkingen of gevolgen. Als de voordelen zwaarder wegen dan de risico‚Äôs, dan is de keuze simpel. Maar in dit geval valt dit te betwijfelen. 

Voor medicijnen mag in Nederland geen reclame gemaakt worden. Toch lijkt er een grote reclame campagne toegestaan nu het gaat om het Covid-19 vaccin.
Het wordt zelfs door bekende nederlanders met geen enkele medische achtergrond van harte aanbevolen. 

Op welke informatie is dit advies gebaseerd? En wiens verantwoordelijkheid is het  wanneer het bij jouw kind niet zo gunstig uitpakt en jullie kampen met bijwerkingen ? 
Er zijn heel wat kinderen die nu nog kampen met schade van het Mexicaanse griepvaccin. Vorig jaar is dat officieel erkend en is er schadevergoeding uitgekeerd. 

Niemand anders kan dit besluit voor jou nemen. En niemand zou je de keuze mogen opdringen of de vrijheid van jouw kind mogen ontnemen wanneer je dit vaccin niet neemt. Wat het beste is voor jouw kind en jouw gezin kun je als ouder enkel beslissen op basis van volledige informatie en jouw eigen intu√Øtie.

Liefs, Vrouwen voor Vrijheid

~ ~ 

The government is actively calling for our children to be vaccinated with the Covid-19 vaccine from this month. It is presented as safe and without serious side effects.

However, there are many dissenting voices from scientists and doctors who warn against vaccinating healthy children. This contradiction, however, receives little attention.

We stand for informed consent. Meaning: giving permission based on good information for medical interventions, medication and vaccines.

Can you as a parent make a really good choice in this time when it comes to whether or not to vaccinate your child? Do you feel the freedom to do so or do you feel pressured? Do you feel that you are fully informed?

You can ask yourself and others, such as your doctor, the following questions to make a well-informed choice:

 - What is the purpose of vaccinating my child?
 - What are the benefits of vaccinating with the Covid-19 vaccine?
 - What are the risks of this vaccine? What are the side effects? In the short and long term?
 - What are side effects that are known from other countries that have been vaccinating children for longer?
 - What are alternatives (eg a different vaccine, medication, prevention, supplements) to achieve a similar goal/benefit?
 - Is this vaccine a one-off or will children also have to receive boosters in the future?
 - What consequences or risks are there for my child if I do nothing now and choose not to vaccinate?

When you buy paracetamol or another self-care product at a well-known drugstore, you will always be asked whether you are familiar with the drug and the package leaflet and whether you know how to use it.

But you are not asked this question when vaccinating your child. Never mind being asked in (truncated)

# **Parents, it's time- fight or flee.**

https://leginfo.legislature.ca.gov/faces/billTextClient.xhtml?bill_id=202120220SB866
# üëâ**Speak up and Oppose**
# **SB 866 Minors- Vaccine Consent**

The people of the State of California do enact as follows:

SECTION 1. Section 6931 is added to the Family Code, to read:

6931. (a) **A minor 12 years of age or older may consent to a vaccin**e that is approved by the United States Food and Drug Administration and meets the recommendations of the Advisory Committee on Immunization Practices (ACIP) of the federal Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (ACIP)** without the consent of the parent or guardian of the minor.**

(b) An authorized vaccine provider may administer a vaccine pursuant to subdivision (a). For purposes of this section, ‚Äúauthorized vaccine provider‚Äù means a person licensed pursuant to Division 2 (commencing with Section 500) of the Business and Professions Code or a clinic or health facility licensed pursuant to Division 2 (commencing with Section 1200 of the Health and Safety Code), or any other provider authorized by the state.

(c) This section does not authorize a vaccine provider to provide any service that is otherwise outside the vaccine provider‚Äôs scope of practice.

column30: This Calgary police officer, Brian Denison, whose video I have posted previously, made a comment comparing present conditions in Canada to what happened against the Jews in Nazi Germany. He's quite right, of course. Evidently some people don‚Äôt know that the Nazis pre-conditioned German society to make the later atrocities possible. The German people were not born monsters who were somehow okay with the idea of murdering a sector of society. They were made to be more able to ‚Äòturn a blind eye‚Äô because the Jews had been dehumanized by Nazi propaganda for many years prior to the 1940‚Äôs. The Nazis did the ‚Äòset-up‚Äô for the holocaust by getting the German people used to thinking of the Jews as people who were deficient in character and morals, and even health and hygiene‚Ä¶ ‚ÄúDuring the years of the Nazi regime, German doctors frequently argued that Jews spread disease. Reflecting common themes in Nazi propaganda, these medical professionals repeatedly pushed the false claim that Jews were especially responsible for outbreaks of typhus‚Äîa deadly contagious disease spread by lice.‚Äù (From ‚ÄúJewish Perspectives on the Holocaust‚Äù) Just think about the way that the unvaxxed are being blamed for the pandemic: ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a pandemic of the unvaccinated‚Äù as you‚Äôve heard public health officials, politicians and media say. That‚Äôs nonsense of course, but it‚Äôs an effective ear-worm for disparaging and discrediting the people being attacked in this Covid world. And as for character and morals, the unvaxxed are being criticized for being ‚Äòselfish‚Äô and for not sacrificing themselves to the greater good of society. Inexplicably, the unvaxxed are expected to switch off their concerns about the absence of long-term-safety data and just roll up their sleeves‚Äîin spite of the fact that the vaccines are known to have caused serious adverse health events, and have been shown to be ‚Äòleaky,‚Äô non-sterilizing, and increasingly ineffective over a short period of time. Not to mention the fact that they were designed for a version of the virus that is EXTINCT. Every variant moves the vaccines further and further away from being any use at all. Big Pharma is now talking about coming out with NEW vaccines in the coming year. But that doesn‚Äôt matter, according to government, public health and the wild-eyed VAX Fanatics. People are STILL being pressured and coerced into taking the old-style injections. Or else they‚Äôll be FIRED from their jobs, and DENIED services and the right to travel. Where are we? It‚Äôs very disorienting. Is this CANADA in 2021, or GERMANY in 1933? The vaccines also didn‚Äôt accomplish the purpose for which they were intended. Their original purpose of PREVENTING infection, and PREVENTING transmission, had to be changed to PREVENTING serious disease--after it became obvious that they weren‚Äôt working. Because of course they do NOT stop infection and they do NOT stop transmission. In fact, they SOMETIMES don‚Äôt stop severe disease and death, as we‚Äôve seen in the U.K. statistics‚Äîwhich show morbidity data by vaccine status. In this Calgary Sun article, I had some exchanges on the comparisons in our modern society to Nazi Germany‚Äôs segregation and propaganda against the Jews in the 1930‚Äôs. These are the remarks, and my responses‚Ä¶ ‚ÄúJoel Schulz: ‚ÄúMy father was the only survivor of the Holocaust in his family. I never met my uncles, aunts, cousins, and grandparents on his side because a malignancy known as Adolf Hitler and his merry band of psychopaths murdered every last one of them. CPS is right to dump this cop. His comments are majorly offensive and downright insensitive. Brings back memories of Keegstra. It gives the image that he speaks for the whole police service; propagates the lies that vaccines are not safe; and trivializes one of the greatest mass murders in human history. He is free to talk like a fool out of uniform. It is insubordination to do so as if he representing the Calgary Police Service. This action is grounds for dismissal with just cause.‚Äù Donna Kirk Reply to Joel Schulz: ‚ÄúPeople lose sight of the way the Germans began to isolate the Jews from society as early as 1933. They didn't go full-blown-gas-chamber to start with. Consider today's society with unvaxxed people being barred from partaking fully in society's services (nonsensically, since both vaxxed and unvaxxed can catch and spread the virus)--and NOW New Brunswick wants to bar them from grocery stores! And consider the demonizing and scapegoating behaviour that people are encouraged by politicians and media to adopt against the unvaxxed. Consider a speech by Hitler on January 30, 1939, ""In a long rant against Jews, Hitler first mocked them, then said that it was time to ""wrestle the Jewish world enemy to the ground."" How many times during the election campaign did we hear Trudeau delivering a diatribe against the unvaxxed? The unvaxxed are being marginalized from society. That was Hitler's first move against the Jews. And trying to damage their (truncated)

column35:
üåÄYes we have an update on this post including an author credit and in case it wasn't clear before, a notice that this image is being used in the capacity to critique & comment on it and use it for the purposes of teaching and research.üåÄ

Our critique of the comic is this: WE LOVE IT, obviously! 

A+ content that we feel that it embodies the discourse surrounding certain topics in today's day and age and we give it the caption:

'2022 big tech censorship be like... ü§£ üòÇ ü§£'

The original author of this comic Crustacean Singles reached out to let us know that it was their original work and expressed frustration that it had been ""stolen quite frequently and used outside the context for which it was made"". 

We understand the frustration mate and we always try to give due credit when information is available. In this case, we saw it somewhere else on Z**kerbook, and the credit had already been removed. Since you reached out, we have updated the post to give that due credit and reinstated the original image that contains it (*pro-tip: put your signature in the middle where it can't easily be cropped out by assholes)

Anyways, the author then linked us to a page on their site noting their displeasure that: ""Multiple disingenuous bad actors have stolen the above comic, cropped off the attribution at the bottom, and shared it as part of science-denying, conspiracist, and frankly evil agendas, particularly in anti-vax circles. Let it be known in no uncertain terms that CrustaceanSingles thoroughly and unequivocally condemns the anti-vax movement, its ideas, and every last ignorant, selfish, reckless person who espouses them."".

They also asked us to remove the post ü§î

Our critique/comment: You are entitled to your opinion on when you think this kind of thing applies and when it doesn't...without further info on the details of your beliefs we can't say too much more but find it ironic that you want to police how it gets shared and how it gets interpreted. Is art not subject to the interpretation of the viewer? You made something real, clever, AND true mate, embrace it!

(please be kind and courteous to our Crustacean friend, and throw some money to them to support their creation of original art!)

column30: ""The Justice Centre for Constitutional Freedoms has issued a legal warning letter to the Ontario Government on behalf of four clients demanding the vaccine passport mandate be revoked immediately. The law requires Ontarians as young as 12 to provide proof of two doses of the Covid mRNA vaccination as of September 22, 2021, or be denied access to a wide range of businesses and organizations, including field trips to city facilities. The Justice Centre has notified the Province that it will file a legal action should Ontario fail to halt its unconstitutional discrimination against those who have not yet chosen to receive the experimental vaccines. ""Since the vaccine passport has been announced, the Justice Centre has received hundreds of emails from Ontarians concerned about loss of employment, loss of ability to worship, and denial of access to restaurants, bars, gyms, sporting events, meeting and event spaces, and more, unless they show proof of their confidential medical status of vaccination.""

column30: Moron and POS Sen. Rand Paul said Republicans would subpoena Fauci if they win the Senate in the mid-terms. Paul and Fauci have engaged in bitter exchanges at Senate hearings. Paul has pushed unsubstantiated claims that funds approved by Fauci may have helped create COVID. Sen. Rand Paul said that Republicans will subpoena chief White House medical advisor Dr Anthony Fauci if they take control of the Senate in the mid-term elections. The Kentucky Republican is a member of the Senate Health, Education, Labor & Pensions Committee. He stands to be nominated as chairman of the panel if Republicans win the Senate in November, securing him the power to launch investigations and issue subpoenas. ""If we win in November, if I'm chairman of a committee, if I have subpoena power, we'll go after every one of [Fauci's] records,"" Paul said during an interview with anti-vax podcaster Lisa Boothe. ""We'll have an investigator go through this piece by piece because we don't need this to happen again."" Paul, a physician, and Fauci have clashed in a series of heated exchanges in Senate hearings. Paul, often trafficking in conspiracy theories and disinformation, has criticised Fauci on measures he has advocated to contain the virus. His attacks have focussed on Fauci's tenure as head of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (NIAID), and often rely on speculation that funding Fauci approved to a lab in [Wuhan, China, may have been used to create the coronavirus](https://www.businessinsider.com/fauci-gain-of-function-research-wuhan-institute-rand-paul-2021-10?IR=T&r=US&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=yahoo.com). Fauci has denied that [the funding was for so-called ""gain of function"" research,](https://www.businessinsider.com/fauci-gain-of-function-research-wuhan-institute-rand-paul-2021-10?IR=T&r=US&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=yahoo.com) or research into making diseases more contagious. The origin of the virus has not been established, [with China blocking attempts to investigate the source](https://www.businessinsider.com/china-uk-spies-say-theory-covid-19-leaked-from-wuhan-lab-is-plausible-2021-5?IR=T&r=US&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=yahoo.com) of the pandemic. Many experts believe that the theory it originated in a lab is spurious and it most likely originated in nature, though others say it is plausible. In a particularly embittered exchange in January, [Fauci said that Paul's baseless attacks ""kindle the crazies""](https://www.businessinsider.com/china-uk-spies-say-theory-covid-19-leaked-from-wuhan-lab-is-plausible-2021-5?IR=T&r=US&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=yahoo.com) who threaten and harass him and his family. He said Paul was seeking to exploit the pandemic for political gain. At hearing last July, Fauci said ""you do not know what you're talking about"" to Paul, and accused him of ""lying"", after the senator tried to draw connections between research in China partly funded by NIAID and the coronavirus. Paul had at a hearing earlier in the year accused Fauci of indulging in ""theater"" by wearing a mask after having gotten vaccinated, and Fauci responded that vaccines don't offer protection against all variants. Fauci has become a hate figure for some on the right, with many Republicans rallying around opposition to federal government measures to control the virus. Some Republican supporters have embraced fringe anti-vaccine views and conspiracy theories about the virus. Read the original article on [Business Insider](https://www.businessinsider.com/rand-paul-gop-investigate-fauci-wins-senate-2022-2)

column30: Those who have taken the jab and had no side affects or adverse reactions are convinced the vax is safe, I so pray it is. For others who were unlucky and did have adverse reactions that injuried them, I am sorry for their terrible experience and hope they recover in time. I have heard both arguements for and against this jab. At first, I was waiting for the FDA to approve it before agreeing to take it. Then I heard and saw the bad side of it. I have an unstable blood protein in my white blood cells where an M Protein crowds out my white blood cells called MGUS. I am waiting to see my Hemotologist in October to discuss my odds. I have heard physicians for and against this vax. I don't know what my Hemotogist will advice me to do. If she thinks I need to wait or advises me otherwise not to take it as some physicians have told other patients with autoimmune problems or blood cancers while undergoing chem or have certain kinds of blood disorders, I will have her write me a letter of exemption. Since no one knows for sure the outcome of this for the vaccinated, I'm sure I may be asked to wait or not take it. Every person's health and body reacts differently to the vax and medications. Nothing is guaranteed. So, I will continue taking my Vitamin C, D3, Zinc, Selenium, (NAC) N-Acetyl Cysteine & Quercetin. If you are curious about the benefits of the two latter supplements, look them up as I did when I was told about them increasing my immune system. I have not had a sinus infection nor cold since February. My allergies are not near what they were in the past. But, this is ONLY my experience & no one else's. But, as a vitamin enthusiast, I strongly believe in their worth. I am retired from the Civil Service and my background is in Respiratory Therapy and understand all the risks involved in being unvaccinated and being vaccined. But, I know other RTs who feel the same as I do about an unapproved experimental drug, too.

SO NOW BIDEN AND THE DEMS ARE LITERALLY ALLOWING AMERICANS TO DIE IN ORDER TO FORWARD THEIR VACCINE NARRATIVE. I am not ‚Äúanti-vax‚Äù per se, however what has been admitted even by those on the left who have been pushing so hard to MANDATE it on the entire population (the same people who less than a year ago, before the election, were all saying that they would not trust the vaccine and would advise everyone NOT to get it), is that of those getting sick now, just as many are vaccinated as are unvaccinated. AND 90% OF THOSE HOSPITALIZED WITH THE VIRUS ARE VACCINATED. Even Fauci admitted this. They have a real narrative issue, as just weeks ago they were suggesting that the only people getting sick were unvaccinated, and then one week later they were forced to change their narrative when they told everyone - vaccinated or not - that they had to wear masks again as now (with Delta) even the vaccinated are able to contract and spread the virus - 180 degree turn from one week prior. Both narratives can not be true, however what they have done is rationalized a general distrust of them and those who are so aggressively promoting the vaccine (even to the point of actions quite reminiscent of nazi germany). The other issue I have with it - and this has ZERO to do with politics - is that, not only do they keep changing their story with respect to efficacy, etc., but the fact is that there is not one person on this planet who has had the vaccine for a year yet. Noone - regardless as to how much education and experience they have in the medicine - can tell you the long-term effects (which could be significant) as this vaccine was rushed through the FDA ‚Äì even FDA panelists admitted this (it technically hasn't even been approved - rather only for emergency purposes, but it has yet to receive actual full FDA approval). I have heard it all before - that the core components of the vaccine have been around for a while, however if it were that simple, then not only would the vaccine have been released much sooner, but it would have also been fully approved by the FDA. However clearly that is not the case, whether it be additional components in the vaccine, or the manner in which the components are mixed, or whatever. AND NOW THE FDA IS GOING TO COURT TO MAKE IT SUCH THAT THEY DON'T RELEASE THEIR FINDINGS ABOUT THE VACCINE TO THE PUBLIC FOR 75 YEARS. WHY WOULD THEY WISH TO WAIT UNTIL THE VAST MAJORITY OF THE RECIPIENTS OF THE VACCINE ARE ALREADY DEAD BEFORE THEY RELEASE THE DATA??? THEY NEED THIS MUCH TIME TO ‚ÄúHIDE‚Äù THE DETAILS? And yet they still DEMAND that we simply ""trust the science"", when they give us no reason nor ability to do so when they are clearly hiding the ""facts"" (not to mention their track record of constantly changing their narrative with respect to the effectiveness of the vaccine - remember when they first told us that once you got vaccinated you could no longer get nor transmit the virus?). Bottom line is that there is a reason why it took as long as it did to come out, why it still has not been fully approved by the FDA (and now I understand that Biden, Fauci and the dems are ""applying pressure"" on the FDA to approve it now, so there goes any credibility given that it has now been politicized). And over 150,000 people have in fact died from the vaccine (not to mention the now MILLIONS of people who took the vaccine but still got sick ‚Äì as mentioned, 90% of those hospitalized with the virus are vaccinated) and now the death rate from the vaccine exceeds the death rate from the virus. Other vaccines (flu, polio, etc.) took years before they were approved for use, as the long-term effects needed to be known. That was not the case here. Bottom line - all ""conspiracy theories"" aside - noone knows the long-term effects of the vaccine (and as an additional factoid, while it is true that incidences of the virus (in both vaccinated and unvaccinated people) are in fact up, as are hospitalizations in some areas, deaths are not ‚Äì and at the end of the day that is the rationale as to whether or not all of our lives should be massively disrupted (or worse). Start standing your ground. *copied from somebody else* This is not about whether you do or don't get vaccinated; it's about your freedom of choice and your privacy!!

People took the vax for all sorts of reasons, as we all know. Some wanted it, because we were told first that it would protect us from infection (which was wrong); then we were told that it would prevent transmission of infection to others (which was wrong); then we were told that it would prevent serious illness (which was temporary). Others were coerced. They were told they couldn't see elderly parents in seniors' residences. They were told they couldn't visit loved ones in hospital. They were old they couldn't travel. They were told they couldn't go to a restaurant with friends for a meal. They were told they would be fired from their jobs. A lot of people took the vax because they were told that it was the right thing to do...that it would ease restrictions and prevent lockdowns for EVERYONE. And that's not happening. Even with the high level of vaccination in the Canadian population (among the highest in the world) the government stands ready to continue restrictions and mandates. There are 37 million people in Canada, and there have been 62,896,957 doses of 'vaccine' administered. And consider this...Japan started to see a spike in the number of daily new cases in August, and they started to allow the doctors to prescribe therapeutics like Ivermectin (which is banned in Canada). On August 22, 2021, Japan saw 26,184 new Covid infections. After months of allowing doctors to use Ivermectin and other therapeutics, on December 12, 2021, there were 141 new cases. ONE-HUNDRED AND FORTY-ONE in a population of over 126 million. Canada has 1,476 new cases of Covid. Total active cases in Canada = 30,735. Total active cases in Japan = 930. The news reports will tell you that nobody understands this huge decrease in the number of daily new cases in Japan (from 26,184 to 141), but it coincides with the introduction of Ivermectin as a treatment. It's not officially approved for use in Japan, but doctors are ALLOWED to prescribe it. Unlike Canada. We have been nothing but betrayed by our governments and health authorities. Even the fully vaxxed are being betrayed. If you've only had two jabs, your freedoms will likely be cancelled. Join the club.

Interesting views from this fellow who calls himself an independent who tends to vote conservative because our views most closely align with his own. He was glad to see the back of our former leader, ""Erin O'Trudeau"" as he calls him. He also thinks that the PPC serves a useful purpose in keeping the CPC true to Conservative principles; i.e., if the CPC starts sliding into leftist Liberal policies, the PPC is there to pick up the fallout from that. Seems reasonable. For some reason, he doesn't think we should involve ourselves in the problems of other nations that are being threatened by more powerful neighbouring countries, and that political leaders without military experience should not be proposing military interventions in defence of those nations. Don't think I can agree, there...what do you think? He likes Pierre Poilievre, but wonders where Conservative MPs were when our rights and freedoms were being threatened by Covid mandates. Why didn't they SAY anything? My thought is that they were prevented from speaking up because O'Toole wanted everyone to fall in line with his own thoughts. As we know, O'Toole's thoughts are just one tiny step short of Junior Trudeau's radical forced-vax ideas. We heard O'Toole say that the military should be force-vaxxed, and he was okay with the COERCION to force Covid vaxxes on people in general society. There's no denying that when Conservative MPs started speaking up for the truckers (in defiance of O'Toole, it seems to me), it signalled THE END for O'Toole. I get the impression that Conservative MPs had had enough of their own views being suppressed--possibly under threat of repercussions for disobedience from O'Toole? I've always had the impression that O'Toole was a petty-tyrant-wannabe, in the Trudeau mold.

A Big Win for All Un-Vax‚Äôd Workers!!! Osha Suspends Enforcement of Covid-19 Vaccine Mandate for Large Businesses While Over 160 House Republicans Within 27 Us States Have Also Moved to Block Biden Vaccine Mandate!!! ‚Ä¶ OSHA‚Äôs unconstitutional enforcement of the vax-mandates are now suspension after federal appeals court decision to uphold a stay on the mandate! The Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) is abiding by a court order and suspending enforcement of the Biden administration's COVID-19 vaccine mandate on large private businesses. In a statement shared to OSHA's website, the agency said, ""The court ordered that OSHA 'take no steps to implement or enforce' the [Testing Emergency Temporary Standard (ETS)] ‚Äòuntil further court order.‚Äô"" The agency said it ""remains confident in its authority to protect workers in emergencies."" The suspension comes after the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit upheld a stay on the mandate. In response to the court's decision, the Department of Justice said it will ""vigorously defend"" the rules laid out by OSHA. ""OSHA is complying with the 5th Circuit‚Äôs stay,"" a Department of Labor official said. ""OSHA is not enforcing or implementing the reg ‚Äì so they are not engaging or offering compliance assistance."" OSHA had originally given employers with more than 100 employees a Jan. 4 deadline to comply with Biden's COVID-19 vaccine mandate and threatened thousands of dollars in fines for defiant businesses. Prior to the suspension of enforcement for the mandate, senior administration officials said OSHA would assist employers in developing their own vaccine and testing standards. Fines for willfully failing to comply with the mandate could reach as much as $14,000 per violation, with the potential for multiple citations per business. The White House said earlier this month that it would delay its federal contractor vaccine mandate deadline from Dec. 8 to Jan. 4. Several congressional Republicans, as well as governors and state officials across the country, have pushed back against the Biden administration's vaccination efforts. A coalition of Republican attorneys general filed suit against the federal contractor mandate. Over 160 house republicans within 27 US states have moved to block Biden vaccine mandate Top Republicans on Capitol Hill launched an official challenge Wednesday to President Biden‚Äôs executive order mandating all businesses with 100 employees or more to enforce vaccine-or-testing requirements. Rep. Fred Keller, R-Pa., ranking member of the House Subcommittee on Workforce Protections, is leading over 160 Republicans in an effort to counter a mandate that GOP lawmakers argue will further exacerbate the nation‚Äôs rising inflation. Senate Republicans are leading an identical challenge in the upper chamber. ""We‚Äôre fighting for the American people,"" Keller told Fox News. ""This covers people that went to work every day during the pandemic and provided the goods and services that we need as a free society to be successful. ""The problem is, it seems like the administration no longer appreciates all the people that get the work done every day, but instead wants to impose their idea of what they should be doing,"" he added. ""The administration thinks that they know what‚Äôs better for America than Americans do."" Under guidelines issued by the Department of Labor‚Äôs Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) issued earlier this month, 84 million Americans would be subject to the vaccine mandate or could face termination. Businesses will also face their share of repercussions if they fail to enforce the mandate, and could see fines as high as $14,000 per violation. Keller, in coordination with Sen. Mike Braun who is leading every Republican in the upper chamber, introduced a joint resolution of disapproval under the Congressional Review Act in an attempt to override the executive order. Labor shortages across the U.S. have led to a national supply chain crisis, which in turn has contributed to the greatest rise in inflation in over 30 years. ""These are American concerns,"" Keller said. ""These aren‚Äôt concerns that should be Republican or Democrat. It‚Äôs not right or left ‚Äì it‚Äôs right or wrong. We‚Äôre on the right side of this believing that the American people control their destiny and the government is not here to impose its will upon the people."" House Republicans will need to secure the backing of 218 lawmakers to advance the resolution ‚Äì meaning five Democrats would have cross party lines to support the effort. Even if the resolution were to gain the simple majority support it needs in the House and Senate to make it to Biden‚Äôs desk, it is unlikely to survive a presidential veto. Lawmakers would need to secure a two-thirds majority vote to then override the veto, but Keller said the effort has value as a resolution of disapproval will force every member of Congress to voice where they stand on vaccine mandates. ""That will show their (truncated)

The Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) is abiding by a court order and suspending enforcement of the Biden administration's COVID-19 vaccine mandate on large private businesses.
 
 
In a statement shared to OSHA's website, the agency said, ""The court ordered that OSHA 'take no steps to implement or enforce' the [Testing Emergency Temporary Standard (ETS)] ‚Äòuntil further court order.‚Äô"" The agency said it ""remains confident in its authority to protect workers in emergencies.""
 
The suspension comes after the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit upheld a stay on the mandate. In response to the court's decision, the Department of Justice said it will ""vigorously defend"" the rules laid out by OSHA.
 
 
""OSHA is complying with the 5th Circuit‚Äôs stay,"" a Department of Labor official said. ""OSHA is not enforcing or implementing the reg ‚Äì so they are not engaging or offering compliance assistance.""
 
 
OSHA had originally given employers with more than 100 employees a Jan. 4 deadline to comply with Biden's COVID-19 vaccine mandate and threatened thousands of dollars in fines for defiant businesses.
 
 
Prior to the suspension of enforcement for the mandate, senior administration officials said OSHA would assist employers in developing their own vaccine and testing standards. Fines for willfully failing to comply with the mandate could reach as much as $14,000 per violation, with the potential for multiple citations per business.
 
 
The White House said earlier this month that it would delay its federal contractor vaccine mandate deadline from Dec. 8 to Jan. 4.
 
 
Several congressional Republicans, as well as governors and state officials across the country, have pushed back against the Biden administration's vaccination efforts. A coalition of Republican attorneys general filed suit against the federal contractor mandate.
 
 
Over 160 house republicans within 27 US states have moved to block Biden vaccine mandate
 
 
Top Republicans on Capitol Hill launched an official challenge Wednesday to President Biden‚Äôs executive order mandating all businesses with 100 employees or more to enforce vaccine-or-testing requirements.
 
 
Rep. Fred Keller, R-Pa., ranking member of the House Subcommittee on Workforce Protections, is leading over 160 Republicans in an effort to counter a mandate that GOP lawmakers argue will further exacerbate the nation‚Äôs rising inflation. Senate Republicans are leading an identical challenge in the upper chamber. 
 
 
""We‚Äôre fighting for the American people,"" Keller told Fox News. ""This covers people that went to work every day during the pandemic and provided the goods and services that we need as a free society to be successful.

Under guidelines issued by the Department of Labor‚Äôs Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) issued earlier this month, 84 million Americans would be subject to the vaccine mandate or could face termination.
Businesses will also face their share of repercussions if they fail to enforce the mandate, and could see fines as high as $14,000 per violation. 
 
 
Keller, in coordination with Sen. Mike Braun who is leading every Republican in the upper chamber, introduced a joint resolution of disapproval under the Congressional Review Act in an attempt to override the executive order. 
Labor shortages across the U.S. have led to a national supply chain crisis, which in turn has contributed to the greatest rise in inflation in over 30 years.
 
 
""These are American concerns,"" Keller said. ""These aren‚Äôt concerns that should be Republican or Democrat. It‚Äôs not right or left ‚Äì it‚Äôs right or wrong. We‚Äôre on the right side of this believing that the American people control their destiny and the government is not here to impose its will upon the people.""
 
 
House Republicans will need to secure the backing of 218 lawmakers to advance the resolution ‚Äì meaning five Democrats would have cross party lines to support the effort. 
 
 
Even if the resolution were to gain the simple majority support it needs in the House and Senate to make it to Biden‚Äôs desk, it is unlikely to survive a presidential veto.

column30: ACTION REQUIRED Hello Deptford Republicans This is going to be a bit of a long message but please do read it. There are very disturbing issues in NJ and Gloucester County right now and we need to take actions to make sure our voice is heard. There are some very disturbing things going on in NJ at the moment surrounding Republican politicians and the overreaching covid response from our government. Yesterday 12/20 Republican lawmakers were blocked by state troopers from entering the State house and engaging in their civic duty as duly elected officials. This is unacceptable. The Democrat controlled state house and Phil Murphy have issued a ridiculous vaccine requirement on lawmakers. This ""policy' requires that law makers must present a vax card in order to enter the floor and take their seats in the voting session. The article below briefly explains the situation and the Republicans that are refusing to comply. We should show solidarity with them and spread the word that medical apartheid is here in NJ. Phil Murphy has governed like a king for the last 2 years and with his recent win he seems emboldened to continue down this reckless path. He is using our state troopers to enforce unconstitutional left-wing policies that are not law and are unjust even if they were law. Our voices are not being heard if our elected representatives are not allowed equal access to the state house. Voting matters but it is time we fight the fight after the election and keep the pressure on Phil Murphy and Trenton. If you can call or email the representatives in this article that stood up against this outrageous abuse of power and show them that you stand with them. Also contact your local state representative and tell them that you will not except this medical tyranny. Statehouse over vaccine policy - New Jersey Monitor https://newjerseymonitor.com/2021/12/20/republicans-file-suit-after-being-barred-from-entering-n-j-statehouse/ In more local matters. Chris Konawel and Nick Desilvio were elected this past November as Gloucester County Commissioners. They along with sheriff elect Jon Sammons will be sworn in officially on Jan. 1st at the Gloucester County Justice Complex 70 Hunter St Woodbury NJ. Chris and Nick have been attacked by a sitting member of the commissioners Lisa Carney who has accused them of the typical smear from democrats of being racists. She has yet to apologize for her comments and I would not hold my breath waiting on one. The sitting members are not taking the Republican wins politely and seem to be trying to put road blocks up against Chris, Nick and Jon already. The sitting members have determined that after Jon Sammons win, they will be moving the Sheriff's office out of the Gloucester County Justice Complex as well as moving the offices of Chris and Nick to a different section of the building then where their predecessors were. This office shifting is most certainly an effort to make it harder for our Republican representatives to do their jobs. The Democrats are playing games and are trying to invalidate our voice and our vote. WE NEED TO SPEAK OUT. We need to show up and back our guys in their efforts to represent us in their elected positions. Chris Nick and Jon are asking that as many people as possible show up to their swearing in but even there the covid games do not stop. For the swearing in day citizens wishing to attend will have to show a negative Covid test before being allowed in the building. They have apparently offered to do rapid testing the day of. Testing will begin at 8am and the swearing in will begin at 10 am. Now the issue with this testing is that it seems to be exclusively enforced only at the event of their swearing in. A large gathering at the previous Commissioners meeting did not require testing nor has testing been implemented as a requirement for entry into the Gloucester County Justice complex previously. It is clear that this testing requirement along with the vax card mandate in Trenton is a concerted effort to dissuade residents and their representatives from engaging in civil discourse under the guise of medical safety. This discrimination must not stand. The way that Democrats are using this ""pandemic."" to ostracize and silence their political opposition is the definition of tyranny. Democrats are destroying our civic society by denying our rights to fair (truncated)

Ownership of information, the destruction of truth, logic-based decision making, and ethics are being squeezed into ruin. You can see it if you look beyond the semi-truth we are given and to the forces causing it. This is nothing less than a cold civil war, for the soul of America. . Let‚Äôs begin with a discussion of rights and the abuse of the concept of sacrosanct rights. There is a bubble around all of us that we own as human beings. That is what rights are. That bubble is the area we control around us. But here is where the Cons and Regressives arguments fall apart. From policing to abortion, the Cons and Regressives work as hard as they can to penetrate that three feet bubble that we own, that is our real right. Their lie is even more exposed, as being complete bullshit by their arguments about abortion, and education, masks, and vaccine. Because their actions go well beyond that 3 feet bubble and look to purposefully invade your space, your rights while claiming there are perfectly protected. From their ownership of the media and control of content to their out-and-out propaganda machine, they seek to invade your 3 feet bubble. Their screams and yells, reinforce by intimidation and violence are nothing more than the rants of authoritarians, seeking control of your space, freedoms. . They seek to enable, much like the Communists to have neighbors denounce neighbors except to have those neighbors shoot you and the police do nothing. Those that defend their 3 feet, become the enemy. Those that willingly give up, are rewarded with peace. Those that enforce it are given things to prove their loyalty. This is the python squeezing the life out of our nation, our democracy. . We must begin by defending our 3 feet bubble. But as with a python, we must remember that you can chop up the body and it may eventually die, but to kill a python before it kills democracy, as the old saying goes, you must cut off its head. column35:
WHAT CAN BE DONE?  FORCED MEDICAL TREATMENT

More than a few have asked me what can they do to protect their jobs and avoid forced medical treatment.  

What I hope above all is that our people will be roused by this tyranny to re-learn the power inherent in them, re-learn the right of remonstrance, re-learn their right to instruct, and from that knowledge restore the ultimate check and balance of power of the people over government.

Here is the real problem.  

PROBLEM #1)  Clearly Tennessee govt. cannot force medical treatment on civilians since that is prohibited in Art I, Sect 25 and more recently with unnecessary statutory law, that suggests statutory law supplants constitutional law... it does not.

Our corrupt general assembly and office of governor will not convene to address the matter of mandates by business.  Since they will not address the matter, our government acquiesces and silence is acceptance.  Our government is guilty as principle aiding and abetting.

PROBLEM #2)  Our people have become so servile, they no longer know their rights or how to defend them.  

Have we come full circle?

""But when a long train of abuses and usurpations, pursuing invariably the same Object evinces a design to reduce them under absolute Despotism, it is their right, it is their duty, to throw off such Government, and to provide new Guards for their future security.""

I don't think we are full circle yet but we are nearing that precipice as a society 

So my answer to this persistent question... what can be done.

I don't think there is anything that can be done at this point.  My suggestion is to take the vax but learn to be a more engaged citizen going forward.  I don't think it's worth it losing one's job and health insurance, especially as a single mom.  The employer will like not be affected with her taking a stand, so making that sacrifice standing on principle harms only your daughter and does not prove or fix anything.  BUT IT IS CRITICALLY IMPORTANT THAT WE CITIZENS LEARN FROM THIS and immediately take up our duty to oversee government and become engaged citizens.

I know you won't like that answer.  But it is easier to educate, research, learn how to fight with food on the table.  I don't think there is anything to be gained losing one's job over this.   More than likely you'll not be harmed if you comply.  

Here is the solution.  

We must unite as a people.  We have to get loud... very loud and in one voice.  We have to defend our rights to instruct, and remonstrate.  We have learn, understand, and then believe that power is inherent in us.  Once we assert our rights and power inherent in us, tyranny of today will fall away just as King George III lost his rule over this land.

There is no one coming to save us.  If we aim to be saved, we must save ourselves.  If you are too lazy to learn, if you are too lazy to defend your rights, then its best to stay in your place and do what you're told.

As for myself?  I'm looking for patriots to stand with me at my side.  When there are enough of you with me, we will take back Tennessee, lawfully and peacefully.   

God Bless & In God We Trust

John Gentry
Constitutional Republican
Independent Candidate Governor 2022

# **California School Choice 2022; The Educational Freedom Act**
# **‚ÄúYour money, your children, your choice‚Äù**

Proverbs 22:6 says: ‚Äú***Train up a child in the way he should go, and when he is old he will not depart from it***.‚Äù  It is hard to follow Proverbs 22:6 when most Government Run Schools are doing the opposite, 5 days/week, 6-8 hours/day. 

In the #GovernmentRunSchools, we have medically irrational mask and vax mandates for children, who are at 0.00% risk from Covid; Critical Race Theory that indoctrinates children to be racists and judge and treat other people based on the color of their skin; pornographic SeXXXEd; anti Christian indoctrination; anti American history; and dumbed down academic standards.  In California, the Government Run Schools can take children for abortions and transgender hormone treatments without their parents‚Äô consent or even knowledge.  California‚Äôs new ethnic studies curriculum literally has children chanting to the Aztec gods of human sacrifice.

The #GovernmentRunSchools are non-reformable because the control is too diffuse spread over local school boards, the state government and the federal government, and the well financed interests are too entrenched.  While homeschooling and private schooling are options for some families, the only way to save large numbers of our children and our country is with #SchoolChoice.

The California School Choice Foundation is circulating the **EDUCATIONAL FREEDOM ACT **initiative that will be the boldest, most comprehensive School Choice law in America.  

# **The EDUCATIONAL FREEDOM ACT initiative,**

1. Offers all children a $14,000/year educational savings account.

2. Lets parents choose the best school for their children.

3. Allows families to save unused money for college or vocational training.

4. Includes homeschooling families.

5. Uses the children‚Äôs shares of money the state is already spending.

6. Protects private schools and home schools from interference and control by the government and teacher unions.

The **EDUCATIONAL FREEDOM ACT **is based on three principles: (1) Parents can and should decide how best to educate their children; (2) Freedom of choice is good; and (3) Competition improves the quality of goods and services, especially compared to a government monopoly. 

# **OUR REQUESTS OF YOU:**

1. Sign the petition to get the Educational Freedom Act on the ballot for 2022.  Our people are out gathering signatures at various locations in San Bernardino and Riverside Counties.  You may contact me through FB, Greg@RedlandsTeaParty.net or 909.550.1358 to find a time and location.  I will even meet you at my office in Redlands to sign the petition. 

2. Volunteer for 2 hours/week collecting signatures.  Are your children (or grandchildren) and your country worth two hours per week?

3. Contribute $5/month, or more if you can afford it.  Again, what are your children (or grandchildren) and your country worth?

We can volunteer and contribute at www.CaliforniaSchool Choice.org  

In San Bernardino and Riverside Counties, please contact:

--Dale Broome for San Bernardino County, DaleBroome@CaliforniaSchoolChoice.org 951.322.6351

--Wendy Beyer for Riverside County, riverside@cascf.com 

We do not have millionaires to pay for signature gatherers.  We need concerned parents, grandparents, and other citizens to step up.  

**THE EDUCATIONAL FREEDOM ACT IS THE MOST IMPORTANT POLITICAL CAUSE BEFORE US IN CALIFORNIA BECAUSE: **

(1st) Getting America‚Äôs children out of the Government Run Schools is a national survival issue.  

(2nd) We can accomplish this.  Because parents now see what is happening in the Government Run Schools, this is the best ever opportunity to enact #SchoolChoice in California.

(3rd) When we enact the EDUCATIONAL FREEDOM ACT in November 2022, it will be the educational Liberty Bell that will ring not only in California but across the country and around the world.

As Ronald Reagan said, ‚Äú***If not us, who? If not now, when?***‚Äù

I would also advise that my inalienable rights are reserved.‚Äô The point is that if they CANNOT provide that information you‚Äôve NOT refused‚Ä¶

**REPOSTED AS A PUBLIC SERVICE ANNOUNCEMENT (PSA) FOR THE AZ REPUBLICAN PARTY (LD-22)... üá∫üá∏** **Attention Precinct Committeemen**: I've been contacted by numerous healthcare workers that they are about to lose their jobs over the Nov 1. COVID vaccine mandate. My advice to them includes two paths of action. I am also in contact with several elected and political officials to help bring this issue to a boiling point. Both these paths require unity in message and a very large unified front, so we all need to be working together. The underlying point to reinforce is that these vaccines were rushed through, have not had proper testing, are not approved by the FDA, and were previously rejected for use during a previous SARS outbreak. This sets this particular vaccine apart from other vaccines. We must stress the distinction between this and other anti-vax arguments. This is not an anti-vax objection as I have taken plenty of vaccines and understand their benefits. It's a demand for freedom of choice. **Path 1: Governor**: We are currently still under an emergency order to address the pandemic situation. This order originally was enacted to protect our healthcare capacity to respond to the outbreak. Forcing health workers to choose between an untested, highly politicized vaccine and their employment in the industry puts Arizona's healthcare provision capacity at risk. With greater than 40% of the population (and higher percentages in healthcare) choosing not to take the vaccine at this time, we risk losing up to 40% of the healthcare workforce over this issue. We cannot afford this risk during a pandemic and an uncertain delta variant impact on societal health. We must urge and support Ducey to extend his ban on vaccine mandates to hosptials and healthcare education. Ducey needs to be made aware of the risk to the AZ healthcare system. **Path 2: Unionization**: While a formal unionization is not necessarly needed, we need create the same effect and thus must unify under this common cause to generate the political clout needed to force the issue with elected officials (the Governor's office, then later legislatures), and put serious pressure on corporate interests who are running the big pharma and hospital lobbies that have aligned against the people for sake of profit. At one point in history, unions served a valid and noble purpose but since lost their way. Today we see the opportunity for a revival of the original concept and once again start standing for the people. Even some unions of old are understanding this is wrong: https://abc7ny.com/newyork-presbyterian-hospitals-vaccine-mandate-nyc-covid-update/10903483/ The potential of strike or mass exodus is powerful. Many have said they are writing their legislators and elected officials on the issue but this won't be enough. The Legislature is out of session and in session did not have the votes due to a couple cowardly Republicans and ALL the Democrats to address the issue. Let them know what you believe and that you are taking additional action. Our Congressmen are in the minority and there is not path to take action at that level until regaining the Congress in 2022. Let them know what you believe and that you are taking additional action. The Governor has the ability under emergency powers to stop immediately this mandate. There is a valid and compelling concern of putting AZ's capacity to provide healthcare and respond to changes in the pandemic at risk. Let his office know where you stand, express concern over the risk to AZ's healthcare capacity and that you are taking additional action. **TAKE THE ADDITIONAL ACTION**: Start unifying others and informally or formally unionize. As much writing to elected officials is helpful, you need to do ten times this amount in organizing your peers. A unified front of 40% of the workforce cannot be ignored. I'm also quite sure there are vaccinated peers that feel like you do also so don't assume it's a vaccinated vs. unvaccinated issue. Our elected officials are being pressured by big pharma and hospital lobbies with lots of money. We must unite to combat this with numbers and money of our own. Unity, organizing and courage are the keys to this issue. Best regards, Eric Morgan, Chairman Arizona Republican Party, LD-22 bleedred@planetmorgan.net 602.410.7163

Both narratives can not be true, however what they have done is rationalized a general distrust of them and those who are so aggressively promoting the vaccine (even to the point of actions quite reminiscent of nazi germany). The other issue I have with it - and this has ZERO to do with politics - is that, not only do they keep changing their story with respect to efficacy, etc., but the fact is that there is not one person on this planet who has had the vaccine for a year yet. Noone - regardless as to how much education and experience they have in the medicine - can tell you the long-term effects (which could be significant) as this vaccine was rushed through the FDA ‚Äì even FDA panelists admitted this (it technically hasn't even been approved - rather only for emergency purposes, but it has yet to receive actual full FDA approval). I have heard it all before - that the core components of the vaccine have been around for a while, however if it were that simple, then not only would the vaccine have been released much sooner, but it would have also been fully approved by the FDA. However clearly that is not the case, whether it be additional components in the vaccine, or the manner in which the components are mixed, or whatever. AND NOW THE FDA IS GOING TO COURT TO MAKE IT SUCH THAT THEY DON'T RELEASE THEIR FINDINGS ABOUT THE VACCINE TO THE PUBLIC FOR 75 YEARS. Bottom line is that there is a reason why it took as long as it did to come out, why it still has not been fully approved by the FDA (and now I understand that Biden, Fauci and the dems are ""applying pressure"" on the FDA to approve it now, so there goes any credibility given that it has now been politicized). And people have in fact died from the vaccine (not to mention those who took the vaccine but still got sick). Other vaccines (flu, polio, etc.) took years before they were approved for use, as the long-term effects needed to be known. That was not the case here. Bottom line - all ""conspiracy theories"" aside - noone knows the long-term effects of the vaccine (and as an additional factoid, while it is true that incidences of the virus (in both vaccinated and unvaccinated people) are in fact up, as are hospitalizations in some areas, deaths are not ‚Äì and at the end of the day that is the rationale as to whether or not all of our lives should be massively disrupted (or worse). Finally, clearly Biden, Fauci and the rest of the dems don‚Äôt really care about us, or even believe in the ‚Äúscience‚Äù, as if they did the borders would be locked closed and no one would be allowed over the border ‚Äì legally or illegally ‚Äì as was the case during the last administration. It is no coincidence that there is a surge in the virus six months after Biden opened the borders, let millions in illegally (75% of whom actually had the virus), didn‚Äôt bother treating or quarantining them, and then sent them on busses and planes disseminating them throughout the country. And they needed something on which to blame it other than this obvious superspreader event caused by Biden and the dems in which he allows millions in with the virus ‚Äì so they blame it on those who are unvaccinated and the ‚ÄúDelta variant‚Äù, when there isn‚Äôt even a test specifically for the Delta variant. So how could they possibly know that that is it? That is nothing more than speculation and deflection from the real cause of the spread. This is why our current ‚Äúleadership‚Äù must go as soon as humanly possible.

After 18 months of this, the Herald Sun is FINALLY reporting SOME truth now that it has happened to one of their own. Herald Sun journalist, photographer arrested at Melbourne anti-vax protests A journalist and photographer have been arrested at an anti-vax protest in Melbourne in what has been labelled as an ‚Äòappalling misuse of power‚Äô by police. A journalist and photographer have been arrested while reporting on an anti-vaccination protest in Melbourne. Herald Sun reporter Olivia Jenkins and senior photographer Jake Nowakowski were led away by police in handcuffs as anti-vax demonstrators clashed with officers at Fawkner Park on Saturday. It was just one of almost a dozen protests across the nation as hundreds of people marched against mandatory coronavirus vaccinations in the country‚Äôs major cities. Jenkins and Nowakowski were wearing their Herald Sun media accreditation cards and also identified themselves as journalists but were arrested by police anyway. They have also been told they could be issued with a $1652 fine for failing to comply with the chief health officer‚Äôs directions. The pair were caught between a police encirclement ‚Äì a controversial tactic known as ‚Äúkettling‚Äù ‚Äì as officers were clearing protesters from the park. Nowakowski told NCA NewsWire they were allowed to leave the first encirclement but were immediately caught within another cordon with about five protesters. Herald Sun photographer Jake Nowakowski is handcuffed by police at an anti-vax protest on Saturday. Picture: NCA NewsWire/David Geraghty Herald Sun photographer Jake Nowakowski is handcuffed by police at an anti-vax protest on Saturday. Picture: NCA NewsWire/David Geraghty ‚ÄúSpecial operations police started entering the cordon and arresting the protesters and then they arrested us,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúWe were handcuffed and then marched away for processing and told we were going to be fined $1652.‚Äù The pair were both wearing masks and were released after about 10 minutes. Nowakowski said it was the first time he had been arrested while doing his job. ‚ÄúI think it was just unnecessary,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúWe weren‚Äôt given the option to leave that encirclement ‚Äì I don‚Äôt know how we ended up in the second encirclement, it just happened. ‚ÄúPolice have powers of discretion, they can tell the difference between a protester and a journalist and the intentions of an individual. ‚ÄúThey could have just let us off with a warning and said try not to congregate in groups of more than 20 people, which is what the charge was. ‚ÄúIt was obvious that we weren‚Äôt protesting, we were media who found ourselves in the wrong place at the wrong time.‚Äù Nowakowski said there was a lot of anger and abuse from the protesters directed towards the media and TV networks. He said they had also filed a police report after a female protester tried to punch Jenkins because she took offence to her wearing a face mask. Police said 20 people were arrested during the rally with 15 of those to be fined for breaching the chief health officer‚Äôs directions. Another five people were charged on summons for resisting arrest, hindering police and refusing to provide their details. Nowakowski said the support from the Herald Sun had been fantastic and it had taken the issue up with Victoria Police. He said he was confident the fines would be withdrawn. A Victoria Police spokeswoman said they were reviewing body worn camera footage of the incident and would provide a comment once completed. Sunday Herald Sun editor Nick Papps said it was ‚Äúan appalling misuse of power by Victoria Police‚Äù. ‚ÄúOur reporter and photographer were just doing their jobs and made it clear they were members of the press,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúYet they were handcuffed, frogmarched and then issued with notices. ‚ÄúThis is not how democracy operates and this is not how Victoria Police should uphold the right. ‚ÄúWe will be making our views clear to Victoria Police and ensuring we stand up as we always stand up for the freedom of the press.‚Äù Hundreds of protesters turned out for the rally which was dispersed by 3pm. In Sydney, about 400 people protested at Hyde Park, including controversial celebrity chef Pete Evans, who delivered a speech to the crowd. NSW Police said there were no arrests and the crowd dispersed peacefully about 2pm. Protesters also gathered at Brisbane Botanic Gardens before about 1000 people marched through the city‚Äôs streets, which were blocked from Parliament House to Elizabeth Street.

column30: AND NO VACCINE MANDATES AND NO MASK MANDATES. WHAT DO YOU KNOW??? I am not ‚Äúanti-vax‚Äù per se, however what has been admitted even by those on the left who have been pushing so hard to MANDATE it on the entire population (the same people who less than a year ago, before the election, were all saying that they would not trust the vaccine and would advise everyone NOT to get it), is that of those getting sick now, just as many are vaccinated as are unvaccinated. AND 90% OF THOSE HOSPITALIZED WITH THE VIRUS ARE VACCINATED. Even Fauci admitted this. They have a real narrative issue, as just weeks ago they were suggesting that the only people getting sick were unvaccinated, and then one week later they were forced to change their narrative when they told everyone - vaccinated or not - that they had to wear masks again as now (with Delta) even the vaccinated are able to contract and spread the virus - 180 degree turn from one week prior. Both narratives can not be true, however what they have done is rationalized a general distrust of them and those who are so aggressively promoting the vaccine (even to the point of actions quite reminiscent of nazi germany). The other issue I have with it - and this has ZERO to do with politics - is that, not only do they keep changing their story with respect to efficacy, etc., but the fact is that there is not one person on this planet who has had the vaccine for a year yet. Noone - regardless as to how much education and experience they have in the medicine - can tell you the long-term effects (which could be significant) as this vaccine was rushed through the FDA ‚Äì even FDA panelists admitted this (it technically hasn't even been approved - rather only for emergency purposes, but it has yet to receive actual full FDA approval). I have heard it all before - that the core components of the vaccine have been around for a while, however if it were that simple, then not only would the vaccine have been released much sooner, but it would have also been fully approved by the FDA. However clearly that is not the case, whether it be additional components in the vaccine, or the manner in which the components are mixed, or whatever. Bottom line is that there is a reason why it took as long as it did to come out, why it still has not been fully approved by the FDA (and now I understand that Biden, Fauci and the dems are ""applying pressure"" on the FDA to approve it now, so there goes any credibility given that it has now been politicized). And people have in fact died from the vaccine (not to mention those who took the vaccine but still got sick). Other vaccines (flu, polio, etc.) took years before they were approved for use, as the long-term effects needed to be known. That was not the case here. Bottom line - all ""conspiracy theories"" aside - noone knows the long-term effects of the vaccine (and as an additional factoid, while it is true that incidences of the virus (in both vaccinated and unvaccinated people) are in fact up, as are hospitalizations in some areas, deaths are not ‚Äì and at the end of the day that is the rationale as to whether or not all of our lives should be massively disrupted (or worse). Finally, clearly Biden, Fauci and the rest of the dems don‚Äôt really care about us, or even believe in the ‚Äúscience‚Äù, as if they did the borders would be locked closed and no one would be allowed over the border ‚Äì legally or illegally ‚Äì as was the case during the last administration. column35:
I wanted to break down today‚Äôs actions in the legislature since it is now posted.  I am ignoring amendments filed by the minority caucus under the assumption they aren‚Äôt going anywhere, but as you might expect, the Democrats are pushing for renewed eviction moratoriums, lockdowns, statewide mask mandates, and other assorted proposals.

The only thing that passed today was HJR1.  Everything else is pending and you can make calls or send emails if you are concerned.

The Amendments are just proposals and are NOT YET adopted.  If you support any of the amendments, you need to call and email.

1. HJR 1: it extends the emergency for the receipt of federal funds and to extend SB5 immunities for employers until January, 2022, and it extended a bunch of orders that can arguably be described as making life easier (it also indicated that it was ending anything not being extended).  On its face, it‚Äôs not terrible.  I have some concerns, first, and mainly, the Kentucky Supreme Court has left open the door to the constitutionality of SB1‚Äôs 30 day limitation in Cameron v. Beshear.  What happens when (not if) the Franklin Circuit Court finds that portion of SB1 unconstitutional?  

Clearly the GA can terminate the emergency (and previously did so), but now it is has been extended (albeit for limited purposes).  What does that mean with the remand to the Franklin Circuit Court?  That is the issue and I have concerns that this may have opened the door to more nonsense.  I would not blame the General Assembly for this, except for the fact that it is wholly predictable at this point.  

I have some other legal concerns that might be opened up by this, but know that the Governor‚Äôs staff monitors my Facebook and honestly I don‚Äôt want to give them any ideas.  The last part of this, the Senate Bill 5 extension of immunity, related to covid-19, does that mean no one can sue an employer or business that discriminates based on non vaccination or for vaccine mandates?  Possibly.

(Links to the votes and bill below).

2. Senate Bill 1/House Bill 1: the education bill (identical bill in both chambers).  

-It does away with the face masking regulations for child care and schools (leaving it to local control), but honestly it lets CHFS and KDE put the regulations right back on if they are not the same, or ‚Äúsubstantially the same‚Äù as existing regulations.  If you have been paying attention to the Governor‚Äôs face masking orders and regulations the last year, he has been changing the regulations up by adding and tweaking exceptions.  This will get abused by the executive branch as written and the mandates are coming back.  

-It also allows up to 20 additional NTI days (plus the 10 already there), but doesn‚Äôt say when they get used, and my concern is this ends up being a month and a half of NTI (6 school weeks).  

-And it has a provision that appears to encourage discrimination against the non vaccinated in Section 4: ‚ÄúThe model plan shall provide guidance for contact tracing and quarantining based on whether or not exposed individuals were masked, non-masked, or fully vaccinated.‚Äù

-It has a vaccine prize/bribe provision that concerns me in section 7.  ‚ÄúIncentives may include but are not limited to cash and other prizes, food, gift cards, prize drawings, coupons, and school activity passes.‚Äù

*Senator Castlen introduced a amendment that prohibits local school districts from mask mandating the kids and removes the vax bribe provision.

* Representative Rabourn introduced a series of amendments that (1) prevents local school vaccine mandates and removes the vax bribe provision, (2) closes the giant loophole on CHFS and KDE reimposing daycare or school mask mandates, (3) prohibits discrimination in schools towards vaccination status, and (4) invalidates a KDE teacher leave regulation that has been used to give teachers 10 days paid leave everytime they get anywhere close to someone who has been arguably exposed with covid, but permits leave if a staff member tests positive.

I‚Äôm not sure about this, especially the 6 weeks of total NTI, but it looks much better with the Castlen and Rabourn amendments.

(Links below)

3. SB2/HB2/SB6: deals with health issues.  Requires CHFS to issue regulations so that a designated family member can visit someone in a nursing homes.  Creates monoclonal antibody treatment centers in each area development district for those 12 years old and older.  Funds and gives out a bunch of free covid antibody tests to clinics, hospitals, health departments and jails.  Funds and creates a program for advertisements for the vaccine at colleges and universities.  Invalidates the prior statewide mask mandate (but suffers the same loophole with ‚Äúsubstantially the same‚Äù language that the daycare and education regulation bills do).

* Representative Baker introduced an amendment that prohibits CHFS from discriminating on visitation based on vaccination status, allows monoclonal antibody treatment for those under 12 (truncated)

Study from California (Preprint) Jan 11, 2022 University of California, Berkeley Kaiser Permanente Center for Disease Control (CDC) Methods ‚ÄúWe analysed clinical and epidemiologic data from cases testing positive for SARS-CoV-2 infection within the Kaiser Permanente Southern California healthcare system from November 30, 2021, to January 1, 2022, using S gene target failure (SGTF) as assessed by the ThermoFisher TaqPath ComboKit assay as a proxy for Omicron infection.‚Äù The ‚Äòsample size‚Äô for the study was around 17,000 DELTA cases versus around 53,000 OMICRON. In the illustration from a table in the study document, the first column is Delta cases hospitalized per 1,000 people, and the second column is Omicron cases hospitalized per 1,000 people. What I found interesting is that in the UNVAXXED with OMICRON, 2.2 people per thousand had to be hospitalized (31 out of 13,848 unvaxxed people), and of the people with THREE doses of vax, 1.9 people per thousand had to be hospitalized (13 out of 6,993 triple-vaxxed people). So, the ‚Äògovernment narrative‚Äô that getting vaxxed will reduce hospitalizations of people with Omicron is discredited by this study. Why are they pressing for Covid vaccinations and persecuting the unvaxxed, we wonder? (I‚Äôll post Dr. Mobeen Syed reviewing the study separately, so you can see for yourself.)

column30: TOLEDO, Ohio ‚Äî An Amazon delivery driver is Ohio's second $1 million Vax-a-Million winner. Jonathan Carlyle, of Toledo, is the second Ohioan to win the state's vaccination incentive grand prize. The state's newest millionaire is an Amazon delivery driver. Carlyle said he was just getting off work around 7 p.m. when he received a call from Ohio Gov. Mike DeWine. ""I actually missed the call,"" Carlyle said Wednesday evening. ""I was checking out from work and had to call him back. But I was shaking when I talked to him, when I heard his voicemail -- I knew what it was and about lost it."" The governor said he plans to make a habit of calling the state's Vax-a-Million winners ahead of each Wednesday's 7:29 p.m. drawing. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs overwhelming. I don‚Äôt know what to do. I‚Äôm still dreaming,"" Carlyle said of that call. The Toledo man said he doesn't have any big plans for his new money -- first pay off bills, then, perhaps, a house. ""I got a lot of bills to pay ‚Äì so that‚Äôs the first thing that‚Äôs going to happen,‚Äù he said through a massive smile. ‚ÄúPay some bills and probably buy a house. I‚Äôm going to keep working. My girlfriend is going to keep working ‚Äì it‚Äôs going to be a good bedrock for our family. It‚Äôs going to be awesome.‚Äù Carlyle said the state's Vax-a-Million drawing actually inspired him to finally get the COVID-19 vaccine. After winning $1 million, he said it was well worth it.
