column30: THE REAL REASON BEHIND THOSE LABELS This applies to lots of things in today's mediascape....not just vaccines (and I'm neither pro- nor anti-vax....I believe in freedom & common-sense. Spelling is distorted in some cases to avoid F-book fascists. First, a little free translation from someone who speaks the language. (I've written thousands of news articles and straight-to-air press releases). ""There is no evidence"" What it means: ‚úì The press release said there was no evidence. ‚úì We did not G00gle for evidence. ‚úì Even if we did G00gle for evidence, the results would be skewed to say there is no evidence. What it does NOT mean: Anything. ""Insufficient data"" What it means: ‚úì No one has sent us a press release about research Big Harma funded (because they fund nearly all medical research). What it does NOT mean: - We searched for data. - No data exists. - The drug is harmful when used as prescribed. - Anything else. ""Partly false information"" What it means: ‚úì The information is essentially true, otherwise, we would label it FALSE. But we can't, so assume it's mostly true. ‚úì Someone, somewhere (usually someone with a record of partisan activism) disputes something about it. What it does NOT mean: - The information is incorrect or false. - We have any information that proves anything else. ""Hospitals overrun with patients who used..."" What it means: ‚úì The wire or press release said hospitals are overrun. ‚úì Someone heard (or imagined) someone went to a hospital with nausea and diarrhea after using the animal version, without a doctor's advice. ‚úì Someone copied and pasted the warnings on the horse paste label. What it does NOT mean: - We spoke with several hospitals that said they were overrun. - Anyone was ever hospitalized as a result of using the drug as prescribed. ""Uptick in calls to Poison Control"" What it means: ‚úì The wire or press release said there was an uptick in calls to poison control. ‚úì Someone heard (or imagined) someone called poison control after the worst possible abuse of the animal version of the substance, outside of a doctor's advice. ‚úì Someone copied and pasted the warnings on the horse paste label. What it does NOT mean: - We called Poison Control for current data and compared it against previous years for context and perspective. - Anyone who used the drug as prescribed ever called Poison Control. - The drug is harmful when used as prescribed. I could slap a warning on every article you could ever post, because literally every statement can be made controversial if someone wants to dispute it. Make no mistake, these ""fa¬¢t ¬¢he¬¢ks"" and warnings are not designed to inform. They're designed to further divide. They know at least 85 percent of people will never click on the link, let alone read all those words. People certainly won't open the internal links to verify the author's sources. To save you some time, the rote fa¬¢t ¬¢he¬¢k formula goes a little something like, ""No evidence of yada yada... Insufficient data to yada yada... [dire overdose warning copied and pasted from product literature]... 'Health experts' (go to Open Secrets dot org and note where their 'experts' donate) say yada yada... "" with links to articles from partisan hacks making the same hollow claims (The Fa¬¢t ‚Ç¨he¬¢k Circle J*erk). Those ""independent"" articles are created for two purposes: 1) Damage the image of the perpetrator who dared share the ""misinformation"", and 2) Give the woke masses ""credible"" ammunition. The labels are part of a Social Credits system that staunches critical thinking, bullies thinkers to comply, and gives woke activists the moral authority to segregate and discriminate at will. Just ask Candace Owens, who was just denied medical diagnostics because her online reputation marks her as a ""dangerous spreader of misinformation"". How do you even begin to fight that kind of blatant discrimination? Every time a warning gets slapped on one of our posts, our digital reputation is damaged, and others gain the right to single us out. Even after the label is debunked, the hit to our reputation remains. Bunter Hiden's |apt0p? The first plague treatment - H C Q - Big Harma destroyed through its corrupt media and tech co-conspirators? Both proved true after the massive conspiracies to cover them up. Before you get all comfy believing you're safe, because they're only going after crazy conservatives who probably deserve it, you should know that they're not targeting conservatives. They're targeting anyone who shares truth. Robert F. Kennedy, Jr., Joe Rogan, former NY Times science reporter, Alex Berenson, are just a few of the non conservatives being techxecuted for speaking truth. Just for grins, compare a G00gle search of RFK's name with Yandex and Duck Duck Go searches and see what you learn. G666 showers you with trash depicting RFK as an unhinged zealot, while the others reflect his achievements and values. If a liberal Kennedy can be destroyed for sharing his beliefs, where does that leave the rest (truncated)

column30: The U.K. is a little bit ahead of us...but things are starting to turn around for Canada as well (GO TRUCKERS!!). Those of us who've been talking about the abuses from government are a little shell-shocked at this stage--mostly from having been smacked around by our fellow citizens who don't seem to be aware of all the dangers. This article is a reminder that we who have been pointing to the uncomfortable things should not relax once the vax-pushing government has backed-off on mandates and social restrictions. There's been huge damage done to the economy and society, and the effects will be felt for many, many years. For one thing, trust in our institutions--not only government, but physicians and the medical establishment--is fractured, and I'm not sure we can jerry-rig them back into something resembling their former state of respectability. In any case, as this article from the U.K. says, we need to stay vigilant for further assaults on us in our present, weakened state. Excerpts... ‚ÄúFor the last two years, the narrative ‚Äì dutifully promoted on behalf of the emergent bio-security state by its media propagandists ‚Äì has gone something like this: Covid-19 is the deadliest pandemic since Spanish Flu; mass vaccination is the only way out; masks, lockdowns, quarantines, the destruction of jobs and businesses, the extra deaths from suicide and untreated cancer are an acceptable price to pay for this war-like disaster scenario; anyone who complains or resists is a granny killer. ‚ÄúNow, with a swiftness and insouciance which beggars belief, this narrative has shifted in the space of a week to: whoops, that was all a bit silly, wasn‚Äôt it? Still, no harm done; lessons will be learned, probably, sometime; now we can just carry on as normal. ‚ÄúThis sudden shift is wrong and dangerous for a number of reasons. One, obviously, is that it risks letting all the guilty parties off the hook. The media institutions which allowed themselves to be bribed and corrupted by Bill Gates‚Äôs money and government handouts; the journalists who didn‚Äôt ask questions; the medics who broke the Hippocratic oath; the scientists who lied; the politicians who did what they were told by the CCP-controlled World Health Organisation and the sinister Klaus Schwab‚Äôs World Economic Forum; the police who enthusiastically enforced this incipient fascism; the courts which kept taking the government‚Äôs side; the list goes on and on. None of the people and institutions responsible for the nightmare of the last two years can be allowed to get away with it. Justice demands it; and besides, if they‚Äôre not punished now they‚Äôll only go and do it all over again. ‚ÄúBut the bigger issue is this: what we are experiencing now is a false dawn. All those mainstream media types who misled you during the ‚Äòpandemic‚Äô are now misleading you about the aftermath. They are making out that our nightmare is over when, in reality, it‚Äôs only just beginning. This may not be understood by the ordinary folk ‚Äì ‚Äòthe Normies‚Äô ‚Äì who still get their information from the BBC or their daily paper. But it‚Äôs certainly well understood by those of us who have been right all along, the ‚Äòconspiracy theorists‚Äô. ‚ÄúThe reason we conspiracy theorists have been right all along is that we don‚Äôt believe that what just happened was a cock-up or a bizarre outbreak of madness which we are now happily over. Rather, we understand that the Plandemic was a means to an end. A viral outbreak no worse than you‚Äôd find in a baddish flu year was, at the behest of a sinister cabal of vested interests, distorted, misrepresented and abused to achieve a number of dubious purposes: flogging dodgy vaccines on an unprecedented scale; restricting freedoms; divide and rule; paving the way for health passports, Central Bank digital currencies and a Chinese-style social credit system, and quite possibly depopulation. ‚ÄúNone of the problems created by the grotesque abuse of state power over the past two years has been resolved: the lost education; the brainwashing and terrorising of the populace; the defunct businesses; the lives destroyed; the lives yet to be destroyed by the experimental gene therapy of those emergency-authorised, still-only-in-their-trial-phase ‚Äòvaccines‚Äô . . . ‚ÄúThe worst, though, is yet to come.‚Äù

‚≠êÔ∏èThis year our fundraiser is even more dear to us! ‚≠êÔ∏èWe will be donating all of the proceeds and collecting donations for the Shaffer Family. Donna Shaffer is 16 years old and a Junior at Surprise Valley High School in Cedarville. Donna received a Pfizer vaccination on June 16th of this year. Five days later she started having seizures. column30: Copied from a friend: At the height of COVID, the rolling average of deaths, per day, was 4000. Today, the government and the media are trying to convince you that another COVID disaster is befalling us and that we need to reinstitute draconian measures. Allow me to give you but one example of why this is false: In LA County, which has reimposed mask mandates, there are 10M humans. At the height of COVID, they were diagnosing 20K cases a day. Today, they are diagnosing 10K a week. That's less than 10% of the height. That doesn't seem like an inter-galactic level crisis, to me. Now you know that diagnosing is one thing, dying or going to the hospital is another. Since most older or at-risk people have been vaccinated, they aren't mentioning death rates: Because people aren't dying in large numbers. In LA County, the number of people dying per week of COVID is 6. That's what I said; SIX. Nationwide, 4K death a day period at peak. Today? 350 a day. The people who are getting COVID now are young and surviving. The at-risk people already got the vax. And as far as ""breakthru"" cases, not even sure why they're mentioned, since NO ONE goes to the hospital for them. Back to 350 deaths per day, today, from COVID...which is apparently so severe that entire states are toying with going back to all hands mask mandates....more people die every day from Altzheimers, or Diabetes, or ACCIDENTS. 2000 per day from heart disease. 2000 from cancer. I mean be serious, there are 350M Americans. And what about your kids? What about this MANIA to get them vaccinated? Guess what? There are 75M persons in the US under the age of 20. How many have died from COVID? 335. That's right, THREE HUNDRED AND THIRTY-FIVE. How many have died from pneumonia during the same period? 809. I said Eight hundred and nine. Where is the pneumonia panice. Where is the 24/7/365 flu masking mandate? So, you may well ask yourself - and you should ask yourself - why this panic? First, let me say that I'm vaccinated. I think we should all get vaccinated. It works. Having said that, I think people have agency. If you don't want to get vaccinated, that's on you. I'm vaccinated. No government should tell me that I have to wear a mask to protect...what? I don't carry COVID...I had the shot. Who am I protecting? From what? People who haven't been vaccinated get COVID from OTHER non vaccinated persons. That's on them. Not me. I got my shot. I think you should get the shot, but you're free to choose. So why aren't people getting shots? The ""story"" is that it's only Republicans, driven by Trump, who aren't getting shots. That's silly. If you break down things differently, you see that Asians are the most vaccinated. Whites second, Hispanics third, and Blacks, fourth. It's not Republicans who are thwarting Old Joe from his 70% by the Fourth of July. It's Blacks and Hispanics. So why isn't the media hammering them? Why is the constant cry, ""Republicans are not getting the shot"". Folks, the reasons are several: First, things aren't going well for Joe, and by blowing up COVID - and blaming Trump - Joe can keep peoples' eyes off inflation, the border, Iran plotting to kidnap Americans, and crazy Democratic bids for absolute power in the Legislature. Second, by having a crisis, it allows the government to take more control of your lives. It allows Joe to blow out spending at heretofore unimagined levels, paying for every Leftist wet dream, wrecking the economy in the long run (in the later years of this budget growth drops to and stays at 1.8%, which will wreck your ability to retire). ""Don't look at what's in this hand...look at the COVID in THIS hand."" Third, the Left in the form of the media and the government is making a full-blown effort to suppress any messages from the right. By blaming Republicans for ""misinformation"" on COVID...for antivax messages...they are attempting to use this as a hammer to shut down anything that disagrees with their agenda. This ""Facebook is killing people, man,"" shite? They want FACEBOOK to strangle messages which disagree with the Leftist message agenda. Fourth, for Democrats, Black people have no agency. They cannot be held responsible for anything. We cannot say, ""well, if only Black people would get on the stick...."" But Republicans? Easy. Folks, Facebook is a ""platform,"" just...like...AT&T. If nuts discuss Q Anon on their phone lines, the govt doesn't say, ""we need to shut down the telephone!' Same with Facebook. It's a platform. It's not their job to moderate content. That's why they're not subject to lawsuits. They are NOT responsible for the content, and they are NOT allowed to curate content (within some very specific limits). WHEN THE GOVERNMENT tells FB that they have to start filtering content, then FB becomes an extension of the USG, and they violate the first amendment, which specifically prohibits the USG from abridging free speech. See the problem, here? COVID is being made into a new catastrophe to keep your (truncated)

column34: This is a re-share of a post
column35:
I am sometimes critical of the Kentucky General Assembly -- that they have not gone far enough on important issues (reigning in the Governor, reopening businesses, vax mandates, mask mandates in schools, impeachment, etc).  

But for the past two weeks, we have been diligently working on a brief in the Kentucky Supreme Court, defending the Boone Circuit Court order (it is due tomorrow), that fundamentally is about the things they did do.  In 2021, they limited the Governor's orders to 30 days (and prevented new orders based on the same or similar circumstances) (SB1/SB2), kept him from being able to suspend statutes without the Attorney General's consent (SB1), and gave businesses an opportunity to prepare plans to have immunity from enforcement (HB1).  They went further: they ended all mandates effective 6/30 by ending the declaration of emergency (HJR 77), and they put a provision in the budget that defunded COVID-19 enforcement, utilizing the power of the purse.

Those measures were why we ultimately were able to go into the Boone Circuit Court, and obtain a statewide injunction to require the Governor to comply with these enactments.  Those measures (and the court order that implements and enforces it) are why the state is not in a full blown Governor winner and loser picking lockdown again (or maybe more state police sent to churches).

In many respects, while the General Assembly may not be as bold or liberty-oriented as I would like at times, they are better than probably 40 other state legislatures that have not taken such measures, at least on these issues.  And this is a post about my thanks for (the majority of) them doing so.  Because honestly, we would be in another insane lockdown if not for this legislation.

The federal regulations‚Äîwhich are currently being reviewed by the Supreme Court of the United States‚Äîare intended to help protect more people from the worst of COVID, particularly as the Omicron variant rages across the commonwealth. A Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) matter, up until now the federal judge followed the calls for opaqueness, by ensuring comprehensive access to the Pfizer FDA application data at a snail‚Äôs pace‚Äî500 pages per month would make the entire trove available in 55 years. ‚ÄúThen, after a back and forth in court, the FDA added insult to injury by proposing to extend the full download of the Pfizer data to 75 years. ‚ÄúRepresenting the Public Health and Medical Professionals for Transparency (PHMPT), attorney Siri at first sought to secure the entire batch of data within 108 days, which just so happens to be the amount of time it took for the Gold Standard regulatory agency to review and approve Pfizer‚Äôs vaccine. ‚ÄúAs TrialSite‚Äôs Sonia Elijah has uncovered, numerous concerns were raised after review of just one currently available set of Pfizer vaccine safety documents. ‚ÄúNow, the attorney reports the federal judge rejected the FDA‚Äôs latest aggressive moves for unacceptable opacity‚Äîthe court has more closely aligned with Siri‚Äôs clients and compelled the regulatory agency to now accelerate the data transfer‚Äîfrom 500 pages per month to 55,000 pages per month! column30: Defence has quietly signed over the storage of its secrets to a Chinese-owned company, prompting fears valuable restricted details of our military‚Äôs inner workings could now be accessed by the foreign power. For years, data storage firm Global Switch has been tasked with storing the nation‚Äôs military secrets at facilities in Ultimo in inner Sydney, but that was to change when in 2016 the London-based parent company Aldersgate Investments sold a 49 per cent stake to a Chinese data tech consortium. Defence‚Äôs contract with Global Switch was due to expire in October last year but in a new contract tendered to federal parliament on Tuesday, it was revealed that contract was instead extended until September 2025. The quiet re-signing came at a cost of $53.5 million, about $250,000 over the original quote. This was despite the then treasurer and now Prime Minister Scott Morrison in 2016 ordering all the sensitive data be moved out of the Ultimo warehouse facility by the end of 2020. Bob Katter tabled a motion with parliament to terminate all contracts with foreign owned external data storage centres today, notably the Chinese owned facility Global Switch. Picture: NCA NewsWire/Gary Ramage Bob Katter tabled a motion with parliament to terminate all contracts with foreign owned external data storage centres today, notably the Chinese owned facility Global Switch. Picture: NCA NewsWire/Gary Ramage It is understood the storage warehouse has an Australian Signals Directorate-accredited gateway to allow secure access by Defence staff to stored data of protected and restricted level documents. These could include sensitive data such as be departmental personnel files, commercial-in-confidence contracts, defence decision making notes. Mr Morrison on Tuesday told parliament he was more comfortable with the contract now given some of the more sensitive documents were removed from Global Switch to a purpose built facility and that ‚ÄúDefence is now progressing work consistent with this strategy to migrate less sensitive and unclassified data assets to an alternative data centre.‚Äù But leading security expert Peter Jennings from the Australian Strategic Policy Institute has questioned whether this was good enough and said there were concerns as far back as 2016 the data could be remotely accessed by a ‚Äúhostile actor‚Äù. FROM OUR PARTNERS The shocking truth behind the anti-vax campaign. Big Shots: Anti-Vaxxers Exposed. 23 February at 8pm AEDT, Sky News. ‚ÄúSome mitigation is possible, tapping into government information being the owner of a data system is a great way to start you on that journey,‚Äù Mr Jennings told News Corp Australia. ‚ÄúFrankly we know they are interested in this stuff because they work on systems they don‚Äôt own to aggressively try and get information,‚Äù Mr Jennings said. Prime Minister Scott Morrison said Defence was working to migrate less sensitive and unclassified data to an alternative data centre. Picture: NCA NewsWire/Gary Ramage Prime Minister Scott Morrison said Defence was working to migrate less sensitive and unclassified data to an alternative data centre. Picture: NCA NewsWire/Gary Ramage A notice of motion tabled with parliament by Queensland MP Bob Katter and former Army officer and independent federal MP Andrew Wilkie has called on the government to immediately terminate all data storage contracts held with foreign-owned entities. ‚ÄúWhat is the point of having a defence system when a military 100 times larger than ours knows where all your defence assets are?‚Äù Mr Katter said. It is understood Defence is not the only agency to store its sensitive documents and online gateway access to files with Global Switch, with the Australian Taxation Office and the Australian Securities and Investments Commission also having their files there, although both are in advanced processes of moving them out. Global Switch has previously said its files and customers were held at the highest security levels with shareholders restricted from physical access to its centres. More Coverage Australia lashes China, WHO: ‚ÄòOur beef didn‚Äôt cause COVID‚Äô Aldersgate Investments accepted $4 billion in cash to sell its stake to Chinese consortium Elegant Jubilee, brought together by a China-owned data storage network, in a move which caused concerns at the time in the British parliament. Last night a Defence Department spokesman confirmed Defence would retain full operational control of its data halls within the Ultimo data centre until full migration of the data by 2025.

From The Lincoln Project August 17, 2021 Last week we released our ad ‚ÄúBack to School‚Äù calling out Texas Gov. Greg Abbott and Florida Governor Ron DeSantis for endangering the lives of school children with their anti-vax, anti-mask COVID conspiracies. Since then, you‚Äôd like to think they figured it out and decided to put our kids‚Äô safety before their partisan propaganda campaign. Remember this? ‚ÄúFlorida got it right, and the lockdown states got it wrong.‚Äù Yeah, right. They doubled down. You already know Abbott immediately rallied his team of mob-mouthpieces to attack the Lincoln Project and fundraise off our ad. Ron DeSantis? Still spewing lies while Floridians die, and now he‚Äôs facing the heat. 5,600 kids in Tampa are quarantined right now. It‚Äôs an entire district. Rates are soaring. DeSantis is still putting the talking points of Trump loyalists and far-right talking heads before the needs of Floridians. He‚Äôs met with Sean Hannity more times this term than he‚Äôs met with his own Lieutenant Governor. He‚Äôs held multiple meetings with Tucker Carlson, Laura Ingraham, and Hannity before he‚Äôs had one meeting with Florida‚Äôs top public health official. You know how Fox News keeps having people on saying ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not a doctor, but‚Ä¶ (insert anti-vax garbage)‚Äù... well, we‚Äôre not doctors either, but Fox News is killing people. And while DeSantis is going to war to prevent Florida‚Äôs public schools from instituting mask mandates that we know save lives, the school where he sent his own kids, of course, has a mask mandate. This hypocrisy is now the platform of the new ‚ÄúGOP.‚Äù It‚Äôs more of the same. Secretly vaccinated Republican Congresspeople applauding low vaccination rates. Sowing distrust in health officials and chaos in our emergency rooms. Endangering lives of everyday American children while their own families skirt the risk in fancy private schools. While DeSantis is campaigning to be our next American dictator, Floridians are dying. And we‚Äôre not going to take it lying down. Watch our ad and share it widely, so we can get it in front of the voters who matter. The GOP is no longer a ‚ÄúParty.‚Äù This is no longer about politics. It‚Äôs about life and death and democracy and authoritarianism. ‚Äì The Lincoln Project

SECRET PROVISION: BIDEN‚ÄôS VAX MANDATE TO BE ENFORCED BY FINING COMPANIES $70,000 TO $700,000. This is the headline of an article in Forbes. Pelosi quietly tucked these massive fines Per Worker Violation into the Reconciliation Bill. (pages cited in article) OSHA standards would be changed to make employers test workers or require vax. It would surely bankrupt small companies and require enormous compliance departments in large companies. My suggestion, Move all Dems to Vermont. Have them live under this bill and then report back to us. (The author, Andrzejewski, is a highly regarded economist for Forbes.) Once again, it proves the hatred of Democrats for businesses in their quest for socialism.

Here‚Äôs an indisputable FACT: THERE IS NO LONG-TERM SAFETY DATA. We all know that, and yet these writers keep saying that the injections are ‚Äòsafe and effective‚Äô. SAFE? Nobody knows that. EFFECTIVE? There‚Äôs zero protection for the double-vaxxed against Omicron, and minimal, TEMPORARY protection (supposedly) for the triple-vaxxed. When you‚Äôve been keeping up with the studies and medical literature, it‚Äôs annoying to have to read such tripe by journalists. Even a Queen‚Äôs University professor wrote similar nonsense the other day in a published article. Again, he could see the violations of rights and freedoms, and knew it for an evil thing, but still didn‚Äôt ‚Äòget it‚Äô why people would not take an injection of an experimental gene-therapy that had never been used in humans before. It was more understandable for people to take these injections when the virus variant in circulation was more lethal, and closer to the original virus for which they were designed back in 2020. Times have changed radically with Omicron, and the injections emphatically do not make sense at the moment‚Äîgiven the potential risks to future health, not to mention the possibility of serious near-term injury. The new, mild form of the disease is not worth taking a gamble with the vaxxes, unless your general health is seriously compromised with comorbidities (and maybe not even then). Maybe these writers are right that people are frustrated with those resisting the injections, but that does not change the fact that the frustration makes no sense to anyone who has been keeping informed on the latest medical findings. This writer says: ‚ÄúIt is true that if at least some of the unvaccinated could be persuaded to get their shots, there would be less strain on Canada‚Äôs hospitals. Those with two doses of vaccine are at least 80 per cent less likely to be hospitalized for COVID-19 compared to the unvaccinated, and at least 90 per cent less likely to end up in ICU, according to recent data from Ontario.‚Äù Where is he getting that? Currently in Ontario there are 2,050 FULLY-vaxxed people hospitalized for Covid, and 739 UN-vaxxed. And, okay, you can argue that there are more vaxxed than unvaxxed in the general population, but WHY ARE THE FULLY VAXXED THERE AT ALL? And as for the ICU, it‚Äôs practically an even split at the moment, with 196 fully-vaxxed versus 195 un-vaxxed. The vax ‚Äòprotects against serious illness‚Äô does it? We cannot, of course, know the specifics of the general health of any of these people, but the numbers raise questions. I do not believe this writer‚Äôs assertion that the vaxxed are less likely to be hospitalized because they are somehow protected by their injections. If anyone wants to weigh-in on this, be my guest. Further excerpts‚Ä¶ ‚ÄúThis is no small matter. Section 7 of the charter guarantees that everyone in Canada ‚Äúhas the right to life, liberty and security of the person,‚Äù which ensures that individuals have the right to decline medical interventions. The Supreme Court has repeatedly recognized the ‚Äútenacious relevance in our legal system of the principle that competent individuals are ‚Äî and should be ‚Äî free to make decisions about their bodily integrity.‚Äù ‚ÄúThe precedent that the government can make medical choices for individuals is not one that should be set. It is alarming that this is even being considered. ‚ÄúAs recent as last May, Trudeau still seemed to hold some respect for people‚Äôs rights. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre not a country that makes vaccination mandatory,‚Äù he said after listing off reasons why people might refuse. It was only when the prime minister thought he could gain political advantage that he reversed his opinion, announcing a plan to require federal public servants and those in the transportation sector be vaccinated, just ahead of this fall‚Äôs election. ‚ÄúTrudeau‚Äôs choice to pretend the charter doesn‚Äôt exist isn‚Äôt borne from a practical assessment of what is needed to end the pandemic. It is driven purely by politics.‚Äù

column30: Saw a discussion between a friend and a pro-vax person who was happy with the mandates, apparently, and blindly trusting of the pharmaceutical companies and the government. His friends piled-on, clamouring to reinforce their media programming. Going counter to the media narrative that they‚Äôd all adopted without question just attracts hostility and abuse, and his friends were quite rude. Still, the psychologists tell us that we have to try, futile though the effort be. The fellow said this: ‚ÄúI'm fully vaccinated and I will have my booster. No, I don't know ""what's in it"". Neither this vaccine or the ones I had as a child. Nor do I know what's in the 11 secret herbs and spices at KFC. I also don't know exactly what's in Ibuprofen or any other painkiller-- they just treat my headaches & my pains.‚Äù In other words, he knows nothing, and he doesn‚Äôt want to know. It‚Äôs not even so much that he‚Äôs totally ignorant about the injections‚Äînone of us knows exactly what‚Äôs in them--but it‚Äôs easy to find out how they function, and to discover that they‚Äôre totally new, with no established long-term safety data. He said: I'm vaccinated. Not because I‚Äôm a sheep or to please the government. But I don't want to: * die from Covid-19 * clutter a hospital bed if I get sick * not be able to hug my loved ones * not be able to travel & enjoy events * live my life in fear His first reason, not wanting to die from Covid, is a small risk for a healthy young-ish person (which he appears to be) and that risk is getting smaller with the mild, Omicron variant. His second reason doesn‚Äôt really work, either, considering that the Omicron variant‚Äôs symptoms are similar to the common cold, and have been shown not to affect the lungs and require hospitalization. The third and fourth reasons have to do with GOVERNMENT RESTRICTIONS. He was signalling that he was ready to trade getting vaccinated in return for his rights and freedoms being restored by the government. Extortion appears to work well where he‚Äôs concerned. Funny thing is, those restrictions have not gone away completely, and are always standing by for reinstatement at the government‚Äôs whim. He hasn‚Äôt thought this through‚Ä¶does he want to show his ‚Äòpapers‚Äô everywhere he goes, forevermore? The gov‚Äôt will not stop without mass opposition. The fifth one, well, he‚Äôs scared and thinks that the vaccine is going to save him. He thinks he‚Äôs in danger (I‚Äôm guessing him to be around 35 ‚Äì 40 years old, and he looks pretty healthy). None of his reasons makes any sense. They‚Äôre all derived from media hype and brainwashing. The problem is that we‚Äôre never going to get our rights restored and get back to normal as long as people like him (he can deny being a sheep all he likes, the evidence shows otherwise) continue to implicitly support restrictions and mandates. This article describes the phenomenon very well. Excerpts... ‚ÄúA mass psychosis prevails, triggered by the coronavirus pandemic. Why else are normal people behaving like drugged-up zombies, denying facts and failing to respond to solid information? ‚ÄúThis phenomenon is not new. In fact, it is predictable. If a society is characterised by certain factors, a mass psychosis will most likely break out and manifest itself in predictable patterns. ‚ÄúAbove all, the scaremongering of the media, authorities and politicians has left people frightened out of their wits, and terrified people do not think rationally. In a short time, the firm conviction spread that you either accept the experimental jabs, without you or the administering nurse knowing what is in them, or you die from Covid-19.‚Äù ‚ÄúThe media play a crucial role in the emergence and perpetuation of a mass movement. Without their involvement, it is not possible to create mass psychosis on the scale that we are seeing now, which has almost no precedent in history. This mass psychosis is global. ‚ÄúJournalists have dropped all previous restraints and are engaging in pure propaganda. No one who does not represent the mainstream narrative is allowed to speak. There is no questioning or debate. ‚ÄúA mass psychosis monopolises your attention so powerfully that you can take everything away from people, and they won‚Äôt even notice. That‚Äôs exactly what‚Äôs going on right now. People are being deprived of their freedom, and few are protesting, because they don‚Äôt see what‚Äôs happening. ‚ÄúAnother consequence is that people caught up in mass psychosis show deep intolerance for dissenting voices. If someone suggests that the public narrative is false, this threatens to trigger awareness, and those caught up in the mass psychosis become angry at being cast back into their original anxiety and discontent. So they direct deep aggression at voices that express dissenting views.‚Äù

column30: Dear fellow Conservatives, With the outlook very bright for us in 2022, I believe we need to prepare for a ""Red Wave"" and subsequent control of governing bodies, local, state and federal. This preparation must include building a bedrock foundation in traditional values, in our Constitution and most importantly in morality. We must operate government which is biased towards freedom and not power. Make day to day decisions using commonsense. Live as cleanly and as morally as we possibly can. Learn to love our constituents and serve their needs, not ours, which is the ""golden rule"". Be transparent, meet regularly with constituents, attend any and all community events. Become the embodiment of those we serve. We've seen careers ended, lives ruined because of the nihilism rampant in the world roadway. Our country is full of people who are now thinking another Civil War may be possible! We can return to ""normalcy"" in a much more profound way than ending mask and vax mandates! If you need to reinforce your intellectual basis read the speeches of Ronald Reagan, any books by Bill Bennet, William F. Buckley and ""Mere Christianity"" by C.S. Lewis. To understand the tricks the Left will play in order to drag you down, read ""Rules for Radicals"" by Saul Alinsky. If we can do these things, some profound, some simple but all essential, we will see the beginning of an American renewal and another American Century. In God We Trust, Mark Steven Zuelke

H. R. 550, the government would provide $400 million in taxpayer dollars to fund ‚Äúimmunization system data modernization and expansion,‚Äù a system otherwise defined as ‚Äúa confidential, population-based, computerized database that records immunization doses administered by any health care provider to persons within the geographic area covered by that database.‚Äù The legislation paves the way for the government to give blue states millions in taxpayers funds to enforce vaccine mandates. According to the bill‚Äôs text, the government could award grants and cooperative agreements to health departments or other local governmental entities for agreeing to adopt the new data collection guidelines set by the CDC. Ohio is still losing approximately 100 Ohioans a week to #COVID19, and deaths are shifting to a younger age group. During the winter surge, more than half of the people who died were 80 or older. column34: Tim Herode For Governor
column35:
California has a serious election integrity problem.  10's of thousands more people are registered to vote, than the actual number of eligible adults in the state.  That's a massive systemic election fraud problem & it has to be fixed.  

Thousands of illegal immigrants have been sent voter registration forms with their CA Driver License renewals.  Does Newsom or the Secretary of State know how many people who aren't here legally, are registered to vote and actively participate in our elections?  The answer is Gavin doesn't know, but he's fine with any level of election fraud that he and other Leftists believe will help them stay in power.  

The fraud has to stop, but I can't stop it alone.  I need your support to become CA's next governor, so we can work together, pressure the CA Secretary of State and pressure local county election officials to audit their voter rolls and remove anyone who's not an eligible U.S. Citizen.  

We also need to pressure the Legislature to finally pass a Voter I.D. law.  How complicated is this idea?  You already need a Driver License or CA I.D. card to get on an airplane, buy alcohol, buy a bus pass and many other daily activities in life.  What kind of politician would object to ensuring the integrity of such a fundamental part of our Constitutional Republic, like 'free and fair elections'?  

Are you fed up with the fraud and the lies and the deceit in Sacramento?  Volunteer, donate, and join my team to help me Reform California and Restore Transparent Election Integrity!

August 23, 2021 Chairman's Journal Shelley Kais Most Republicans are very concerned about the masking up of our K-12 children and university students, vaccine mandates, vaccine passports, and discrimination in schools based on who is or isn‚Äôt vaccinated. While we have made our voices heard at our local school boards, five of the major school districts in Pima County (TUSD, Amphi, Sunnyside, Marana, and Catalina Foothills) are mandating that our children wear masks in the classroom. At least 14 Arizona school districts have implemented COVID-19 mask mandates since schools opened this year. While Governor Ducey has said those mandates are illegal, a Maricopa County Superior Court judge ruled that districts currently could require masks because the law does not take effect until September 29th. Governor Ducey has offered the ‚Äúcarrot rather than the stick‚Äù by creating two grant programs that would provide funds to families and school districts that reject mask mandates. As you would anticipate, State Superintendent Kathy Hoffman called Governor Ducey‚Äôs plan an ‚Äúoutrageous attack on public education‚Äù. School districts that follow all state laws and avoid closures of in-person instruction can apply for a per-pupil funding boost from the $163 million of federal grant funding. Schools must come in compliance by August 27th. The City of Tucson The Pima County Republican Party supports the efforts of our Precinct Committeemen who are leading the charge at our school district meetings, rallies for our healthcare workers, and rallies for our First Responders who are being forced to vax. The Tucson Police Officers Association requested a judge place an injunction to stop the city‚Äôs vaccination policy from taking effect. TPOA argued the measure was against state law signed by the governor earlier this year preventing local governments from enacting vaccination mandates. The city attorneys argue that the law doesn‚Äôt take place until September 29. Judge Gordon ruled in favor of the City of Tucson. This overreach of local government is alarming. What Can We Do? The question that I keep getting is what can we do about it. Pima County Republican Party had a briefing from the Goldwater Institute on Saturday regarding Critical Race Theory (CRT) and Social Emotional Learning (SEL), and it was excellent. During the Q & A, I brought up that Pima County is just short of anarchy with our City Council and Board of Supervisors ignoring the Governor and the rule of law. The answer was not the one I was hoping for‚Äîremove the funding from the districts and shut them down and defund the City of Tucson, pull all state funds from the Board of Supervisors and shut down the county. Unfortunately, the answer that I got was in line with what we are doing‚Äîattend school board meetings and use the Call to the Public as an opportunity to voice your concern. Attend the city council meetings and board of supervisor meetings and voice your concern. Write emails. Make phone calls. Hold rallies. As of Monday, August 23, I will suggest this: To Governor Ducey: There are 37 days until September 29th. Governor Ducey, effective September 29th, the citizens of Pima County are asking you to ARREST every GOVERNING BOARD MEMBER in school districts that require masks; ARREST the Tucson City Council members and mayor who vote to continue requiring masks of our city employees, ARREST the Board of Supervisors who vote to require masks of our county employees. The democrats have made this political and the Republicans are going to do what is in the best interest of the people of Pima County. To our Precinct Committeemen: Approximately one-third of our voters are PND or Independent. They do not agree with the debacle that the Biden, Romero, and Bronson administrations are implementing. Our Governing Boards who have relinquished their power and authority and are following the NEA, ASBA, and AEA have lost touch with the children, parents, and taxpayers. Contact your PNDs and INDs and re-register them. Elections have consequences, and we are living them right now. Join me as we change Pima County.

column30: Vaccinated Americans, go wild! ü•∫ Thursday 04.13.21 Enjoying this newsletter? Forward to a friend! Questions? Comments? what.matters@cnn.com by Zachary B. Wolf : The Covid version of VJ day The US government, previously criticized for its slow-moving updates to mask and social distance guidance, went the other direction Thursday and made a simple and surprising declaration -- get vaccinated and take off the masks and lose the distance. Take them off outdoors. Take them off indoors. Take them off for large gatherings and small. Seriously! And you don't need to distance!!!! There are exceptions and qualifications. We will continue to wear them on planes and for other shared forms of travel. And you will want to wear them if your immune system is compromised -- or if you can't get vaccinated. Read CNN's full report. What about the kids who can't get a vaccine? And the poor kids under 12, who aren't yet eligible for the vaccine, seem to be out of luck. There will be a difficult transition as the wee ones wait for vaccine approval and see grownups around them shedding their face coverings. There's an argument that, since they don't spread it in the same way, and so few children have died from Covid, there should be some leeway for them. But that doesn't line up with the current guidance for schools and summer camps -- though they'll probably now have to work much harder to keep up standards going forward. But every other vaccinated person? Get back to normal and do it now. ""We've got to make that transition. If you are vaccinated, you don't have to wear a mask outside,"" Fauci said on ""CBS This Morning."" He added there are ""very unusual"" situations of going into an extremely crowded situation, ""where people are essentially falling all over each other, then you wear a mask."" ""But any other time, if you are vaccinated and you are outside, put aside your mask."" Centers for Disease Control and Prevention Director Dr. Rochelle Walensky went further during a briefing at the White House, announcing new guidance that vaccinated people can take off their masks in many places indoors, too. Related: Watch CNN Film's ""Race for the Vaccine"" on Saturday, May 15, at 9 p.m. ET. I don't think anyone was expecting the CDC to make this announcement Thursday, but it is about as unequivocal as you can imagine and she said it was based on studies from US and Israel showing 90% or more efficacy for vaccines in health care workers. Read exactly what Walensky said: Anyone who is fully vaccinated can participate in indoor and outdoor activities, large or small, without wearing a mask or physical distancing. If you are fully vaccinated, you can start doing the things that you had stopped doing because of the pandemic. We have all longed for this moment when we can get back to some sense of normalcy. Based on the continuing downward trajectory of cases, the scientific data on the performance of our vaccines and our understanding of how the virus spreads, that moment has come for those who are fully vaccinated. Is it time to hug a stranger? After the third time I read that quote, and the part about not having to physically distance, I seriously thought about going to ask a stranger on the street if they were vaccinated and if they wanted a full-on bear hug. (Not a cautious hug.) It's an abrupt and unexpected re-interpretation of the science from the traditionally slow-moving CDC, particularly when it comes to indoors. It's certainly a lot simpler than the color-coded guidance issued by the CDC in April. And it speaks to the larger effort to get people to burst out of the Covid bubble. From confusion to clarity. The CDC had already recommended mask-free life for the vaccinated outdoors, but it was packaged with all sorts of caveats and did not lead people in most places to feel as comfortable as they could. ""I'm here in New York City watching people walk around, all of them wearing masks, and I'm thinking, why are they doing this?"" said CNN's Elizabeth Cohen, reacting to Fauci's declaration on outdoor masking. ""These people are probably vaccinated."" What next? While many states have eased or ended mask requirements, others have not. I was at an outdoor soccer game in Maryland, for instance, over the weekend, where both players and spectators, even separated by many feet, were required to mask up. The whiplash we're now going to see in restrictions being lifted is going to be amazing. Also amazing will be the difficulty getting dinner reservations as people follow the CDC director's advice and get back to it. Before the announcement Thursday, Cohen wrote about the ongoing debate within the CDC about mask guidance, wherein the science-based agency has been slow to respond to data suggesting outdoor masks are unnecessary for the vaccinated, and also had difficulty settling on guidance that makes any sense to normal people. Read that report here. Vax-a-Million! The vaccine perk effort is getting weird. Vaccines underpin the CDC (truncated)

column30: The concept of ‚Äúblack and color supremacy‚Äù is having a moment right now in the down trends of history. Black resentment, entitlement and bigotry has risen, but it is closer to the political mainstream now than it has been for decades. The rhetoric of the left and other figures in the ascendant populist left openly embraces ‚Äúblack power‚Äù, but there is no doubt that open racism has been emboldened by them. Trump attempted to lift the people from despair while the socialist left has increased it. Online and offline, there is a rich and growing milieu of radical leftist racist thinkers and activists. They are stirring up hatred toward whites and hate towards Jews. However, black supremacy, as it is used to describe a belief in the racial superiority of black people, may not be the best concept to help us understand what is going on here. It‚Äôs not that there isn‚Äôt a barely concealed attempt to rehabilitate the long and clearly documented history of black racism and reverse hatred in ‚Äúwestern‚Äù democracies. The issue in critical race theory is a licence for a perverse kind of degeneracy. Consider the contrast between Barack Obama and Trump. Donald Trump is not a perfect human being, but was a great leader and proponent of freedom, opportunity, equality, and societal unification. It is impossible to deny his qualities. He is intelligent, competent, witty, plain-speaking, empathetic and has a loving relationship with his family. Trump worked hard to make something of his life. Obama and democrats like Biden are the reverse: incompetent, mendacious, rude and seemingly incapable of non-instrumental relationships. The only way they have made anything of life is through being installed into privilege, with sufficient reserves of family capital to allow them to build a ‚Äúfollowing‚Äù based on little more than bragging and deception supported by the socialist rich who seek to divide, conquer, and destroy this Nation. Aside from their politics, Both Obama and Biden are simply puppets who fall short of any moral code you could care to imagine. Democrat Politicians are often cynical, cruel, corrupt, and in them is a complete absence of human decency. To them the Constitution is noting but a piece of parchment. Democrats and RINO Republicans pass favors and sweets to one another and paint portraits of one another while they send our wonderful soldiers off to die abandoning them on battle fields like in Benghazi and Afghanistan. They are using VAX mandates to destroy our military . The degeneracy of Democrats tells us something about changing trends within black racism. But for millions of Americans to choose Democrats and to continue to support them cannot simply be dismissed as voters ‚Äúholding their noses‚Äù and selecting the individuals who could best forward their socialist radical anti-American agenda, regardless of personal qualities. For a significant proportion of their supporters, it was a deliberate choice for moral degeneracy, even a celebration of it. It is also a reproach to rational leaders like Trump and to Trump personally. A bad radical black will always be better than a good white man, under the critical racial divide theory being forced on society. The degeneracy of The LEFTISTS tells us something about changing trends within black racism. Social Darwinism, and ‚Äúscientific‚Äù attempts to prove the superiority of the ‚Äúblack race‚Äù have a presence on the LEFT. But I don‚Äôt think that this is the dominant ideological driver behind the resurgence of black racism. Certainly, radical LEFT members of whom have been associated with violent assaults on our cities, property, and peace, advocate the myth of critical race theory, but this woolly idea and claim is weak enough in real evidence not to be tied to any pseudoscientific notion of white superiority as a fact. Reverse racism by radical blacks and democrats are the reality. What we are seeing is something rawer, a lust for power, coupled with an unvarnished hatred of white others that sees little need to disguise itself. This is a black racism that is predicated on nothing other than a desire to dominate and subjugate society under oppression and tyranny. The democrat party‚Äôs brutal expression of their basest degeneracy empowers and licenses a similar abandonment of reason among their followers. There exists NO white supremacy. The LEFT is demonstrating that blackness can be as morally degenerate as they are. At the heart of this proud degeneracy is an insecurity and insanity. A desire for ‚Äúwhite genocide‚Äù has become normative on the LEFT. Democrats and the LEFT depend on people like George Soros who encourages mass immigration as an attempt to replace the white race, maintain control and power. The democrats and the sub-government are coming very close to validating this agenda. At the rally in Charlottesville in August 2017, the marchers chanted: ‚ÄúYou will not replace us‚Äù. This suggests an awareness that black power cannot rest on justifiable foundations. (truncated)

column30: When you hold out getting vaccinated until the Government sweetens the pie. ************************************************************ CORONAVIRUS OUTBREAK As vax rates ease, here come the prizes ‚Äî including $1 million Incentives range from big cash drawings to sports tickets and tuition. Drawings start next week. By Joseph Thompson Thursday, June 3, 2021 8:33pm LOCAL NEWSNORTHWESTCORONAVIRUS OUTBREAK OLYMPIA ‚Äî Getting vaccinated against COVID-19 could net you $1 million in cash, among other prizes. On Thursday, Gov. Jay Inslee announced the state‚Äôs ‚ÄúShot of a Lifetime‚Äù campaign ‚Äî a slew of incentives ranging from a $1 million lottery drawing to a suite at a Seattle Mariners game to a year of tuition credits at any college or university in the state. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre making this investment today because we know every life in the state of Washington has value,‚Äù Inslee said at a news conference. ‚ÄúSo I‚Äôm excited to announce these strong incentives that will bring the potential to save thousands of lives.‚Äù Starting Tuesday, the Washington State Lottery will conduct a weekly drawing for $250,000 for four consecutive weeks. After that, there will be a drawing for $1 million. After each drawing, Washington lottery staff will reach out to winners, who have 72 hours to accept their prize. In addition to the $250,000, each drawing will include winners for other prizes, like Xbox consoles, Seahawks tickets, state park passes and college tuition credits. ‚ÄúI think you get the picture that this is a tremendous statewide effort with multiple partners in this incentive package,‚Äù Inslee said. The effort is part of a push to get at least 70% of Washington adults one vaccine shot ahead of June 30. Inslee has said reaching that mark would enable him to drop most of the state‚Äôs pandemic restrictions before July. But vaccination rates are stalling, and Washington isn‚Äôt on pace to meet the goal early, public health officials said earlier this week. So far, about 63% of Washington adults are at least partially vaccinated. But more than 2 million eligible Washingtonians have yet to get a shot. ‚ÄúI do encourage anyone who as any questions about this vaccine to ask your medical provider,‚Äù Inslee said. ‚ÄúGet it straight from the horse‚Äôs mouth on this. They‚Äôll tell you what the real truth is about this vaccine.‚Äù The incentives are open to all Washingtonians, regardless of citizenship status, though proof of residency is required. The only action needed to be eligible for a prize is to be vaccinated. The names of winners will come from the state‚Äôs immunization database. All previously vaccinated people will be included in the chance to win prizes. However, not all vaccination records are included in the state‚Äôs database. Those who have received a shot through a Veterans Affairs or Department of Defense clinic are not in the state database. The state is working on a way for those people to opt in to the Department of Health‚Äôs list, though it‚Äôs unclear when that will be available. To check your status in the state‚Äôs database, visit myirmobile.com. It‚Äôs unclear how much of the program is paid for by state dollars, versus money from federal relief packages. Those details are being ironed out by the state Office of Financial Management. Inslee called the plan a common-sense investment that has been proven to work in other states. Outside of the drawings, the state is dispersing nearly $1 million to public universities, community colleges and technical schools to administer their own drawings for free tuition and expenses. Meanwhile, the state will work with the Association of Washington Business to distribute $1 million worth of gift cards at injection sites across the state. The association will buy the gift cards, worth $50, and team with chambers of commerce to hand them out after people get vaccinated. Those already fully vaccinated are ineligible to receive a gift card. The state Department of Health will also have $500,000 in gift cards to distribute throughout the summer as part of the Care-A-Van mobile vaccination effort. In the past month, vaccine incentives have taken off nationwide. West Virginia‚Äôs vaccine lottery includes custom hunting rifles, full-ride scholarships to colleges, trucks and a nearly $1.6 million grand prize. California, Colorado, Delaware, Illinois, Maine, Maryland, Minnesota, New Jersey, New York, Ohio and Oregon have similar programs. President Joe Biden also announced a nationwide competition to see which mayors can boost their city‚Äôs vaccination rates the most. So far, the mayors of Seattle, Spokane and Issaquah have signed up. Private companies are getting involved, too. On Wednesday, Anheuser-Busch said it will buy every vaccinated American 21 and older a beer if the country reaches 70% of adults with at least one shot by July 4. Recipients would have to submit a photo of themselves ‚Äúin their favorite place to grab a beer‚Äù to mycooler.com/beer to receive a $5 virtual credit card. Grocery chain Kroger is (truncated)

The Medical Freedom Act just PASSED the Ohio House!

This bill is a HUGE step forward in the fight to protect the people of Ohio from draconian vaccine mandates.

The bill will:
- Ban the public or private use of vaccine passports
- Prohibit schools or businesses from requiring any vaccine that hasn‚Äôt received FDA approval

The bill also REQUIRES schools and businesses to accept vaccine exemptions for:
- ANY reason of personal conscience, including religious conviction
- Possession of natural immunity
- Medical contraindications

Under this legislation, students and employees can also take legal action in the event that their rights are violated.

My number one priority this year has been protecting the freedoms of Ohioans. I have heard you, I have fought for you, and finally, the House has taken action. 

But the fight isn‚Äôt over - this bill will now move to the Ohio Senate. I‚Äôll do everything in my power to ensure the bill passes, and I encourage you to ask your state senator to do the same.

I‚Äôm confident the courts will strike down Joe Biden‚Äôs unconstitutional OSHA vaccine mandate. When they do, we must ensure robust state-level policies are left behind to protect Ohioans‚Äô rights. 

Together, Ohioans are taking a stand against tyrannical mandates. I‚Äôm proud to stand with you in our fight for freedom.

Comment: I start off with a tricky question on this Monday, do I wish you a good morning, or scare the hell out of you that we are in more peril then ever before. Republican are operating on steroids in an all out effort to regain power. They have fully endorsed Trumpism, which has caused a rise of domestic terrorism in our Nation. The Republican Party is loosing its collective mind. It is no longer a political party that even pretends to honor democracy. The Republican minority has become the party of MAGATS, who are able to control the narrative. Democratic lawmakers you need to WTFU. The political arena is not run by the Marquees of Queensberry Rules. Republicans do not operate under moral, ethical, or legal rules. You have members of your own party who call themselves Democrats, but sing Kumbaya with Republican lawmakers. Those like Manchin, and Sinema will wind up destroying the Democratic Party and Democracy. Democrat lawmakers at this point in time are as useless as tits on a bull. You are creating the opportunity for a dictatorship to rise to power. You have allowed dissension in your own party which has enabled the Republicans to take advantage of the political polarization, allowing them to incite violent and extremist groups to take over the political discourse. Our democracy can fall when the Republican elites feel that losing an election may mean forfeiting their power and influence over the country. They may seek to take over the country by force, turning it into a dictatorship. This is occurring in broad daylight by the political party that used to be the Republican Party, but no longer exists, although the would-be despots that are taking it over still call themselves Republicans. The obvious solution is to make sure those Republicans who would destroy democracy to stay in power are voted out of office permanently. That is where we are now, Democrats hold the marjority in the Senate but can not even pass fair voting rights. The same is occurring all across the red states in America. The United States could soon become a country of ‚Äãextended minority rule, which calls ‚Äãinto question whether the United States will remain a democracy, since majority opinion will be increasingly unable to shape government decisions. Without aggressive federal intervention, Republicans could ‚Äãreverse the outcome of a free and fair election, making the sloppy attempt by Trump and his backers to overturn the 2020 results look amateurish by comparison. column30: So, Novak. Mate. Don‚Äôt let the door hit you on the way out, hey? Novak Djokovic Got the Boot. Australians Are Thrilled. Jan. 15, 2022 Mark Baker/Associated Press By Van Badham Ms. Badham is an Australian journalist and the author of ‚ÄúQAnon and On: A Short and Shocking History of Internet Conspiracy Cults.‚Äù Update: A panel of judges ruled on Sunday that Australia‚Äôs immigration minister was within his rights to cancel the tennis champion Novak Djokovic‚Äôs visa. The judges‚Äô ruling is final; the Australian Open begins Monday. MELBOURNE, Australia ‚Äî Novak Djokovic has had his visa to stay in Australia revoked ‚Äî not once but twice. After a successful appeal of his apprehension at the border by authorities, our immigration minister has affirmed the initial refusal. The world‚Äôs No. 1 men‚Äôs singles tennis player is out of the Australian Open (at least for now). It‚Äôs a move that the local papers have claimed will ‚Äúundoubtedly prove popular with the Australian public.‚Äù So, Novak. Mate. Don‚Äôt let the door hit you on the way out, hey? Australians may well be exhausted from two years of the pandemic and sick and weakened by a current mass infection of Covid-19, and yet many of us retain enough energy to be thrilled by this news. The hashtag #DjokovicOut has been a trending topic here for days. A poll conducted by a local media organization reported a staggering 83 percent of 60,000 respondents were in favor of Djokovic‚Äôs booting. Two major network news anchors were caught on hot mics using at least 10 expletives to discuss the issue. This would usually provoke some social sanction, but given that the expletives in question were used to describe Djokovic, both news anchors have since become national heroes. And yet none of the acrimony is about tennis. It is entirely about Australia‚Äôs experience of the pandemic, the growing policy failures of Prime Minister Scott Morrison‚Äôs government and the current out-of-control spread of the Omicron variant here. Within this context, an otherwise skilled sportsman has made himself a cackhanded symbol of everything presently enraging Australians. His first mistake was to align himself with the kinds of ideas Australians see in online misinformation campaigns from the anti-vax movement. This is a man who once self-diagnosed a gluten intolerance by gripping some bread. He‚Äôs made claims that polluted water can be cleansed with the mind. He declared he was ‚Äúopposed to vaccination‚Äù back in April 2020, before a vaccine was even available for the coronavirus. Our social tolerance is also dwindling for those whose approach to public health is seen as selfish. (An extraordinary 90 percent of Australians are fully vaccinated.) Sports commentators reminded readers that when Naomi Osaka became unwell in 2021, Djokovic insisted that the press appearances she resisted were ‚Äúpart of the sport‚Äù ‚Äî yet he‚Äôs conducted his current Australian misadventure around his own preferences, not his obligations to society. Djokovic, a Serbian national, arrived in Melbourne on Jan. 5 to compete in the prestigious local Grand Slam event. He‚Äôs a legend of the tournament; he has won it a record nine times. A 10th victory at this year‚Äôs open would seal his sporting legacy as the winner of the most individual men‚Äôs Grand Slam titles in tennis history. Instead, he‚Äôll likely be deported. His coy refusal to ‚Äúbe forced by someone to take a vaccine‚Äù may have made Djokovic a poster boy for a marginal local movement of anti-vaccine extremists, but it‚Äôs brought him into sharp conflict with the majority of Australians‚Äô attitudes toward managing the virus. When the pandemic took hold in March 2020, Australia‚Äôs federal government shut international borders to control its spread ‚Äî but made no provision for the tens of thousands of stranded Aussies stuck overseas who wanted to come home. As Mr. Morrison dumped more pandemic management responsibilities onto the states, they enforced their own domestic borders. When these policies were combined with lockdowns, loved ones were separated for months at a time. Only when states reached 80 percent vaccination rates were border protections relaxed ‚Äî some as recently as only this week. The Morrison government‚Äôs failure to order enough vaccines for the population resulted in a rollout popularly referred to as a strollout. The process of social repair has been long and difficult. Here‚Äôs How to Own Your Cravings Jan. 10, 2022 A Fascinating Page-Turner Made From an Unlikely Subject: Federal Reserve Policy Jan. 16, 2022 On ‚ÄòS.N.L.,‚Äô Biden Urges Covid-Weary Nation to Stop Seeing ‚ÄòSpider-Man‚Äô Jan. 16, 2022 ‚ÄòI Was Not Whole‚Äô: Why a Grandfather Went Back to College Jan. 14, 2022 He Makes Tom Brady‚Äôs Offense Work Jan. 13, 2022 ‚ÄòThere‚Äôs Not Just One Type of Porn‚Äô: Erika Lust‚Äôs Alternative Vision Jan. 14, 2022 A Library the Internet Can‚Äôt Get Enough Of Jan. 15, 2022 Is Interning for (truncated)

column30: Good evening Mass and the town of Ware. I wanted to apologize to both the committee, and to Massachusetts in general, for not being able to collect signatures on the ballot initiative questions, like I volunteered. As you may, or may not know, the wife and I just had a baby on Sept. 25th. That in itself did not keep me completely indisposed, but what did is my son having an extreme case of Colic. He's one gassy üë∂ baby. Lol. He's doing great otherwise, but the Colic has been completely maddening. We sleep in shifts and cycles, if at all. Burping can take between 30min to 2 hours, and at the end of it, all the way to his next feeding, he is screaming and crying a horrific cry that sounds like he's being tortured. We did just have 3 days in a row where he had minimum gas issues. But now again today he has had more issues with gas resurfacing, but now tonight he is doing well again. Hopefully just a flare-up. And I am going through all this while looking for work that just isn't there in my industry. I work in event technologies and my industry has been devastated. Limited conventions and trade shows, music venues are cancelling, labor also is getting cancelled on both sides of my field, and the vax mandates are making me ineligible to even enter a venue. This, just after I self financed and produced my own music üíø CD for my music project that is geared towards starting a metal genre for patriotic metal fans and changing the counter culture/sub pop culture in music. I tell all you all this, because I do want all of you all to know how committed I am to this committee, the town, and the patriot GOP movement itself. column35:
Breaking News!!  South Carolina Rep. Stewart Jones , among a short list of other true conservative State House members in South Carolina, have authored a letter addressed to  Joe Biden  demanding that his administration immediately ""cease & desist"" with any and all efforts in attempting to further enforce the vaccine mandates they have been pushing on employers throughout the nation Elected officials from at least 30 states have signed onto the letter. This comes on the heels of OSHA agreeing to end their own enforcement of vax mandates, at the bequest (read: demand/edicts) of the Biden Administration, after a federal court declared their involvement unconstitutional. 
Once that decision came down, Joe Biden's bureaucratic handlers immediately began searching for other avenues of enforcement, including veiled threats levied towards some of America's largest, single employers. 
Now, hundreds of Elected Officials from at least 30 states, have signed onto a DEMAND for Biden to end his attempts at enforcement of these unconstitutional mandates. The letter was written by members of the South Carolina legislature, including State House members Stewart Jones and Josiah Magnuson for SC State House 38  and spread through the country from there. Now that it has gone public, according to a number of South Carolina state reps, they expect a ""massive increase in signers"" to follow. They expect to re-release it within the next week, and they hope to have ""signatures from elected officials from every single state"" in The U.S. 

This adds pressure in South Carolina, specifically, since it was written primarily by members of the state's GOP legislature, which recently decided to meet earlier than originally planned, and is expected to face some tough decisions beginning December 1st.
A rally set for that day (Dec. 1s) Freedom Rally - State House  demanding action against Biden's recent attempts at mandates, is widely expected to add even MORE pressure to put an end to those mandates.
South Carolina's GOP controlled legislature, which sits just under a 2/3 majority, has been all but paralyzed when it comes to taking action against demands of a shot being pushed on citizens and workers by numerous counties, cities, and large employers in the state. 
Many people feel that the more people that show up while legislature is in session, on the 1st of December, 1pm, along with the addition of this letter authored by some of the most conservative members of that session, can go a LONG way towards helping to put enough pressure on our legislature to end these destructive mandates. 
This is one example of a ""best, last chance"" if one ever existed.
I encourage ANYONE reading this to send this letter to their own state rep, state senator, attorney general, even governor, and ask them to add their name to it, joining We, The People in demanding an end to these absurd, tyrannical mandates! Members of 30+ states have signed on, let's all work to make that number and even 50, deal?

column34: El Paso County Public Health
column35:
Like all vaccines, the COVID-19 vaccines are required to meet the FDA‚Äôs safety and effectiveness guidelines before they are made available to the public. 

There are several factors that helped accelerate the development and testing of the COVID-19 vaccines, including major government funding and technological advances. Usually, vaccine development and trials happen one after the other, and it can take some time. For the COVID-19 vaccines, the federal government provided substantial additional funding to conduct vaccine development and trials at the same time, making the process more efficient. That being said, while it was a faster process, it was still a rigorous process. To ensure the vaccines are safe and effective, the FDA required the same three phases of clinical trials it does for any vaccine.

Read more from the FDA about the COVID-19 Vaccine Development and Approval Process here: https://bit.ly/FDACOVID19VaxInfo

For answers to other COVID-19 vaccine questions, visit the El Paso County Public Health website: https://bit.ly/EPCPHCOVID19VaxInfo
