column30: I firmly believe vaccines should be a choice. If you believe a vaccination keeps you safe from a virus, feel free to get it. If you're mad that I, and many others, will refuse that vaccine then you dont really believe your vaccine works. Simply put on the petition, ""Individuals have rights to self-determine about their health, body and life. Therefore, no one, much less the government should interfere with the individual‚Äôs right to undergo or abandon medical treatment. Medical decisions for children should be left to parents or guardians."" The government cannot force treatment on someone with AIDS, and they can walk around forever invisibly infectious. Govt cannot force treatment on someone with terminal cancer, and they can take the risk of it killing them. Govt cannot force someone to take the antivenom if they're determined to risk fighting the futile battle of overcoming a fatal snakebite. The Govt cannot force someone to have their gangrenous foot amputated if they want to suffer through it falling off. It is not acceptable for the government to force people who are sick to seek treatment (let alone demanding it be the ONLY choice offered for treatment like a vaccine would be). It can't simultaneously be logical to force preventive treatment on someone healthy to treat the virus they haven't or may never come down with. ‚òÜif you sign the petition, DONT FORGET TO VERIFY your signature by clicking the link they send you by email.‚òÜ Before the comment is even thought up, I'll address it. NO, I am not anti-vax. I believe there are many types of vaccines that have been a blessing for humanity (like the measles vax. So consistent that a vaccination from 1960 could work just as effectively today as then). I believe that vaccines for quickly mutating viruses like influenza are the equivalent of Russian FLUlette; you might be lucky and it contains the strain going around (in the grab bag of strains chosen for that seasons flu shot), but then again the gun might end up being full of blanks. I shouldn't feel the need to say this, yet again, but I will. I am not an expert in any field. I am not telling anyone not to get the vaccine when there is one available. That's actually the whole point, I'm not telling anyone how I think they should be made to address their health. If you think people aren't capable of making adult decisions, you are simply projecting your own shortcomings onto the general population, and you are free to relinquish your right to make that choice. DO NOT make it my obligation to hand over rights just because you did. I'm sure there are plenty of things you treasure that I consider to be as ridiculous and meaningless as you decided my rights are.

column30: Just wrote this note to our acting mayor. Please feel free to copy it, share it with your friends, and edit it as you see fit. She can be contacted at the link provided below. Obviously there's no guarantee this works, but if enough of us write in, I believe we have a chance to persuade her (especially because there's an election coming up and she did make a statement against vax mandates previously). Thanks for taking the time to read, and stay strong out there. https://www.boston.gov/departments/mayors-office Mayor Janey, I and many other Bostonians are deeply concerned by President Joe Biden's announcement to enact a vaccine mandate. We believe such an action falls beyond the pale of American governance, and is a deeply intrusive piece of federal coercion. As mayor, you do not need to go along with this madness, and can resist with the support of city residents - In spite of federal law, Boston is considered a ""sanctuary city"", so not complying with an executive edict is well within the pale of city governance. I know a couple of weeks ago, you spoke out against vaccine mandates, and caught some flack for it from local media. But in speaking with real locals every day, I believe the vast majority would have your back if you stuck with your instincts and struck down this vaccine mandate. Your website says you've spent your career focused on civil rights, and I truly do believe this is a civil rights battle for which you are well suited to take the lead on. Please feel free to contact me at the email provided if you have any questions, or if you wish to discuss this issue further. I love Boston, and like you, I want what's best for it. God bless, Matthew Goldberg

column34: Gary
column35:
# **California School Choice 2022; The Educational Freedom Act**
# **‚ÄúYour money, your children, your choice‚Äù**

Proverbs 22:6 says: ‚Äú***Train up a child in the way he should go, and when he is old he will not depart from it***.‚Äù  It is hard to follow Proverbs 22:6 when most Government Run Schools are doing the opposite, 5 days/week, 6-8 hours/day. 

In the #GovernmentRunSchools, we have medically irrational mask and vax mandates for children, who are at 0.00% risk from Covid; Critical Race Theory that indoctrinates children to be racists and judge and treat other people based on the color of their skin; pornographic SeXXXEd; anti Christian indoctrination; anti American history; and dumbed down academic standards.  In California, the Government Run Schools can take children for abortions and transgender hormone treatments without their parents‚Äô consent or even knowledge.  California‚Äôs new ethnic studies curriculum literally has children chanting to the Aztec gods of human sacrifice.

The #GovernmentRunSchools are non-reformable because the control is too diffuse spread over local school boards, the state government and the federal government, and the well financed interests are too entrenched.  While homeschooling and private schooling are options for some families, the only way to save large numbers of our children and our country is with #SchoolChoice.

The California School Choice Foundation is circulating the **EDUCATIONAL FREEDOM ACT **initiative that will be the boldest, most comprehensive School Choice law in America.  

# **The EDUCATIONAL FREEDOM ACT initiative,**

1. Offers all children a $14,000/year educational savings account.

2. Lets parents choose the best school for their children.

3. Allows families to save unused money for college or vocational training.

4. Includes homeschooling families.

5. Uses the children‚Äôs shares of money the state is already spending.

6. Protects private schools and home schools from interference and control by the government and teacher unions.

The **EDUCATIONAL FREEDOM ACT **is based on three principles: (1) Parents can and should decide how best to educate their children; (2) Freedom of choice is good; and (3) Competition improves the quality of goods and services, especially compared to a government monopoly. 

# **OUR REQUESTS OF YOU:**

1. Sign the petition to get the Educational Freedom Act on the ballot for 2022.  Our people are out gathering signatures at various locations in San Bernardino and Riverside Counties.  You may contact me through FB, Greg@RedlandsTeaParty.net or 909.550.1358 to find a time and location.  I will even meet you at my office in Redlands to sign the petition. 

2. Volunteer for 2 hours/week collecting signatures.  Are your children (or grandchildren) and your country worth two hours per week?

3. Contribute $5/month, or more if you can afford it.  Again, what are your children (or grandchildren) and your country worth?

We can volunteer and contribute at www.CaliforniaSchool Choice.org  

In San Bernardino and Riverside Counties, please contact:

--Dale Broome for San Bernardino County, DaleBroome@CaliforniaSchoolChoice.org 951.322.6351

--Wendy Beyer for Riverside County, riverside@cascf.com 

We do not have millionaires to pay for signature gatherers.  We need concerned parents, grandparents, and other citizens to step up.  

**THE EDUCATIONAL FREEDOM ACT IS THE MOST IMPORTANT POLITICAL CAUSE BEFORE US IN CALIFORNIA BECAUSE: **

(1st) Getting America‚Äôs children out of the Government Run Schools is a national survival issue.  

(2nd) We can accomplish this.  Because parents now see what is happening in the Government Run Schools, this is the best ever opportunity to enact #SchoolChoice in California.

(3rd) When we enact the EDUCATIONAL FREEDOM ACT in November 2022, it will be the educational Liberty Bell that will ring not only in California but across the country and around the world.

As Ronald Reagan said, ‚Äú***If not us, who? If not now, when?***‚Äù

column30: I wrote this today to a friend whose wife is so scared right now due to the virus she won't get on a plane. At the same time a friend of my wife's won't walk with her without masks and/or social distancing, which all got me to thinking about what to ask these people. Because there is no safer time right now -- the cases are so low they can't even test a vaccine for it. And there won't BE a safe and effective vax for it (we don't have one for the flu, for example). And this will surely come back, like all viruses do, in the fall. So -- what I want to ask these folks is: are you going to live the rest of your life in fear now? Will you NEVER not wear a mask? (Despite us knowing they are ineffective against it) Will you ALWAYS stay six feet apart? From EVERYONE? (Family car trips will be interesting. BTW, studies now show that most viruses were transmitted between family members. While locked down at home). Some folks (my wife's friend) fall back on the ""but I have health issues."" Ahem. At my age, who doesn't? Unless you are SO compromised you can't breathe properly (let's say you're on oxygen and are already gasping for breath) you don't need to worry. We have a safe and effective treatment so at the first sign of fever just have your doctor prescribe it and you'll be fine. Those of you with those SEVERE health issues -- hell, you shouldn't be outside EVER anyway (so enjoy your life, bubble boy). Either all the rest of those folks have chosen now never to live normal lives, or they are waiting for *someone* to tell them it's okay. I'm not sure WHO they want to tell them it's okay -- it's not the science (you can't find ANY studies which say otherwise, and a whole lot that say it is FINE to get back to complete normal). It's not the majority of doctors, who now say mask wearing and anti-social distancing is pointless. But if you just need someone to give you permission: I give it to you. Honestly, I have about the same power as anyone else does in this. Go forth and do what you want. Otherwise you will NEVER do it.

column30: Kristina Marie Australia created camps already. They are not allowed to even leave their homes. Government is issuing an app where citizens have to take a picture in said location within 15 minutes or else police come. A man who left his home and sneezed in an elevator was hunted like a most wanted predator. France police have basically beat people into submission after not having a passport or mask on in public. NYC has passports. People who dont comply will have a hard time working with this new work mandate... so either we get the vaccine or we dont work. Other employers will just be forced to give us weekly covid tests. Media is trying to divide us between our vax status. They blame the unvaxed for the rising cases. Yet, YOU CAN STILL GET THE VIRUS AND TRANSMIT IT WITH THE VACCINE. If covid was as bad as they say, why are so many of unvaxxed immigrants flooding into our country? Masks dont help, its all a facade. And we keep playing into this.. why? Watching other countrys makes you question whats on our agenda in america

I am not ‚Äúanti-vax‚Äù per se, however what has been admitted even by those on the left who have been pushing so hard to MANDATE it on the entire population (the same people who less than a year ago, before the election, were all saying that they would not trust the vaccine and would advise everyone NOT to get it), is that of those getting sick now, just as many are vaccinated as are unvaccinated. AND 90% OF THOSE HOSPITALIZED WITH THE VIRUS ARE VACCINATED. Even Fauci admitted this. They have a real narrative issue, as just weeks ago they were suggesting that the only people getting sick were unvaccinated, and then one week later they were forced to change their narrative when they told everyone - vaccinated or not - that they had to wear masks again as now (with Delta) even the vaccinated are able to contract and spread the virus - 180 degree turn from one week prior. Both narratives can not be true, however what they have done is rationalized a general distrust of them and those who are so aggressively promoting the vaccine (even to the point of actions quite reminiscent of nazi germany). The other issue I have with it - and this has ZERO to do with politics - is that, not only do they keep changing their story with respect to efficacy, etc., but the fact is that there is not one person on this planet who has had the vaccine for a year yet. Noone - regardless as to how much education and experience they have in the medicine - can tell you the long-term effects (which could be significant) as this vaccine was rushed through the FDA ‚Äì even FDA panelists admitted this (it technically hasn't even been approved - rather only for emergency purposes, but it has yet to receive actual full FDA approval). I have heard it all before - that the core components of the vaccine have been around for a while, however if it were that simple, then not only would the vaccine have been released much sooner, but it would have also been fully approved by the FDA. However clearly that is not the case, whether it be additional components in the vaccine, or the manner in which the components are mixed, or whatever. AND NOW THE FDA IS GOING TO COURT TO MAKE IT SUCH THAT THEY DON'T RELEASE THEIR FINDINGS ABOUT THE VACCINE TO THE PUBLIC FOR 75 YEARS. WHY WOULD THEY WISH TO WAIT UNTIL THE VAST MAJORITY OF THE RECIPIENTS OF THE VACCINE ARE ALREADY DEAD BEFORE THEY RELEASE THE DATA??? THEY NEED THIS MUCH TIME TO ‚ÄúHIDE‚Äù THE DETAILS? And yet they still DEMAND that we simply ""trust the science"", when they give us no reason nor ability to do so when they are clearly hiding the ""facts"" (not to mention their track record of constantly changing their narrative with respect to the effectiveness of the vaccine - remember when they first told us that once you got vaccinated you could no longer get nor transmit the virus?). Bottom line is that there is a reason why it took as long as it did to come out, why it still has not been fully approved by the FDA (and now I understand that Biden, Fauci and the dems are ""applying pressure"" on the FDA to approve it now, so there goes any credibility given that it has now been politicized). And over 150,000 people have in fact died from the vaccine (not to mention the now MILLIONS of people who took the vaccine but still got sick ‚Äì as mentioned, 90% of those hospitalized with the virus are vaccinated) and now the death rate from the vaccine exceeds the death rate from the virus. Other vaccines (flu, polio, etc.) took years before they were approved for use, as the long-term effects needed to be known. That was not the case here. Bottom line - all ""conspiracy theories"" aside - noone knows the long-term effects of the vaccine (and as an additional factoid, while it is true that incidences of the virus (in both vaccinated and unvaccinated people) are in fact up, as are hospitalizations in some areas, deaths are not ‚Äì and at the end of the day that is the rationale as to whether or not all of our lives should be massively disrupted (or worse). Finally, clearly Biden, Fauci and the rest of the dems don‚Äôt really care about us, or even believe in the ‚Äúscience‚Äù, as if they did the borders would be locked closed and no one would be allowed over the border ‚Äì legally or illegally ‚Äì as was the case during the last administration. It is no coincidence that there is a surge in the virus six months after Biden opened the borders, let millions in illegally (75% of whom actually had the virus), didn‚Äôt bother treating or quarantining them, and then sent them on busses and planes disseminating them throughout the country. And they needed something on which to blame it other than this obvious superspreader event caused by Biden and the dems in which he allows millions in with the virus ‚Äì so they blame it on those who are unvaccinated and the ‚ÄúDelta variant‚Äù, when there isn‚Äôt even a test specifically for the Delta variant. So how could they possibly know that that is it? That is nothing more than speculation and (truncated)

QUOTE: ""The Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has done a bait and switch by announcing it approved its ‚Äúfirst COVID-19 vaccine‚Äù in order to push the ‚Äúvaccine‚Äù mandates and protect the Pfizer pharmaceutical company from legal liability. However, there is currently no fully licensed COVID shot on the United States market.""

New York Governor Kathy Hochul is one of the high priestesses of this new faith. She's the governor of New York. No, no one voted for her as governor. And that seems odd for a politician, but it's typical for a faith leader. No one voted for Jim Jones either. Yesterday, Kathy Hochul held her first service as the leader of the New York Diocese of the Corona cult. Around her neck. She wore not a cross‚Äîthat's yesterday's symbol‚Äîbut instead a vaccination necklace. That necklace signified to the faithful gathered that Hochul is ascended to the select priesthood of those who have taken full intravenous communion. 

‚ÄúAnd I wear my vaccinated necklace all the time to say I'm vaccinated. All of you. Yes, I know you're vaccinated. You're the smart ones. But, you know, there's people out there who aren't listening to God, what God wants. You know this. You know who they are. I need you to be my apostles. I need you to go out and talk about it and say we owe this to each other. We love each other. Jesus taught us to love one another. And how do you show that love but to care about each other enough to say, please get vaccinated because I love you. I want you to live,‚Äù preached Hochul. 

How do you show your love to one another the old way is to visit people, say, in the hospital as they died, that's no longer allowed. The new way to show your love is to get the vax. God himself wants you to take the vaccine. I need you to be my apostles, Hochul thundered. No one comes to the Father except through the shot. Sinners in the hands of an angry health care worker. At the pulpit. Kathy Hochul, not super bright as you may have noticed, seems suddenly transformed‚Äîa transfiguration if you will. Standing there, she wasn't merely a mediocre, unelected governor of a dying state with bad weather. No, Hochul was the vaccine messiah preaching the undying word of St. Anthony Fauci. Can I get an amen, ladies and gentlemen.

Now, it may sound unlikely to those of you used to the older faiths, but many are joining this new church. And for $39 right now on Amazon, you, too, can buy a sterling silver necklace that declares that you have been vaccinated‚Äîliterally declares it just spells out in cursive ""vaccinated."" There's no mistaking what an incredibly good person you are. Everyone will see it. 

You can also buy vaccination bracelets and vaccination pins and vaccination earrings, vaccination shirts, vaccination socks. It's all right on Kathy Hochul‚Äôs church gift shop. Go there today. And while you're shopping, be certain to pick up a Tony Fauci prayer candle. In fact, get two. All good, decent people have more than one. 

For just $15 on Etsy, you can buy a patron saint of staying home prayer candle, that's a real thing. We read the reviews today. Here's one of them: ""Love it! I think it may have to set up a little altar to place it on! There's a new convert. Here's another review from a woman called Kelly Hannan: ""I put this in my office. I work in public health and this makes me smile every time I look at it."" Of course it makes you smile. Kathy Hannan virtue is its own reward. 

Now, for those still making the tough transition from a traditional Western religion or religion about God to this new religion, which is not about God, it's really about you and only you and more of you. And you, you, you, you, you. You can pick up a masked nativity scene online, it looks conventional, but look closely, it features Mary, Joseph and the baby Jesus, all with their faces covered as they should be, even in a manger. They're masked just like you are. In this religion of narcissism, the holiest figures look exactly like you do. That's the point. We'll reach back 2000 years and change the appearance of historical figures to look exactly like the people in Williamsburg, Brooklyn. That's what this religion is about. 

And speaking of babies, you‚Äôll want to celebrate your children's baptism by vax by purchasing a sacred text to memorialize this moment. We recommend this age-appropriate Tony Fauci coloring book. This book promises, quote, hand-illustrated coloring pages starring your quarantine dreamboat. Not surprisingly, the reviews online are glowing. Everyone loves it. With one exception, of course, there's always an apostate. The kind of person burning stakes were created for. Here‚Äôs (truncated)

column30: The truth is FINALLY coming out National panic attack came at a massive price Rita Panahi 18/2/22 The Australian Bureau of Statistics [put out some crucial data ](https://www.heraldsun.com.au/coronavirus/new-abs-figures-reveal-lockdown-impact-on-unemployment-underemployment-in-victoria/news-story/50b3b9b3cecc5eac1ae5616c923c3a27)this week that should shame every alarmist bureaucrat, politician and media blowhard who championed lockdowns, school closures and mandates. Of the 2639 deaths from or with Covid-19 in Australia, 2556 had serious pre-existing conditions, on average three pre-existing conditions. That means more than 91 per cent of Covid-19 deaths in Australia, up until January 31, 2022, had underlying health issues with cancer, dementia and chronic cardiac conditions among the most common pre-existing conditions. The median age of death for those who died from Covid-19 was 83.7 years; higher than the average life expectancy. For women the median age of Covid-19 deaths was 86 and just over 81 years for men. In the same 22-month period Australia had around 100,000 cancer deaths and the country records around 160,000 deaths per annum. It‚Äôs hard not to conclude that we needlessly crippled our societies, debased our hard fought for liberties and caused untold damage to children, not to mention accumulating enormous debt and destroying countless lives and livelihoods. The only consolation, if you can call it that, is that we were not alone. With a few notable exceptions, most of the first world blindly followed the Chinese Communist Party in adopting destructive lockdowns to ‚Äúeradicate‚Äù a virus that was never going to be eradicated. In the years to come we will look back at this period with a mixture of horror and bewilderment, wondering how so many countries managed to abandon their advanced pandemic plans and instead embraced lockdowns. The ABS data also showed that Victoria has recorded significantly more deaths than any other state. Indeed, Victoria had more Covid-19 deaths than all the other states and territories combined despite inflicting six lockdowns ‚Äì including the world‚Äôs longest ‚Äì on more than five million people in Greater Melbourne. There must be a reckoning for those who imposed and championed these draconian policies, though these days even the most ardent Covid-zero fanatic accepts that we must learn to live with the virus. ## **WHERE WAS ‚ÄòPRACTICAL‚Äô DAN WHEN PLAYGROUNDS WERE CLOSED?** After close to two years of hysteria and overreach Premier Dan Andrews is beginning to comprehend reality. This week we‚Äôve had two backflips from Dear leader. For weeks Premier Andrews has been adamant that in ‚ÄúVictoria‚Äôs vaccinated economy‚Äù you would have to have three jabs to be considered fully vaccinated. When Scott Morrison announced Australia‚Äôs borders would reopen on February 21, Premier Andrews was quick to announce that only boosted tourists would be welcome at Victoria‚Äôs retailers, hotels and restaurants, a move that demoralised the state‚Äôs decimated tourism industry. The polling on those positions must‚Äôve been pretty grim because on Wednesday Mr Andrews walked back from his triple vax mandate. ‚ÄúThere comes a point where things become kind of impractical and you‚Äôve got so many different systems operating at once that it doesn‚Äôt really work,‚Äù he said. Suddenly the Premier cares about practicality. He didn‚Äôt care about what‚Äôs practical when he locked down the state six times, enforced curfews, closed playgrounds, banned elective surgery and masked people indoors and outdoors. Practicality, or lack thereof, wasn‚Äôt a concern when he implemented policies that destroyed small and medium-size enterprises. There‚Äôs been nothing practical, or proportionate, about the crippling restrictions we‚Äôve suffered in this state. But now that people are finally waking up to the Covid reality, he is relaxing some of the state‚Äôs harsh rules including for the unvaccinated. Victoria, along with NSW, will reduce the number of days of quarantine required for unvaccinated international arrivals. ‚ÄúThe 14-day hotel quarantine period for international visitors and aircrew who aren‚Äôt fully vaccinated or medically exempt will reduce to seven days,‚Äù Andrews announced on Thursday. But while NSW is ditching the dreaded, and largely useless, indoor mask mandate on February 25, the Victorian government is refusing to budge. The calls of infectious disease experts for mask mandates to be immediately lifted for schoolchildren has again fallen on deaf ears. However, the Premier did perform another backflip after the strong reaction to the Herald Sun‚Äôs front-page story revealing that parents who were not boosted were set to be banned from their children‚Äôs school facilities and events from mid-March. The backlash to the news must‚Äôve been particularly swift and fierce given the speed with which the policy was junked. It took days to have the IVF ban reversed, and even longer to have the playground ban lifted but the triple-jab (truncated)

And while there are various reasons individuals fail to get vaccinated, at a national level our shortfall is all about politics. Vaccination rates in blue states are similar to those in other advanced countries, while the rates in red states are far behind; at the county level there‚Äôs a stunning negative correlation between Donald Trump‚Äôs share of the 2020 vote and the vaccination rate. Biden Versus the Friends of Covid Jan. 20, 2022 Drew Angerer/Getty Images President Biden ended his first year in office on a low note, with polls showing public disapproval of his handling of, well, just about everything. We are, of course, hearing endless commentary about his political missteps, along with some acknowledgment that public expectations were too high given the razor-thin Democratic majority in Congress. One thing I don‚Äôt think gets enough emphasis, however, is the extent to which Biden has been hurt by the way the pandemic keeps dragging on ‚Äî a dismal reality for which he bears little responsibility. Oh, the messaging could have been clearer, testing and masks made more available, and so on. But Biden‚Äôs biggest error on Covid-19 was underestimating the ruthlessness of his opponents, who have done all they can to undermine America‚Äôs pandemic response. Before I get to the politics of Covid response, let‚Äôs talk about how pervasively the pandemic‚Äôs persistence colors the nation‚Äôs mood. Some of the effects are direct and obvious. Certainly most Americans, even if they haven‚Äôt developed Covid themselves, know people who have gotten seriously ill or died. Furthermore, Covid is still making life difficult in ways large and small. Shuttered schools were a nightmare for many parents; they‚Äôve reopened in most places but are still subject to unpredictable closings. Work is also still disrupted. According to the Census Bureau‚Äôs most recent Household Pulse Survey, 8.7 million Americans were not working because they were either sick with coronavirus symptoms or caring for someone else who was; 3.2 million more weren‚Äôt working out of fear of contracting or spreading the virus. And Covid is contributing to our economic problems. Fear of face-to-face contact has skewed consumer spending away from services toward goods, straining supply chains and fueling inflation. Both fear of infection and burnout among workers who have been coping with the pandemic‚Äôs strains are probably major factors in labor shortages, which are also contributing to inflation. One of the puzzles in recent polling is why public assessments of the economy are so negative despite plunging unemployment. It‚Äôs true that inflation has eroded real wages ‚Äî but George H.W. Bush ran on a strong economy in 1988 even though real wages fell for most of Ronald Reagan‚Äôs second term. And as I and others have noted, there‚Äôs a big disconnect between Americans‚Äô assessment of their own financial situation ‚Äî which is pretty positive ‚Äî and their grim assessment of ‚Äúthe economy.‚Äù Partisanship surely plays a big role, with Republicans claiming that the economy is as bad now as it was in early 2009, when we were losing 700,000 jobs a month. But the pandemic probably also darkens perceptions: Aside from a general sense of malaise, people see closed shops and empty office buildings, which makes things look worse than they are. What makes all of this especially demoralizing is that 2021 began with the hope that miraculous vaccines would end the pandemic. Despite the effectiveness of the vaccines in preventing serious illness, that didn‚Äôt happen even in highly vaccinated countries. But America is doing especially badly because it isn‚Äôt a highly vaccinated country: After a strong start, its vaccination drive fell far behind other wealthy nations. And while there are various reasons individuals fail to get vaccinated, at a national level our shortfall is all about politics. Vaccination rates in blue states are similar to those in other advanced countries, while the rates in red states are far behind; at the county level there‚Äôs a stunning negative correlation between Donald Trump‚Äôs share of the 2020 vote and the vaccination rate. Why do many Republicans refuse the vaccines? Because they‚Äôre getting a steady stream of misinformation from right-wing media, while right-wing politicians have gradually shifted from claiming to be against vaccine mandates to being straight-out anti-vax. For example, recently the medical director for Orange County, Fla., was placed on leave simply for encouraging ‚Äî not requiring ‚Äî the staff to get vaccinated. But why are right-wing elites so hostile to vaccines? Have they carefully considered the evidence? Don‚Äôt be silly. Their real motive is the desire to prevent Democrats from achieving any kind of policy success. And is it really implausible to suggest that some leading figures on the right actively want to make things worse, in the belief that the public will blame Biden? But while the public does indeed tend to blame presidents for anything (truncated)

column30: I'm re-posting all of this from Billy Allred: One word of advice from someone with experience in HR. Do not quit your job unless you have a better one. Simply do not comply. Graciously, humbly, just say no. Force them to fire you if they don‚Äôt like it. They don‚Äôt want you to quit but they really don‚Äôt want to have to fire you, because that puts them at risk of a lawsuit, of unemployment payments, etc. With Geisinger and Evan adopting more strict policies regarding vaccination, I was asked by a couple of people what I would recommend regarding a religious exemption. I borrowed someone else's and made it my own and I'm sharing it here for your use. Adopt it as is, or modify so that it fits your specific religious beliefs. I hope it is useful to you. ********** I am writing to request a religious exemption from [COMPANY NAME‚Äôs/COLLEGE NAME‚Äôs] COVID vaccine mandate. A concept taught and believed in historic Christian theology is that of Liberty of Conscience. The Apostle Paul taught that ‚Äúwhatever is not from faith is sin‚Äù (Rom. 14:23). This means that if a Christian cannot perform an action with faithful confidence that God would allow it, to do so anyway is to sin and to defile one‚Äôs conscience (1 Cor. 8:6). This doctrine of Liberty of Conscience presupposes that Christians may differ significantly in their understanding of how to apply God‚Äôs Word, and that each is bound to act in accordance with their understanding of it. So I understand that some Christians may differ from my reasoning below, but that does not negate my responsibility before God to not violate my conscience. Policies rendering Covid-19 vaccination mandatory have the distinct capacity to violate my Christian conscience in at least four ways, therefore I must refrain from the vaccination, lest I sin. First, although rules prohibiting infected employees from coming to the workplace are welcome, rules requiring employees to disclose their vaccination status or to place a foreign drug within their bodies conflict with my fundamental human right to privacy. Even vaccinated Christians may have a conscientious objection to disclosing their status with a view to protecting the liberties of their fellow employees. As a Christian whose conscience testifies that vaccination policies deprive co-workers of God-given rights, I cannot disclose my vaccination status without sinning against my neighbor and contributing to a hostile work environment. Second, there is a fundamental moral distinction between harming oneself or one‚Äôs neighbor passively or actively. An unvaccinated individual may inadvertently contract Covid-19, as with many viruses. In contrast, the individual who pursues vaccination must be an active participant in placing a foreign substance in their body, that has proven harmful and even fatal to some (especially between doses and/or prior to two weeks after the second dose). It is one thing for a healthy person to incur an illness, as divine providence would have it, by no intentional activity of their own. It is another thing for a healthy individual to intentionally utilize a drug that has had severe adverse effects in others, and possibly contribute to his/her own harm. As a Christian who views the contributing to your own harm as a violation of God‚Äôs Word, I cannot become vaccinated without sinning. Third, the long-term effects of all Covid-19 vaccines are unknown. Determination of exactly how unknown future consequences should come to bear on present decisions is a distinct matter of conscience, since there is no hard rule by which the unknown can be weighed. My conscience will not allow me to risk incurring unknown adverse consequences and thus I cannot become vaccinated without sinning. Fourth, Covid-19 vaccines were tested and developed using fetal cells (or fetal cell lines) taken from elective abortions. Christians have an interest in opposing and refusing to use medical products that encourage or validate the murder of the unborn. I am a Christian whose conscience will not allow me to use such medical products and cannot be vaccinated without sinning. I‚Äôm therefore asking for an exemption from the COVID vaccine mandate so that my conscience can remain clear before God. Thank you for your consideration. This was posted about Geisinger requiring the vax

CONDITIONAL JAB ACCEPTANCE The following is clever advice from a lawyer. ‚ÄúIf you are being forced to Vax in order to keep your job, here‚Äôs a great way to handle it ‚Ä¶ Conditional acceptance. The secret is NOT to refuse it.‚Äù The text follows. ‚ÄúI write with regard to the matter of potential covid vaccine and my desire to be fully informed and appraised of ALL facts before going ahead. I‚Äôd be most grateful if you could please provide the following information, in accordance with statutory legal requirements: 1. Can you please advise the approved legal status of any vaccine and if it is experimental? 2. Can you please provide details and assurances that the vaccine has been fully, independently and rigorously tested against control groups and the subsequent outcomes of those tests? 3. Can you please advise the entire list of contents of the vaccine I am to receive and if any are toxic to the body? 4. Can you please fully advise of all the adverse reactions associated with this vaccine since it‚Äôs introduction? 5. Can you please confirm that the vaccine you are advocating is NOT experimental mRNA gene altering therapy? 6. Can you please confirm that I will not be under any duress from yourselves as my employers, in compliance with the Nuremberg Code? 7. Can you please advise me of the likely risk of fatality should I be unfortunate to contract Covid 19 and the likelihood of recovery? 8. Can you please advise me if I were to experience any adverse reactions, is the manufacturer of the vaccine liable? If the manufacturer isn‚Äôt liable, will the company I‚Äôm currently employed with be responsible & liable as it is their request that I have the vaccine in order to carry on my employment? Once I have received the above information documented in full and I am satisfied that there is NO threat to my health, I will be happy to accept your offer to receive the treatment, but with certain conditions ‚Äì namely that: 1. You confirm in writing that I will suffer no harm. 2. Following acceptance of this, the offer must be signed by a fully qualified doctor who will take full legal and financial responsibility for any injuries occurring to myself, and/or from any interactions by authorized personnel regarding these procedures. 3. In the event that I should have to decline the offer of vaccination, please confirm that it will not compromise my position and that I will not suffer prejudice and discrimination as a result? Please respect my request for the above which is intended to ensure that my inalienable rights as a citizen are preserved and protected.‚Äù

column30: WARNING: MIDTERMS WON‚ÄôT BE EASY FOR REPUBLICANS. The usual big GOP advantage is with older voters who vote faithfully and conservatively. But a recent poll of 50+ age adults showed half want a nationwide vax mandate, 1/3 don‚Äôt. A quarter of 50+ folks feel socially isolated. Simply speaking, they are quite worried about COVID. And it‚Äôs the inverse of what scientific logic would predict. 61% of those who have been vaxxed want a mandate while the majority of the unvaxxed don‚Äôt. That is, there‚Äôs a split. Those who didn‚Äôt get vaxxed think the concerns are overblown; vaxxed still don‚Äôt feel protected enough and many opt to wear masks and don‚Äôt go out in public very much. What this means is that GOP had better be wise and well-reasoned, liberty-loving but compassionate in their message. This is new for Rs who usually command 60-68% of senior demographics. Dems use Vax and masks as a wedge issue against Rs. These attitudes have been prevalent in my church, so I practice a lot of understanding. The virus isn‚Äôt killing 10% of population like small pox or 30% like bubonic plague, It‚Äôs more like pneumonia which compounds already existing health difficulties. It‚Äôs serious if you are an old guyr like me. But if you come to peace with God over the subject and protect yourself, death losses it‚Äôs sting. Yet many fear. Government‚Äôs misinformation ticks me off. Most masks are worthless (holes larger than the virus!) or worse‚Äîthey make users huddle close in conversation which increases odds of infection. A mask mandate is like wearing garlic. But coercion is no way to get people to take the jab. Many won‚Äôt, just as only half of seniors take flue shots. Vaccines work for a time and natural immunity probably works much longer. So what is needed is for a candidate to make the fearful comfortable that he/she favors all precautions, but also supports every liberty for those who demand their freedom to choose. This is no issue for a narrow-minded firebrand. Instead, make Biden and his vax police pay the price of their fanaticism.

column30: CD23 Gonzales and CD2 Crenshaw voted YES! Eighty House Republicans voted with Democrats on Tuesday to pass the Immunization Infrastructure Modernization Act, which if passed by the Senate and signed into law would fund a federal vaccination database. H. R. 550, the government would provide $400 million in taxpayer dollars to fund ‚Äúimmunization system data modernization and expansion,‚Äù a system otherwise defined as ‚Äúa confidential, population-based, computerized database that records immunization doses administered by any health care provider to persons within the geographic area covered by that database.‚Äù The legislation paves the way for the government to give blue states millions in taxpayers funds to enforce vaccine mandates. According to the bill‚Äôs text, the government could award grants and cooperative agreements to health departments or other local governmental entities for agreeing to adopt the new data collection guidelines set by the CDC. Any agencies hoping to receive a grant must agree to comply with security standards to protect personal health information.

column30: Two weeks ago an anti-vaccine Facebook group called ‚ÄòWe Brought Vaxxed to the UK‚Äô started to disseminate a new and dangerous contagion: misinformation about Covid-19. It‚Äôs posts promote xenophobia, conspiracy theories and erroneous medical information about the disease and how it might be treated. One post claimed China was using the outbreak to cull the elderly, another suggested hand sanitiser causes cancer and a ‚Äúprobiotic yogurt suppository‚Äù was recommended as a cure. The group is just one of some 50 social media accounts being tracked by the Center for Countering Digital Hate (CCDH), a charity dedicated to preventing false and divisive lies and myths spreading across the web. ‚ÄúI took our file on these groups to Facebook executives to express our deep concern‚Äù, said CCDH chief executive Imran Ahmed. ‚ÄúBut nearly two weeks later, they have still not taken action to enforce their own policies and remove them.‚Äù Instead, believes Ahmed, the social media giant is trying to weather the storm through a PR offensive. ‚ÄúThis to obfuscate the central truth: that even when hate, bigotry and misinformation is pointed out to them, Facebook rarely shows the will to act,‚Äù he says. When Telegraph put this to Facebook, a company spokesperson said: ‚ÄúHarmful misinformation is not allowed on Facebook. We have deleted all of the content shared with us that breached our stringent harmful misinformation policies.‚Äù CCDH has been tracking a sample of health misinformation groups ‚Äì with a total membership of 800,000 ‚Äì since early February, when the Covid-19 pandemic was still in its infancy. Posts promoting establishment cover-ups, allegations that billionaires are making us ill for profit and pseudoscientific studies claiming vaccines will put your children in grave danger, have long been these group‚Äôs stock in trade. But in the last few weeks, says CCDH, they have pivoted to focus on Covid-19, promoting conspiracies and fake news across millions of users‚Äô timelines. At the same time, new groups dedicated to spreading misinformation about Covid-19 have sprung up. They are an odd mix of new and existing groups, ranging from anti vaccination campaigners to right wing extremists to Russian-linked peddlers of fake anti-western news. An important theme is coronavirus denial. In ‚ÄòWe Brought Vaxxed to the UK‚Äô, some 4,300 members have been trading posts which question the veracity of the coronavirus pandemic. One post claims the outbreak is just another ‚Äúdeadly measles story‚Äù pedalled by ‚Äúthe media‚Äù. Another describes Covid-19 a ‚ÄúCommon Cold Hoax‚Äù, suggesting it should be ignored. There is a confusing mix of truth and lies. CoronaVirus Truths, an open Facebook group with close to 1,000 members, includes posts sharing World Health Organization advice alongside conspiracy theories. One video from Kate Shemirani, an ‚Äúinfluencer‚Äù with 17,000 Facebook followers who describes herself as a ‚Äúnatural nurse in a toxic world‚Äù, was viewed more than 400,000 times. ‚ÄúJust before Christmas we had [been told] ‚Ä¶ we‚Äôre all going to die of measles,‚Äù she says, seven minutes into the video. ‚ÄúNow we‚Äôre suddenly all going to die of coronavirus. I‚Äôm not buying any of it‚Ä¶ I think it‚Äôs really important that we don‚Äôt just believe what the media tell us.‚Äù Restore Liability for Vaccine Makers, a Facebook group followed by almost 9,000 people, also has dangerous misinformation about the outbreak. After one user shared an op-ed titled ‚ÄúDoes the coronavirus exist?‚Äù other followers of the group responded: ‚ÄúI for one don't buy into the paranoia. When this is all said and done, I believe we will have fallen for a two trillion dollar scam."" A video by Luke Smith-Anderson, aka The Informed Father, a former NFL player turned anti-vax blogger who claims to ‚Äúspeak God‚Äôs Truth‚Äù, also made its way onto the Facebook page. In the post, which was watched by almost 17,000 people, Mr Anderson made efforts to debunk the outbreak, claiming: ‚ÄúWhat scares me is not the coronavirus but peoples reaction, society's reaction.. we're buying into the mass hysteria... You guys remember the measles hysteria last year?‚Äù ‚ÄúAnyone heard of the Zika virus,‚Äù he continued. ‚ÄúMass hysteria over the Zika virus? Well, apparently that's not a thing anymore‚Äù. Some of the other groups tracked by CCDH encourage members to share personal testimony of how their children developed problems after vaccination, often using pictures and videos of visibly ill children. ‚ÄúAfter the outbreak of COVID-19, we found a mother asking what to do about her child who had come down with a fever,‚Äù said Ahmed. ‚ÄúInstead of encouraging her to get her child tested or to seek medical advice, they discouraged her from doing so and advised instead rubbing lemon oil down the child‚Äôs spine to draw the fever from the brain, and placing slices of onion at her feet‚Äù. This was the most thorough, effective and enjoyable refutation I‚Äôve read. Thank God for people who can say things better than me. One caveat: I have no problem with profit made from anything in the medical industry. The profit motive drives business, and business drives innovation, efficiency, distribution, access and quality. That being said, like everything, it can be abused. But that abuse is not an excuse to denigrate legitimate science, or deny truth.
column34: This is a re-share of a post
column35:
Yo I‚Äôm not going to watch your 25-minute YouTube conspiracy video. I‚Äôm not even going to watch your 5-minute conspiracy video. This isn‚Äôt because I don‚Äôt have an open mind. This is because video is a shitty way to transmit information, specifically geared towards emotional manipulation, and I hate it. I can read probably about five times as fast as people speak, so if you want me to look at a write-up, I‚Äôll try to find a time when I have the emotional energy for it. One of my friends was nice enough to summarize parts of it for me, which I respond to below. This is another long one.

I want to address, specifically, the first thirteen seconds of the ‚ÄúPlandemic Documentary‚Äù conspiracy video, because that‚Äôs all I watched. It starts by saying Dr. Judy Mikovits ‚Äúhas been called one of the most accomplished scientists of her generation‚Äù. Snopes did a good article on who she is: https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/scientist-vaccine-jailed/
Basically she had done some reasonable science at some point, some of it on HIV, and then published a paper in Science about XMRV and chronic fatigue syndrome. The paper was retracted because nobody could replicate the findings, and it was concluded that the XMRV came entirely from laboratory contamination. Someone else wrote a poorly-sourced paper about how XMRV could have gotten into humans via vaccines, and the anti-vax/plague-enthusiast community jumped on this as a possible way that vaccines hurt people. Mikovits also ran into some troubles with the law for allegedly stealing lab equipment after being fired. She‚Äôs now basically off the deep end and popular in the anti-vax community. I would say that pretty much anything she says should be taken with SERIOUS skepticism.

The problem with a lot of conspiracy theories/videos usually comes down to this: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gish_gallop
It takes a lot more effort to refute and argue against false claims than it does to make them. I‚Äôm sure that somebody at some point will come up with a comprehensive point-by-point refutation of this video, it just takes a while. One of the bigger mistakes we‚Äôve made as a scientific community (and keep making) is that we let shit like this go unchecked for too long. It can be pretty obvious to someone with a scientific background (like the Bakersfield doctors bullshit) and still spread widely in the population.

-From what I can tell, a big claim in this video is that the pandemic isn‚Äôt that dangerous, and that the measures we‚Äôre taking are an overreaction. First off, I‚Äôd like to say that I have a very legitimate concern about the potential authoritarian consequences of what it‚Äôs going to take to track and treat patients. I have very serious concerns about the economic impact of what‚Äôs going on. I don‚Äôt think there‚Äôs a good way out of this, and I don‚Äôt think there are any completely good options. This shit sucks a LOT and it makes me really sad. What I don‚Äôt have time for is the infantile fantasy that those choices somehow don‚Äôt exist and that there‚Äôs some reason that this situation doesn‚Äôt actually suck as badly as it does. It‚Äôs possible that we‚Äôre overreacting as a society! It just really doesn‚Äôt seem likely. As I‚Äôve said before, anyone claiming certainty about what to do here is somewhere between being overconfident and just plain lying. What I can say is that the overwhelming evidence so far indicates that the measures we‚Äôre taking are going to mean the American death toll of this disease being hundreds of thousands instead of millions.

-SARS-CoV-2 wasn‚Äôt engineered in a lab: https://www.livescience.com/coronavirus-not-human-made-in-lab.html
People have been studying viruses for a long time. Part of that study involves manipulating them. There was a whole controversy a while back about making more lethal flu strains. That doesn‚Äôt mean SARS-CoV-2 wasn‚Äôt naturally occurring. It may seem suspicious that this pandemic is happening, but we as a scientific community have talked about this possibility for DECADES. SARS-CoV-1, MERS, recent flu pandemics, etc. weren‚Äôt this big just because we were lucky. Nobody is talking about how we made those in a lab (they weren‚Äôt) because nobody cares about them.

-I generally agree that nobody should profit off a vaccine. That‚Äôs a problem with capitalism, and the US specifically, and is true of everything in the medical community.

-About MDs being incentivized to report coronavirus cases (from a prior comment of mine):
This is a common conspiracy theory. People who claim physicians are over-reporting deaths typically point to the (true) fact that hospitals get paid a bonus for Covid patients, so there's a financial incentive for claiming that a person died from Covid. This has a few major holes in it:

1) Falsifying a medical record is illegal, hospitals get audited by CMS (Medicare) all the time to make sure the charts are accurate, and there are huge fines for lying.
2) Hospitals do get paid extra, but physicians don't, which is (truncated)

column30: Out of Touch Former PVUSD Board Member Sue Skidmore has filed an application for the PVUSD Board Seat vacated by Stephanie Brown in November Who is Former PVUSD Board Member Sue Skidmore? Skidmore sat on the PVUSD Governing Board from 2000 to 2020. Her Facebook posts are a collection of pro-RedForEd Socialism, anti-Trump, anti-Ducey, anti-pro life, anti-Justice Kavanaugh and anti-2nd amendment ramblings. Many student-athlete parents remember when Skidmore took to her personal blog (drsuzeespouses.com) in an August 2020 post titled ""COVID and Sports"" where she mocked concerned parents and their student-athletes (see https://drsuzeespouses.com/2020/08/09/covid-and-sports/). In August 2021, Skidmore reminisced about her August 2020 blog post in a blog post titled ""Russian Roulette?"", where she equated parents standing against mask mandates with Russian Roulette. Skidmore wrote the following: In my boredom last week, I watched the public comment section of several local school board meetings. I was absolutely astounded! One by one, young parents urged, demanded, or yelled at the school board: These are MY kids! You‚Äôve NO right to tell them to wear masks! Don‚Äôt you dare quarantine my child. My child has rights; I‚Äôm his parent, and I‚Äôll decide if he wears a mask. You can‚Äôt make my child get a vaccination. Don‚Äôt you dare talk to my child about her social-emotional health. The more I watched, the more disturbed I became. Russian roulette? With children? A ‚Äúpotentially deadly‚Äù game. Young parents standing on some ideology which will undoubtedly bring hospitalizations, permanent physical damage, or even death. The news is filled with stories of naysayers who died simply because of their own ignorance, and I‚Äôm OK with that. But I‚Äôm appalled parents would risk their children‚Äôs lives. Would they give their kid a gun with only one bullet and spin the chamber? Skidmore concluded this blog post by writing, ""COVID doesn‚Äôt discriminate, and COVID doesn‚Äôt give a rat‚Äôs hind end about MY rights.""(see https://drsuzeespouses.com/2021/08/15/russian-roulette/) In September 2021, Skidmore wrote a blog post titled ""The Only Source of Knowledge...?"" where she smugly writes the following: I absolutely know there‚Äôs nothing I can say to convince an anti-vax person to do the deed. Your choice. Your science. Fine. Then don‚Äôt go to the hospital if you fall ill. Take your dewormer pill, drink your bleach, eat your fish food, or use your ultra-violet light. Just stay out of health care facilities saving those who want to live for their families. Thank you. The full blog post can be read here: https://drsuzeespouses.com/.../the-only-source-of-knowledge/ Sue Skidmore is completely out of touch with PV Parents and has no business serving their interests on the PV Governing Board. Please write Maricopa County School Superintendent, PVUSD resident and taxpayer Steve Watson and let him know that you don't support Sue Skidmore. Mr. Watson can be emailed at Superintendent@maricopa.gov. PVUSD Taxpayers proudly endorses the appointment of PVUSD Parent and Student Advocate Lisa Farr.

column30: Rep. Chip Roy (R-TX) on Monday blasted Democrats who want to police private text messages, following a report that Biden allies want to use SMS carriers to dispel misinformation about the COVID-19 vaccine. Roy appeared on ‚ÄúTucker Carlson Tonight‚Äù in part to address a Monday report from Politico that claimed the Biden administration is ‚Äúcasting conservative opponents of its Covid-19 vaccine campaign as dangerous and extreme‚Äù and plans to work with SMS carriers to suppress anti-vaccine sentiment even in private texts. As Carlson said, per Fox News: On Monday, Politico reported plans from the Biden administration to battle misinformation in regards to the COVID-19 vaccine. ‚ÄúThe White House has decided to hit back harder on misinformation and scare tactics after Republican lawmakers and conservative activists pledged to fight the administration‚Äôs stated plans to go ‚Äòdoor-to-door‚Äô to increase vaccination rates,‚Äù Politico wrote. ‚ÄúThe pushback will include directly calling out social media platforms and conservative news shows that promote such tactics.‚Äù The article continues how pro-Biden groups and the Democratic National Committee will work with SMS carriers to ‚Äúdispel misinformation‚Äù in peoples‚Äô private text messages. ‚ÄúBiden allied groups, including the Democratic National Committee, are also planning to engage fact-checkers more aggressively and work with SMS carriers to dispel misinformation about vaccines that is sent over social media and text messages,‚Äù Politico reports. Describing the DNC‚Äôs alleged tactics to interfere with private text messages as ‚Äúpatently absurd,‚Äù Roy said, ‚ÄúThis whole issue of the vaccine hits very close to home for me. My father, in 1949 when he was seven years old, he was diagnosed with polio. And my grandmother was nursing my grandfather, who was sick with cancer ‚Äî he died that fall ‚Äî and then raised my dad as a single mom, nursed him to health. And he lived his whole life ravaged by it. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm grateful to have a vaccine for me, vaccines for my sons and my daughter,‚Äù Roy continued. ‚ÄúI believe in vaccines, and I‚Äôll be damned if I‚Äôm going to allow Democrats ‚Ä¶ come in and start calling you an anti-vax quack or call me an anti-vaxxer because I dare to believe that it is our duty as Americans, our patriotic duty, to make decisions for ourselves, not have Democrats looking at our text messages, not having them try to shame the American people into taking a vaccine.‚Äù ‚ÄúThis is the danger we face as Americans, the forgotten men and women out here who are getting rolled over by the power of government, but also the oligopoly, these corporate cronies who are trying to use all of this to fatten their own wallets,‚Äù Roy added. Roy spoke out last week against the Biden administration for aggressively pushing COVID-19 vaccines, prompting a White House official to reportedly scoff at his concerns. As The Daily Wire reported: A White House official reportedly dismissed concerns Rep. Chip Roy (R-TX) made this week regarding the Biden administration‚Äôs recent move to go door-to-door pushing the COVID-19 vaccine. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm just sick and God-darn tired of the Left, and this government, dictating to me, frankly, anything at all,‚Äù Roy told RealClearPolitics White House reporter Philip Wegmann in an interview. ‚ÄúBack the F off. That‚Äôs my message to the White House.‚Äù When Wegmann reached out to a White House official to ask if they had a response to Roy, the official texted, ‚Äúlol no.‚Äù

column30: JUDGE BLOCKS BIDEN'S VAX MANDATE FOR HEALTHCARE WORKERS NATION-WIDE Shared by https://www.facebook.com/BoykinForCongress/ #Boykin4Congress BoykinForCongress.com #GoRightNews GoRightNews.com A federal judge in Louisiana issued a nationwide preliminary injunction yesterday, forcing Biden to halt his covid vaccine mandate for healthcare workers across the country. Back up: The Biden regime issued its vaccine mandate on November 4 for all healthcare workers who are full-time, part-time, volunteer, and contract employees working at a healthcare facility receiving Medicaid or Medicaid funding. How it was stopped: Louisiana's Attorney General Jeff Landry, along with AG's from 13 additional states across the country, argued that Biden does not have the constitutional authority to issue mandates. Judge Terry Doughty agreed with the Attorney Generals, saying: ""If the executive branch is allowed to usurp the power of the legislative branch to make laws, two of the three powers conferred by our Constitution would be in the same hands. If human nature and history teach anything, it is that civil liberties face grave risks when governments proclaim indefinite states of emergency. During a pandemic such as this one, it is even more important to safeguard the separation of powers set forth in our Constitution to avoid erosion of our liberties."" What happens next: If Biden appeals the Judge's decision, it will be taken up by the 5th Circuit Court of Appeals in New Orleans, which earlier this month already blocked Biden's vaccine mandate on businesses with more than 100 workers. So Biden is cornered by good judges. By the way - Donald Trump is the one who nominated Judge Terry Doughty, back in 2017. [Source: Reuters, Louisiana's Daily Advertiser]

There is a good chance that Derek Chauvin could be found not guilty of murdering George Floyd. If so, we will see well-organized, well-funded, and well-promoted by the mainstream media, violent riots across the US.

It's also likely we will see these riots even if Chauvin's found guilty.

I released a press release last week calling on Governor DeWine, along with every town & city leader in Ohio, to go on PUBLIC RECORD with their emergency preparedness plans and what they will make happen when this mayhem begins.

How they will put down any violence, vandalism, looting, arson, and assault.

What their warnings are to anyone who would commit crimes in Ohio. 

What those criminals will face if they again do what was done across the country, and across Ohio, last summer.

So far, I have heard NOTHING. How about you?

They have no excuse for their silence. It must be intentional.

The #1 job of these leaders is to protect the lives & property of Ohioans. They appear to be unprepared & deaf to our requests.

I strongly urge you to call, write, email, and visit all of your elected representatives IMMEDIATELY to light a fire under their backsides so we know their position on this important matter & how they're going to protect us & keep us safe!

""A vaccine enforcement mechanism has been included as part of the $3.5 trillion 'Build Back Better Bill' which allows for a tenfold increase in fines for employers
The increased fines on employers could run as high as $70,000 for serious infractions, and $700,000 for wilful or repeated violations
The vaccine mandate applies to businesses with 100 or more employees 
The fines could be applied per incident, meaning that only a small number of incidents could quickly bankrupt a company

Please read to the end of this email to absorb its full content and impact, and please pass it along. Los Angeles Sheriff Alex Villanueva, who has opposed local efforts at vaccine mandates, is scheduled to appear ""live and unscripted"" on KFI (640AM) tomorrow night (Sunday 8/29) from 8-10pm. He will be taking calls from listeners. Five-item List: No. 1 We need to call/email CA legislators (list at the end, from Save CA) on an abrupt gut-and-amend maneuver by San Francisco's Sen. Scott Wiener (again), with the intent of mandating vax passes for nearly all human activity in the state. For out-of-state-readers, what CA legislators want to do is already operational in Illinois (Vax Verify portals through Experian, see at the end of this email), which is one reason the Chicago PD union went on record as 100% opposed to Mayor Lori Lightfoot's vaccine mandate (""'Hell No' for us.""). https://www.foxnews.com/us/chicago-police-against-vaccine-mandate No. 2 What you should know about CA AB455 What began as ""Bay Bridge Corridor"" legislation - (AB455) https://leginfo.legislature.ca.gov/faces/billTextClient.xhtml?bill_id=202120220AB455 - has morphed into a full-blown ""medical papers"" mandate statewide, confirmed by Assemblyman Kevin Kiley yesterday in his blog post: (8/27/21, excerpt) ""A chilling new bill would require vaccination papers to enter restaurants, gyms, movie theaters, and more. I will fight in every way I can to stop AB 455. This is not who we are as a state or a country."" https://blog.electkevinkiley.com/now-or-never/ No. 3 Reporter Katy Grimes covered this deeply sinister bait-and-switch in an easy format for the California Globe. It can be read here: https://californiaglobe.com/section-2/california-legislature-guts-transportation-bill-to-create-vaccine-mandate-on-private-industry/ No. 4 Save California released details on AB 455 yesterday along with contact recommendations and phone numbers for legislators: https://savecalifornia.com/ image.png Democrat state legislators scheme for a statewide 'vaccine passport' It was predictable and now it's here. A squad of Democrat state legislators want to require vaccination proof nearly everywhere you shop, do business, or visit in California. The amendments to AB 455 (currently a transportation bill) would essentially segregate Californians by unfairly discriminating against, denying service to, and even impoverishing health-conscious citizens. In addition, the proposed bill would require every employee anywhere in California to get the ""jab"" or take a weekly test showing a ""negative"" result. This is so wrong. Requiring ""Covid vaccine passports"" statewide would discriminate against, segregate, and punish health-conscious Californians who are wisely resisting ""Covid vaccines"" because they know these injections have killed tens of thousands and injured millions: U.S.: 9,027 dead, 1,517,211 injured Europe: 21,766 dead, 2 million+ injured U.K.: 1,559 dead, 1,135,579 injured Brazil: 32,000+ dead AB 455, if it's introduced early next week, as proposed, would be ""gutted and amended"" by six Democrats, including the Legislature's chief medical tyrant Richard Pan of Sacramento and the very immoral Scott Wiener of San Francisco. Its worst part would require most Californians to show proof of injection with a ""Covid vaccine"" by displaying a card or paper or a digital document -- or else they cannot enter most ""places of public accommodation,"" which is very broadly defined in California law to apply to nearly every type of commerce, exceeding even this exhaustive list in the federal ADA law: (A) an inn, hotel, motel, or other place of lodging, except for an establishment located within a building that contains not more than five rooms for rent or hire and that is actually occupied by the proprietor of such establishment as the residence of such proprietor; (B) a restaurant, bar, or other establishment serving food or drink; (C) a motion picture house, theater, concert hall, stadium, or other place of exhibition or entertainment; (D) an auditorium, convention center, lecture hall, or other place of public gathering; (E) a bakery, grocery store, clothing store, hardware store, shopping center, or other sales or rental establishment; (F) a laundromat, dry-cleaner, bank, barber shop, beauty shop, travel service, shoe repair service, funeral parlor, gas station, office of an accountant or lawyer, (truncated)

column30: **Enough: Protests, Election, Covid** **Dear Patriots,** We promised you more information on the rallies over the weekend. We have that and more items of interest. **1-** Senator Ron Johnson convened a panel of experts that the left has tried to silence and keep from you. That is not working out well for them. In less than 24 hours, the video of Senator Johnson's panel had over 800,000 views. We alerted you to this rare elected politician a week ago. [You can see him in action here](https://rumble.com/vt62y6-covid-19-a-second-opinion.html), along with hearing vital information from a host of medical professionals, none of whom are Fauci. [(The Federalist)](https://thefederalist.com/2022/01/25/sen-ron-johnsons-latest-covid-panel-reveals-800000-people-and-counting-want-a-second-opinion/?fbclid=IwAR0xxqkuXYg3ygBJUt-4c8nCLe7AOW6GQTZexI5dOO8nNXzhXvn9JGZ0z_Q) **Sen. Ron Johnson's Latest Covid Panel Reveals 800,000 People And Counting Want 'A Second Opinion'** **QUOTE:** *Republican Sen. Ron Johnson of Wisconsin hosted a panel of experts on Capitol Hill on Monday for an event dubbed ""COVID-19: A Second Opinion,"" to discuss early treatment of the coronavirus and so-called vaccines ‚Äî and there was quite an audience for it.* *Although Johnson's office invited the most prominent federal bureaucrats to the panel, including Rochelle Walensky, Anthony Fauci, Francis Collins, and Jeff Zients, none of them showed up. Instead, some tech-suppressed world experts turned out to speak on topics ranging from hospital treatment and Covid shots to early at-home treatment and mitigation strategies.* *Perhaps that's why just 24 hours after Johnson's panel, the video had more than three-quarters of a million views on Rumble ‚Äî the platform the sitting U.S. senator uses since having been censored five times on Google-owned YouTube.* **_______________** **2-** One of the most upsetting statistic to come from the Johnson Panel was that there is a massive increase in cancer among our military. Last October, **Defending The Republic sued the Department of Defense** on behalf of military members who have refused the vax. [Here is a link on the filing of that lawsuit.](https://defendingtherepublic.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/10/Florida-Suit-1.pdf) [(The Liberty Daily)](https://thelibertydaily.com/bombshell-cover-up-cancer-diagnoses-in-the-military-rose-over-three-fold-since-jabs-were-introduced/) **Bombshell Cover-Up: Cancer Diagnoses in the Military Rose Over THREE-FOLD Since Jabs Were Introduced** **QUOTE:** *Yesterday's ""COVID-19: A Second Opinion"" panel hosted in Washington D.C. by Senator Ron Johnson exposed bombshell after bombshell as fresh data keeps pouring in that shows the Covid-19 ""vaccines"" are neither safe nor effective.* *Conservative commentator Daniel Horowitz from The Blaze posted a follow-up bombshell of information he received from one of the panelists, attorney Thomas Renz: I can share with you from attorney Thomas Renz that the number of cancer diagnoses in the military's DMED system went from a 5-year average (2016-2020) of 38,700 per year to 114,645 in the first 11 months of 2021. This is a predominately young population.* *Unlike VAERS where the naysayers can suggest that anyone can submit, this is only by military doctors and quantifies every single ICD code in the military for tri care billing of Humana. This is the ultimate defined and finite population with excellent surveillance.* *The testimony that Renz delivered should be enough to compel our government to immediately halt the vaccine push, reevaluate the data that they have, and release it all to the public for independent scrutiny. They won't do this, of course, because they have a universal vaccination agenda that they will not willingly stop. It will take a concerted effort by patriots to share this data and expose the powers-that-be for what they're trying to do to the people.* **_______________** **3-** **In election news,** there seems to be a lot happening in Wisconsin. This still has to go through the Rules Committee and the Senate but it is amazing that the vote even happened! [(The Gateway Pundit)](https://www.thegatewaypundit.com/2022/01/huge-breaking-news-wisconsin-assembly-votes-withdraw-10-electors-joe-biden-2020-election-video/) **Wisconsin Assembly Votes to Withdraw Its 10 Electors for Joe Biden in 2020 Election** **QUOTE:** *The Wisconsin Assembly voted unanimously in a voice vote in a privileged resolution to withdraw its 10 electors for Joe Biden in the 2020 election.* *The voice vote was unanimous and passed the assembly earlier this evening.* *The legislation will now move forward to the Rules Committee in the Wisconsin Assembly and to the Wisconsin Senate, bill 743, for immediate confirmation.* *How it happened: Assembly rule 43 resolution or joint resolution relating to the officers, members, former members, procedures, or organization of the assembly or legislature is privileged in that it may be offered under any order (truncated)

column30: AB 455 MANDATES VAX?!!@$):(!??! https://www.instagram.com/tv/CTIBCm4p7JX/?utm_medium=copy_link

People ask me why I get down so much on folks wearing masks -- ""hey, Mike, if it's a person's choice why are you so opposed to it?"" And they misread me entirely. Honestly, I don't care if you want to dress up like a cow or even those folks who like to be furbies (whatever the heck that is). While I've always been amused by the Japanese (who, almost no matter where they are, have been wearing masks for over half a century now -- BTW, had ZERO effect on the virus of course) I don't put them down for it. Everyone has their own phobias, me included. What I mind (and what you should as well) are those places that REQUIRE masks. And you should mind this even though you intend to wear a mask the rest of your life. Because once the government has learned they can control the sheeple like this, it will never end. The next step is to require the vax -- and if you think that won't happen, you haven't been paying attention. Three months ago I said mask wearing was going to be mandatory most places. No one believed me then, and you won't believe me now but the mandatory vax IS coming and you won't be able to opt out. It will happen just like the masks -- some places will require proof you've had it, and those places will grow until you won't be able to get in ANYWHERE (even a grocery store) without showing this proof. So it won't be ""mandatory"" in that no one will come to your home and hold your arms to give you a shot, but it will be required the same way masks are now being required almost everywhere. Because they can, and because Big Pharma will make BILLIONS from it. And then the chip... but by that time it will be too late. You will already be doomed. You will be chipped and controlled and all you will say is ""how did this happen?"" And it happened because you didn't care. If you don't fight back against mask wearing NOW, regardless of what you do personally, you will pay for it in the end. Just don't say I didn't warn you.

Yeah, I've written about this elsewhere but I wouldn't take a vax Gates was involved with if a gun was to my head (because they'd have to take mine away from me first and THAT wouldn't happen). Watch out folks, they want to MANDATE this vax.

column30: Kelly Slater to be deported if he tries to enter Australia because he does not support the governments ridiculous mandatory vaccination policies.
column34: Australian Free Independent Press Network
column35:
NEWS FLASH: Surfing champion Kelly Slater will be treated the same way as Novak Djokovic if he tries to enter Australia while unvaccinated, Greg Hunt has declared.

The federal Health Minister said on Thursday that US surfer Slater ‚Äì who has opposed mandatory vaccination and is set to compete in two World Surf League (WSL) events in Australia ‚Äì sent home if he tried to enter the country.

‚ÄúI think we‚Äôve been pretty clear with the Novak Djokovic case of no vax no play,‚Äù Mr Hunt told Channel 9.

Tasmanian Senator Jacqui Lambie also weighed in on Slater‚Äòs Australian prospects.

‚ÄúYou might want to tell Kelly Slater we are not the only country putting our foot down on this,‚Äù Ms Lambie said.

‚ÄúMaybe Stockholm syndrome can now change its name to Melbourne/Australia syndrome,‚Äù Slater posted on Instagram earlier this month.

‚ÄúIt‚Äôs sad to see the celebrated division by the ‚Äòvirtuous‚Äô vaccinated ‚Ä¶ so much brainwashed hatred in people‚Äôs hearts regardless of vax status.‚Äù

ALLISON LANGDON:

How do you feel about surfing legend Kelly Slater who has not declared his vaccination status? Is there any chance he's going to get into Australia for the World Surfing Championships this year?

GREG HUNT:
I think we've been pretty clear with the Novak Djokovic case of no-vax, no-play. That's a pretty simple message. Doesn't matter what sport, and we're even-handed. I hope he gets vaccinated and I hope he comes.

KARL STEFANOVIC:
Greg Hunt, good to talk to you.

They are not anti-vax. They are against an experimental vaccine, with no demonstrable benefits and they know that it hasn‚Äôt been tested properly. People who would like to submit written comment can do so by going to: ‚Ä™lacouncilfile.com‚Ä¨ ‚Ä¢ Click on advanced search ‚Ä¢ Enter council file: 21-0878 ‚Ä¢ Click search ‚Ä¢ Click on 21-0878 on the right side of page ‚Ä¢ Click on the New icon at the top of the page to submit your comment. 21-0878 (CFMS) Below are some talking points: * A vaccine passport system would create a two-class medical apartheid system, immunity caste system, and would further the gap in equality, especially disproportionate numbers from some of our most vulnerable communities, such as people who are low-income, have disabilities, or are homeless, as well as more than 40 percent of people over age 65, including immigrant communities and communities of color who are already subject to over-policing and surveillanceÔøΩ. Requiring COVID-19 vaccine passports for taking part in everyday life such as, but not limited to, attending a sporting event, patronizing a restaurant, or going to a movie theater would create two classes of citizens based on vaccination; and it‚Äôs illegal according to the UNRUH CIVIL RIGHTS ACT.ÔøΩ Other treatments and therapies are available as an alternative. ÔøΩAny form of coercion via medical mandates, vaccine Passports, digital QR code or any verification to show proof of vaccination violates California Health and Safety codes: 24171 ""right of individuals to determine what is done to their own bodies."" and 24172(J) ""Be given the opportunity to decide to consent or not to consent to a medical experiment without the intervention of any element of force, fraud, deceit, duress, coercion, or undue influence on the subject‚Äôs decision.""ÔøΩUniversally accepted codes of medical ethics, including the Nuremberg Code and the Declaration of Helsinki, absolutely prohibit any form of coercion to make individuals participate in a medical experiment.ÔøΩ All currently available COVID-19 is authorized for emergency use, regardless if emergency use status changes, or becomes FDA approved, therefore it must remain voluntary under the Nuremberg Trial Codes; the Declaration of Helsinki, and California law. ÔøΩCounty Department of Public Health and CHHS acknowledges there are many instances where an individual, along with their doctor, decide that being vaccinated may be unsafe; and a vaccine passport or verification system discriminates against those who cannot receive the vaccine.ÔøΩVaccine passports, or arbitrary state and county guidelines, do not take into consideration the large number of citizens who have contracted and recovered from COVID-19 and are therefore naturally immune as Covid survivors.ÔøΩ It will not stop at COVID-19 vaccines. Once in place, it will allow the coercion of any and all vaccines, booster shots, or ‚Äúso-called‚Äù requirements.
