column30: The original interview was about our research on the Pfizer vaccine, which found that the antibody levels it generates are not as good at neutralising the Delta variant than against the original Wuhan strain ‚Äì a simple update on likely vaccine protection. But the widely shared versions of the video were often edited, or taken out of context, to make me out to be some sort of supervillain, or the unlikely hero of the anti-vax world. In some videos, I‚Äôm shown playing the part of the brave dissenter inside the establishment, blowing the whistle against some imagined harm of the vaccine. In another, I‚Äôm introduced as the head of the ‚ÄúUK bioweapons programme‚Äù, being caught admitting that the Covid vaccine could somehow destroy your immune system. Like the virus itself, the videos seemed to be mutating and spreading, with new, more virulent variants catching on online. One of the most widely viewed videos created a convoluted and conspiratorial narrative involving vaccines, alien DNA and abortion which was repeated over and over ‚Äì and featured the same clip of me replayed over and over at various points.

column30: Why is there no collaboration between social and medical science during the pandemic? A particularly interesting issue that's arisen during the pandemic is the absolute lack of a synergistic collaboration between social science and medical science. Asia (from west to east) and the Pacific Islands have, on average, tremendously outperformed the West (excluding New Zealand and Australia). India (which is among the most poorly performing countries in Asia) has less than half the COVID-19 death per million rate of Ontario. Obviously, this is because of behavioral interventions and not medical interventions. By the time you're intubated, you're at death's door. I still fail to understand why no medical scientists looked at developing nations, scratched their heads, and asked why are India, Sri Lanka, Thailand, Vietnam, Philippines, Indonesia, Bhutan, Pakistan, Malaysia, and several other Asian countries doing so much better than Canada. Comparing us to the US, UK, Czech Republic, and several other Western nations is damning with faint praise. Obviously, we must push for 90% vax rates. However, Western negligence at the beginning of the pandemic has put us in the position in which we find ourselves today. I've attached a link to a manuscript that we currently have under peer-review at scientific journal. It's worth reading and understanding. #publichealth #covid19 #vaccines #vaccinepassports #myhealth #freedoms #science #socialscience #collaboration #medicalresearch #pandemic #publicpolicy #masks #physicaldistancing #airborne #covid19ontario #covid19canada

He‚Äôs met with Sean Hannity more times this term than he‚Äôs met with his own Lieutenant Governor. This hypocrisy is now the platform of the new ‚ÄúGOP.‚Äù It‚Äôs more of the same. Secretly vaccinated Republican Congresspeople applauding low vaccination rates. There is Potential Liability on Employers or Universities that Mandate Vaccines if an Employee or Student suffers any Side Effects or Death from a mandatory EUA vaccine. column35:
So a friend of mine just sent this email...
Have a look (hope the links work).

You folks are probably already familiar with this page but even though I watched the January committee meetings online I didn't find some of the bills listed in olis. This page was not in the regular system of olis. But I did find some new bills I didn't know about at this link, it has all the bills so far:  
https://www.oregonlegislature.gov/bills_laws/listbills/CurrentSessionBills.html

Here are the election bills I have found thus far: 
HB4044: https://olis.oregonlegislature.gov/liz/2022R1/Measures/Overview/HB4044  Reduces number of electors who must be registered as member of minor political party in order for minor political party to retain political party status from one-half of one percent to one-quarter of one percent of total number of registered electors in state.

HB4133: https://olis.oregonlegislature.gov/liz/2022R1/Measures/Overview/HB4133   Requires electronic voter registration system to allow qualified individual to register to vote if individual has Social Security number.

HB4136: https://olis.oregonlegislature.gov/liz/2022R1/Measures/Overview/HB4136   Requires Secretary of State to establish digital voting system to allow specified electors to digitally request, receive, mark, verify and cast ballot.

HB4147: https://olis.oregonlegislature.gov/liz/2022R1/Measures/Overview/HB4147  Allows persons convicted of felony to register to vote, update voter registration and vote in elections while incarcerated.

column35:
Well... wrote my letter to all Oregon legislators today. RULE #1 DON'T MAKE THEM LONG  (oh well, guess I don't comply with my own rules :) 
Truly a paragraph is long enough... for them to process :) 
xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
Hello
Well and again, I see another Republican Legislator suffers a reprimand in the Oregon Legislature.
""RULES WE HAVE RULES, AND YOU MUST SUBMIT TO THE RULES AND LAWS WE MAKE"".

What a double standard ""concerning  rules""... :( 

Seems the very Legislature that admonished Sen. Boquist, Rep. Nearman and Sen Heard have violated some major rules.
(Coarse even in that, while some others of both parties have violated social behavior I can only name 3 that have been driven out of office over sexual misconduct (Rep Hernadez, Sen Kruse come to mind)... but what of Senate President Peter Courtney ? my understanding is he has a history too... and I hear he had court subpoenas he never attended... Is that true, how the hell can that even be ? 

LET'S TALK ABOUT RULES !
The Constitution is THE RULE... by which all laws must be judged.
And yet... because of a 1% killer virus (at best) the Oregon Legislature held session in Dec. 2020, and Then the short session in 2021  and 1 of the 2 Special sessions behind closed doors. Truly shutting the people out of the process...  AND VIOLATING THE BILL OF RIGHTS !

It was ok in 2002 when Kate Brown and other Democrat Legislators walked out of Session... but some how it was disastrous when in 2019 Republicans walked out... and to think, Republicans were Defending People from a Legislative Majority hell bent on attacking 2nd Amendment Rights and the Right to be secure in their Person ( Forced Vaccination ) WHAT THE HELL HAPPENED TO THE NUREMBURG ACT !.... MUCH LESS THE 4TH AMENDMENT.
(PS... the vax is a experimental drug by definition. And while we have proven medications that work)

MASK MANDATES !
My butt... how crazy that you demand masks in the legislature, while Legislators are exempt from the forced vaccination that so many State, Medical and private sector ""essential workers"" have had forced on them.
When Gov. Kate made the 1st Mandate back in Feb 2021... SOS Shamia Fagan was in a group of over 35 people unmasked (In violation of the RULES ?)
Well let's don't forget the recent mass gathering in DC... where Double Standard Gov. Kate and House Speaker Kotek were politicking with out masks and not social distancing.

YOU KNOW... out of the 50 States only 5 have ""rules"" regarding Masks and Vax... ( My guess is most in those states no longer suffer the RULES.
Why should they... with Record numbers of illegals crossing our Borders (unmasked, un vaxed, and with no PAPERS !)

Today if I counted discarded Plastic Bags... they would be less than the polluted masks I see in parking lots where young kids might pick them up to wear and look Cool like Adults :( 

RULES !... How is it the legislature, AG and others allowed Gov. Kate to extend Mandates with out the Approval of the Oregon Legislature :(   OREGON IS TRULY LAWLESS !

RULES... well finally I should mention ADA (American Dissabilitys Act). Your Rules and Mandates Discriminate against the Deaf , who can't read the lips and read the body language, so they can comprehend the conversations.
I wonder what damage we are doing to the minds of children... they don't see body language behind masks. Not to mention they will grow up believing you have to wear a mask 24-7 because the world suddenly changed one day in 2021 :(

SCIENCE MATTERS (maybe).
But how is it that Doctors promote wearing of masks... when in fact the MFG of the N95 mask states that it does not protect against viruses....
I will leave you with some foot notes (if it matters).
Mark

VAERS data released today by the CDC included a total of 856,919 reports of adverse events from all age groups following COVID vaccines, including 18,078 deaths and 131,027 serious injuries between Dec. 14, 2020, and Oct. 29, 2021. Data released today by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) showed that between Dec. 14, 2020, and Oct. 29, 2021, a total of 856,919 adverse events following COVID vaccines were reported to the Vaccine Adverse Event Reporting System (VAERS). The data included a total of 18,078 reports of deaths ‚Äî an increase of 459 over the previous week. There were 127,457 reports of serious injuries, including deaths, during the same time period ‚Äî up 3,570 compared with the previous week. Excluding ‚Äúforeign reports‚Äù to VAERS, 634,609 adverse events, including 8,284 deaths and 52,685 serious injuries, were reported in the U.S. between Dec. 14, 2020, and Oct. 29, 2021. Of the 8,284 U.S. deaths reported as of Oct. 29, 10% occurred within 24 hours of vaccination, 15% occurred within 48 hours of vaccination and 26% occurred in people who experienced an onset of symptoms within 48 hours of being vaccinated. This week‚Äôs U.S. data for 12- to 17-year-olds show: 22,584 total adverse events, including 1,383 rated as serious and 28 reported deaths. Two of the 28 deaths were suicides. The most recent deaths include a 12-year-old girl from South Carolina (VAERS I.D. 1784945) who hemorrhaged 22 days after receiving Pfizer‚Äôs COVID vaccine, a 13-year-old girl from Maryland (VAERS I.D. 1815096) who died 15 days after receiving her first dose of Pfizer‚Äôs COVID vaccine from a heart condition and a 17-year-old female from Texas (VAERS I.D. 1815295 who experienced an acute hyperglycemic crisis 33 days after being vaccinated. Another recent death involves a 12-year-old girl (VAERS I.D. 1784945) who died from a respiratory tract hemorrhage 22 days after receiving her first dose of Pfizer‚Äôs vaccine. 59 reports of anaphylaxis among 12- to 17-year-olds where the reaction was life-threatening, required treatment or resulted in death ‚Äî with 96% of cases attributed to Pfizer‚Äôs vaccine. 547 reports of myocarditis and pericarditis (heart inflammation) with 539 cases attributed to Pfizer‚Äôs vaccine. 126 reports of blood clotting disorders, with all cases attributed to Pfizer. This week‚Äôs U.S. VAERS data, from Dec. 14, 2020, to Oct. 29, 2021, for all age groups combined, show: 19% of deaths were related to cardiac disorders. 54% of those who died were male, 42% were female and the remaining death reports did not include gender of the deceased. The average age of death was 72.7. As of Oct. 29, 4,206 pregnant women reported adverse events related to COVID vaccines, including 1,320 reports of miscarriage or premature birth. Of the 3,090 cases of Bell‚Äôs Palsy reported, 51% were attributed to Pfizer vaccinations, 41% to Moderna and 8% to J&J. 705 reports of Guillain-Barr√© syndrome, with 41% of cases attributed to Pfizer, 31% to Moderna and 28% to J&J. 2,072 reports of anaphylaxis where the reaction was life-threatening, required treatment or resulted in death. 10,686 reports of blood clotting disorders. Of those, 4,698 reports were attributed to Pfizer, 3,815 reports to Moderna and 2,119 reports to J&J. 3,030 cases of myocarditis and pericarditis with 1,899 cases attributed to Pfizer, 998 cases to Moderna and 123 cases to J&J‚Äôs COVID vaccine. column30: justthenews.com Whistleblower bombshell: DOD medical data reveals surges in oft-cited vax 'adverse events' in 2021 By Natalia Mittelstadt 4 - 5 minutes Military medical whistleblowers have come forward with a trove of data on vaccine safety that they claim is the most accurate available. On Monday, Sen. Ron Johnson (R-Wisc.) hosted ""COVID-19: A Second Opinion,"" a livestreamed discussion panel featuring world-renowned doctors and medical experts who provided an alternative take on the public health response to COVID-19. One of the panelists was Ohio attorney Thomas Renz, who is representing clients who have brought lawsuits against the COVID vaccine mandates, The Blaze reported. Renz's whistleblower clients found information on common vaccine injuries in DOD medical billing data from the Defense Medical Epidemiology Database (DMED). The DMED is the Armed Forces Health Surveillance Branch's (AFHSB) ""web-based tool to remotely query de-identified active component personnel and medical event data contained within the Defense Medical Surveillance System (DMSS)."" The database contains every International Classification of Diseases (ICD) medical billing code for all medical diagnoses submitted by the military for medical insurance billing. In sworn statements that Renz intends to submit in court, three military doctors ‚Äî Samuel Sigoloff, Peter Chambers, and Theresa Long ‚Äî detailed the information they found. Renz said that according to the data the doctors found, there was a 300% increase in miscarriages in the military during the first 10 months of 2021 over the five-year average. From 2016 through 2020, there were 1,499 codes for miscarriages each year, TheBlaze reported. From January through October 2021, there were 4,182. The doctors analyzing the data queried the numbers for hundreds of codes throughout the five-year time period. The codes that were examined are generally for ailments that have been established as potential adverse effects of the vaccines in medical literature, according to the news outlet. During 2020, the number of miscarriage codes dipped slightly below the five-year average at 1,477. But the billing codes were not sufficently below the average in any particular category to suggest that a 2020 decrease in doctor's visits during pandemic lockdowns accounted for the subsequent increase in 2021 diagnoses. While the database includes ICD codes for both military hospital visits and ambulatory visits, the data Renz presented is from ambulatory diagnosis data. Johnson mentioned during the panel that data on myocarditis cases appears to have been doctored, as the whistleblowers found that the number of codes for the diagnosis was about 28 times higher in August 2021 than when they checked again this month, where it was only two times higher. ""[T]here appears to be doctoring of the data,"" Johnson said. ""Now, my staff has already sent ‚Äî this morning, we sent a record preservation letter to the Department of Defense to try and protect this data."" According to the data found by the military doctors, there was also a nearly 300% increase in cancer diagnoses, from a 38,700-per-year average to 114,645 in 2021. For neurological issues diagnosis codes, there was a more than 1,000% increase in 2021 over the five-year average, from 82,000 to 863,000. Renz noted during the panel that neurological issues ""would affect our pilots."" ""Our soldiers are being experimented on, injured, and sometimes, possibly, killed,"" he added. Additional data The Blaze received from Renz showed: a 269% increase in myocardial infarction, 291% increase in Bell‚Äôs palsy, 156% increase in congenital malformations of military members' children, 471% increase in female infertility, and 467% increase in pulmonary embolisms. The news outlet reported that one of the sworn declarations from one of the military doctors said, ""It is my professional opinion that the major increases (sic) incidences of the above discussed instances of miscarriages, cancers, and disease were due to COVID-19 'vaccinations.'"" The codes for the diagnoses are not representative of the number of people who were diagnosed with these ailments, but simply the total number of diagnoses, as one person could have multiple ailments. The Department of Defense had not responded to a request for comment as of this article's publication deadline.

column30: justthenews.com Whistleblower bombshell: DOD medical data reveals surges in oft-cited vax 'adverse events' in 2021 By Natalia Mittelstadt 4 - 5 minutes Military medical whistleblowers have come forward with a trove of data on vaccine safety that they claim is the most accurate available. On Monday, Sen. Ron Johnson (R-Wisc.) hosted ""COVID-19: A Second Opinion,"" a livestreamed discussion panel featuring world-renowned doctors and medical experts who provided an alternative take on the public health response to COVID-19. One of the panelists was Ohio attorney Thomas Renz, who is representing clients who have brought lawsuits against the COVID vaccine mandates, The Blaze reported. Renz's whistleblower clients found information on common vaccine injuries in DOD medical billing data from the Defense Medical Epidemiology Database (DMED). The DMED is the Armed Forces Health Surveillance Branch's (AFHSB) ""web-based tool to remotely query de-identified active component personnel and medical event data contained within the Defense Medical Surveillance System (DMSS)."" The database contains every International Classification of Diseases (ICD) medical billing code for all medical diagnoses submitted by the military for medical insurance billing. In sworn statements that Renz intends to submit in court, three military doctors ‚Äî Samuel Sigoloff, Peter Chambers, and Theresa Long ‚Äî detailed the information they found. Renz said that according to the data the doctors found, there was a 300% increase in miscarriages in the military during the first 10 months of 2021 over the five-year average. From 2016 through 2020, there were 1,499 codes for miscarriages each year, TheBlaze reported. From January through October 2021, there were 4,182. The doctors analyzing the data queried the numbers for hundreds of codes throughout the five-year time period. The codes that were examined are generally for ailments that have been established as potential adverse effects of the vaccines in medical literature, according to the news outlet. During 2020, the number of miscarriage codes dipped slightly below the five-year average at 1,477. But the billing codes were not sufficently below the average in any particular category to suggest that a 2020 decrease in doctor's visits during pandemic lockdowns accounted for the subsequent increase in 2021 diagnoses. While the database includes ICD codes for both military hospital visits and ambulatory visits, the data Renz presented is from ambulatory diagnosis data. Johnson mentioned during the panel that data on myocarditis cases appears to have been doctored, as the whistleblowers found that the number of codes for the diagnosis was about 28 times higher in August 2021 than when they checked again this month, where it was only two times higher. ""[T]here appears to be doctoring of the data,"" Johnson said. ""Now, my staff has already sent ‚Äî this morning, we sent a record preservation letter to the Department of Defense to try and protect this data."" According to the data found by the military doctors, there was also a nearly 300% increase in cancer diagnoses, from a 38,700-per-year average to 114,645 in 2021. For neurological issues diagnosis codes, there was a more than 1,000% increase in 2021 over the five-year average, from 82,000 to 863,000. Renz noted during the panel that neurological issues ""would affect our pilots."" ""Our soldiers are being experimented on, injured, and sometimes, possibly, killed,"" he added. Additional data The Blaze received from Renz showed: a 269% increase in myocardial infarction, 291% increase in Bell‚Äôs palsy, 156% increase in congenital malformations of military members' children, 471% increase in female infertility, and 467% increase in pulmonary embolisms. The news outlet reported that one of the sworn declarations from one of the military doctors said, ""It is my professional opinion that the major increases (sic) incidences of the above discussed instances of miscarriages, cancers, and disease were due to COVID-19 'vaccinations.'"" The codes for the diagnoses are not representative of the number of people who were diagnosed with these ailments, but simply the total number of diagnoses, as one person could have multiple ailments. The Department of Defense had not responded to a request for comment as of this article's publication deadline.

column35:
JUNE 2. The day Ohioans get their ‚ÄòFreedoms‚Äô back, right? 

WRONG. 

The TRUTH is that the criminal governor did not act on behalf of all Ohioans when he claimed he would rescind most emergency orders on June 2. His hand was forced by Representative Scott Wiggam, who had announced a concurrent resolution just hours BEFORE DeWine‚Äôs press conference to ‚Äúrescind the restrictive health mandates that have barred Ohioans from their freedom and liberties granted under the Constitution."" Rep Wiggam stated the resolution would effectively end the mask mandate, school mask mandates, and the social distancing mandate. 

In response to Wiggam‚Äôs bold statement, the governor scrambled to make his abhorrent vax-lottery announcement and claimed that he would rescind most health orders June 2. Strangely enough, the criteria he set forth in early March of reaching 50 COVID-19 cases per 100,000 BEFORE Ohio could be free of the deleterious mandates was never even mentioned during his shameful press conference! 

With June 2 on the horizon, many representatives are unsure if a resolution will be needed to reign in the governor. WE THE PEOPLE must demand that our representatives move forward with the resolution. Why? 

‚Ä¢ The governor CAN and WILL use the same BAD LAW (ORC 3701.13) he‚Äôs been using for over a year to put Ohioans under an emergency state again. Suspending this law will prevent the governor from being able to use it again as justification for mandating mask-wearing, social distancing, and the shutdown of small businesses. Any future emergency mandates would have to go through the General Assembly, as they should have from the start of this nightmare. Do you really believe this despotic tyrant will not try to shut Ohio down again? 

‚Ä¢ DeWine has done nothing but destroy small businesses, keep restrictions in place that have injured both young and old, all while making a mockery of Ohioans and humiliating them with his recent vax-lottery, which has made Ohioans the butt of jokes around the Nation. By passing the resolution, Ohio citizens would take away his ability to ‚Äòopen Ohio‚Äô and give the credit back to the legislators for finally acting on behalf of the people and using the power they‚Äôve had all along to keep him in check. 

Call & Write your Representatives TODAY and DEMAND that they sign the Resolution that will SUSPEND THE BAD LAW that has been used for over a year and WILL BE used again to imprison Ohioans in the future if they do not act. 

It is time for our Representatives to REPRESENT US and to do the job they‚Äôve been elected to do! Link to sample letter here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1lfiw4qqY9qEzkbvY67jZsgtj7vDh00kT/view?usp=sharing

column30: # Cornfield Washington State Legislature Report, Day 15 of 60 / 24 January 2022 - A fake vax card could land you in jail if this bill passes - ""It‚Äôs Monday. Year 3 of the COVID-19 pandemic is off to a fast start. This morning [lawmakers discussed](http://emails.heraldnet.com/t?r=6409&c=21027&l=13&ctl=4B710%3AC0258EA3795FEB99717AE49C84A2D8EFEE894CEF7708B298&) making it a crime to use or sell fake vaccination cards. A Senate panel held a hearing on [Democratic Sen. Jesse Salomon‚Äôs bill](http://emails.heraldnet.com/t?r=6409&c=21027&l=13&ctl=4B711%3AC0258EA3795FEB99717AE49C84A2D8EFEE894CEF7708B298&) to make it a misdemeanor to use a false COVID-19 vaccination document where such proof is needed, like a restaurant. Selling fakes would be a felony with up to five years behind bars. Prisons are under siege from the virus. Work release facilities, too. Check out [this latest bulletin](http://emails.heraldnet.com/t?r=6409&c=21027&l=13&ctl=4B712%3AC0258EA3795FEB99717AE49C84A2D8EFEE894CEF7708B298&) from the Department of Corrections. Across the system, around 60% of incarcerated individuals were either in medical isolation or quarantine Friday. And that is with 81% of them vaccinated. It seems worse than what my colleagues and I [reported a week ago](http://emails.heraldnet.com/t?r=6409&c=21027&l=13&ctl=4B713%3AC0258EA3795FEB99717AE49C84A2D8EFEE894CEF7708B298&). Washington National Guard [is deployed](http://emails.heraldnet.com/t?r=6409&c=21027&l=13&ctl=4B714%3AC0258EA3795FEB99717AE49C84A2D8EFEE894CEF7708B298&) at several super-stressed hospitals around the state, including Providence Regional Medical Center Everett. Last week [only one ICU bed was unoccupied in Snohomish County](http://emails.heraldnet.com/t?r=6409&c=21027&l=13&ctl=4B715%3AC0258EA3795FEB99717AE49C84A2D8EFEE894CEF7708B298&). Nurses are wiped out. Lawmakers are [pondering their pleas](http://emails.heraldnet.com/t?r=6409&c=21027&l=13&ctl=4B716%3AC0258EA3795FEB99717AE49C84A2D8EFEE894CEF7708B298&) for limits as to how many patients they are assigned and other workplace rules. The House labor committee could vote Wednesday on [a bill to impose new standards](http://emails.heraldnet.com/t?r=6409&c=21027&l=13&ctl=4B717%3AC0258EA3795FEB99717AE49C84A2D8EFEE894CEF7708B298&). Good news: Free COVID tests are now available from [the feds](http://emails.heraldnet.com/t?r=6409&c=21027&l=13&ctl=4B718%3AC0258EA3795FEB99717AE49C84A2D8EFEE894CEF7708B298&) and [the state.](http://emails.heraldnet.com/t?r=6409&c=21027&l=13&ctl=4B719%3AC0258EA3795FEB99717AE49C84A2D8EFEE894CEF7708B298&) How quickly they arrive at your door will vary, however. Masks will start to be available, too, probably this week. Finally, how did folks cope the past two years? Read some of the [personal, funny and heartwarming insights](http://emails.heraldnet.com/t?r=6409&c=21027&l=13&ctl=4B71A%3AC0258EA3795FEB99717AE49C84A2D8EFEE894CEF7708B298&) shared with The Daily Herald. It might help you get through these next 12 months. **Ferguson weighs in on use of force ** Democratic Reps. Jesse Johnson and Roger Goodman crafted [House Bill 1310](http://emails.heraldnet.com/t?r=6409&c=21027&l=13&ctl=4B71B%3AC0258EA3795FEB99717AE49C84A2D8EFEE894CEF7708B298&), the new law setting limits on the use of force by police. Cops say it‚Äôs impeded their day-to-day enforcement abilities and it‚Äôs led to officers to hesitate or refuse to assist in situations where they might be asked to physically intercede to help a person in crisis get treatment. With such concerns in mind, Goodman and Johnson asked Attorney General Bob Ferguson for his take. In [a partial answer delivered last week](http://emails.heraldnet.com/t?r=6409&c=21027&l=13&ctl=4B71C%3AC0258EA3795FEB99717AE49C84A2D8EFEE894CEF7708B298&), Ferguson said the Legislature should clear things up. ‚ÄúWe begin by emphasizing that the answers to all of your questions are extremely difficult,‚Äù Ferguson wrote. ‚ÄúReasonable minds disagree about the correct legal conclusions. In light of this uncertainty, for the following reasons we strongly urge the Legislature to clarify its intent regarding these important questions.‚Äù Ferguson needs clarity, as well. [Under the same law](http://emails.heraldnet.com/t?r=6409&c=21027&l=13&ctl=4B71D%3AC0258EA3795FEB99717AE49C84A2D8EFEE894CEF7708B298&), he‚Äôs supposed to publish model policies on use of force and de-escalation tactics to guide law enforcement agencies. His deadline is July 1. **Weekly Spin ** A reminder, House and Senate Democratic leaders chat with reporters at 2:45 p.m. today. Watch on [TVW](http://emails.heraldnet.com/t?r=6409&c=21027&l=13&ctl=4B71E%3AC0258EA3795FEB99717AE49C84A2D8EFEE894CEF7708B298&). Republicans will hold their weekly confab at 11:30 a.m. Tuesday. TVW will carry it live.""

column35:
California has a serious election integrity problem.  10's of thousands more people are registered to vote, than the actual number of eligible adults in the state.  That's a massive systemic election fraud problem & it has to be fixed.  

Thousands of illegal immigrants have been sent voter registration forms with their CA Driver License renewals.  Does Newsom or the Secretary of State know how many people who aren't here legally, are registered to vote and actively participate in our elections?  The answer is Gavin doesn't know, but he's fine with any level of election fraud that he and other Leftists believe will help them stay in power.  

The fraud has to stop, but I can't stop it alone.  I need your support to become CA's next governor, so we can work together, pressure the CA Secretary of State and pressure local county election officials to audit their voter rolls and remove anyone who's not an eligible U.S. Citizen.  

We also need to pressure the Legislature to finally pass a Voter I.D. law.  How complicated is this idea?  You already need a Driver License or CA I.D. card to get on an airplane, buy alcohol, buy a bus pass and many other daily activities in life.  What kind of politician would object to ensuring the integrity of such a fundamental part of our Constitutional Republic, like 'free and fair elections'?  

Are you fed up with the fraud and the lies and the deceit in Sacramento?  Volunteer, donate, and join my team to help me Reform California and Restore Transparent Election Integrity!

column35:
# **California School Choice 2022; The Educational Freedom Act**
# **‚ÄúYour money, your children, your choice‚Äù**

Proverbs 22:6 says: ‚Äú***Train up a child in the way he should go, and when he is old he will not depart from it***.‚Äù  It is hard to follow Proverbs 22:6 when most Government Run Schools are doing the opposite, 5 days/week, 6-8 hours/day. 

In the #GovernmentRunSchools, we have medically irrational mask and vax mandates for children, who are at 0.00% risk from Covid; Critical Race Theory that indoctrinates children to be racists and judge and treat other people based on the color of their skin; pornographic SeXXXEd; anti Christian indoctrination; anti American history; and dumbed down academic standards.  In California, the Government Run Schools can take children for abortions and transgender hormone treatments without their parents‚Äô consent or even knowledge.  California‚Äôs new ethnic studies curriculum literally has children chanting to the Aztec gods of human sacrifice.

The #GovernmentRunSchools are non-reformable because the control is too diffuse spread over local school boards, the state government and the federal government, and the well financed interests are too entrenched.  While homeschooling and private schooling are options for some families, the only way to save large numbers of our children and our country is with #SchoolChoice.

The California School Choice Foundation is circulating the **EDUCATIONAL FREEDOM ACT **initiative that will be the boldest, most comprehensive School Choice law in America.  

# **The EDUCATIONAL FREEDOM ACT initiative,**

1. Offers all children a $14,000/year educational savings account.

2. Lets parents choose the best school for their children.

3. Allows families to save unused money for college or vocational training.

4. Includes homeschooling families.

5. Uses the children‚Äôs shares of money the state is already spending.

6. Protects private schools and home schools from interference and control by the government and teacher unions.

The **EDUCATIONAL FREEDOM ACT **is based on three principles: (1) Parents can and should decide how best to educate their children; (2) Freedom of choice is good; and (3) Competition improves the quality of goods and services, especially compared to a government monopoly. 

# **OUR REQUESTS OF YOU:**

1. Sign the petition to get the Educational Freedom Act on the ballot for 2022.  Our people are out gathering signatures at various locations in San Bernardino and Riverside Counties.  You may contact me through FB, Greg@RedlandsTeaParty.net or 909.550.1358 to find a time and location.  I will even meet you at my office in Redlands to sign the petition. 

2. Volunteer for 2 hours/week collecting signatures.  Are your children (or grandchildren) and your country worth two hours per week?

3. Contribute $5/month, or more if you can afford it.  Again, what are your children (or grandchildren) and your country worth?

We can volunteer and contribute at www.CaliforniaSchool Choice.org  

In San Bernardino and Riverside Counties, please contact:

--Dale Broome for San Bernardino County, DaleBroome@CaliforniaSchoolChoice.org 951.322.6351

--Wendy Beyer for Riverside County, riverside@cascf.com 

We do not have millionaires to pay for signature gatherers.  We need concerned parents, grandparents, and other citizens to step up.  

**THE EDUCATIONAL FREEDOM ACT IS THE MOST IMPORTANT POLITICAL CAUSE BEFORE US IN CALIFORNIA BECAUSE: **

(1st) Getting America‚Äôs children out of the Government Run Schools is a national survival issue.  

(2nd) We can accomplish this.  Because parents now see what is happening in the Government Run Schools, this is the best ever opportunity to enact #SchoolChoice in California.

(3rd) When we enact the EDUCATIONAL FREEDOM ACT in November 2022, it will be the educational Liberty Bell that will ring not only in California but across the country and around the world.

As Ronald Reagan said, ‚Äú***If not us, who? If not now, when?***‚Äù

column30: ""Republican handling of the this new COVID-19 phase has been bizarre. It‚Äôs clear that they‚Äôre less and less interested in killing off their own voters in the name of ‚Äúowning the libs,‚Äù yet they must now escape the rhetorical corner they‚Äôve backed themselves into. There‚Äôs Republican Rep. Clay Higgings of Louisiana, who announced a couple of days ago that he, his wife, and his son all have COVID-19. ‚ÄúI have COVID, Becca has COVID, my son has COVID,‚Äù he wrote on Facebook. ‚ÄúBecca and I had COVID before, early on, in January 2020, before the world really knew what it was. So, this is our second experience with the CCP biological attack weaponized virus ...‚Äù He can‚Äôt admit that his stupid behavior‚Äîrefusal to get vaccinated and opposition to common-sense precautions‚Äîlikely led to his infection. So like so many other conspiracy-minded Republicans, he‚Äôs blaming it on the Chinese, who he says have deployed a ‚Äúbiological attack weaponized virus.‚Äù Higgins can‚Äôt actually believe that, can he? If attacked, isn‚Äôt the obvious response to, you know, protect yourself against that attack? If he truly believed that, wouldn‚Äôt he want to deploy countermeasures such as‚Äîjust spitballing here‚Äîa vaccine? The whole ‚ÄúChina attacked us‚Äù line is just as ludicrous now as it was when Donald Trump tried to use it to excuse his own inept handling of the pandemic. Because if true, it wouldn‚Äôt just damn the Chinese, it would also damn Republicans who have so ineffective worked to keep our country and its people safe. Like Clay Higgins of Louisiana. Speaking of Trump, he just had one of his creepy cult rallies in Arizona, and he couldn‚Äôt quite bring himself to urge his supporters to not die in the name of who-knows-what. ""How about the vaccine? I came up with the vaccine,‚Äù he boasted, despite the obvious ridiculousness of the claim. Odds that he even knows what ‚ÄúmRNA‚Äù stands for are pretty much zero. Yet instead of begging his people to sensibly take the jab, the best he could manage was to weakly say he ‚Äúrecommended‚Äù it before reiterating that he ‚Äúalso believes in your freedoms 100 percent."" Meanwhile, Trump explained conservative vaccine hesitancy by claiming that people ""don't trust the president, people aren't doing it."" Of course, it‚Äôs clear at this point that Republicans won‚Äôt jab out of any sense of civic or neighborly duty to protect themselves and those around them. As Politico blithely declared a few days ago, ‚ÄúMany people are turning down Covid vaccines because they are angry that President Donald Trump lost the election and sick of Democrats thinking they know what‚Äôs best.‚Äù They‚Äôd rather die than give libs the satisfaction of ‚Ä¶ seeing them live? Except that when they start dying, many begin to change their tune. You may have read about the Louisiana doctor who wrote about her patients begging for vaccines just as they were about to get intubated. I'm admitting young healthy people to the hospital with very serious COVID infections. One of the last things they do before they're intubated is beg me for the vaccine. I hold their hand and tell them that I'm sorry, but it's too late. A few days later when I call time of death, I hug their family members and I tell them the best way to honor their loved one is to go get vaccinated and encourage everyone they know to do the same. They cry. And they tell me they didn't know. They thought it was a hoax. They thought it was political. They thought because they had a certain blood type or a certain skin color they wouldn't get as sick. They thought it was 'just the flu'. But they were wrong. And they wish they could go back. But they can't. Oof. We‚Äôve seen this dynamic play out in Tennessee, where conspiracy theorist conservative radio host Phil Valentine is fighting for his life in a COVID-19 ward. All of a sudden, the whole family‚Äôs tune on vaccination has changed. ‚ÄúIf Phil were able to conduct this interview, he would tell you while he has never been an anti-vax person, he has always been a pro-choice person,‚Äù his brother Mark Valentine said. ‚ÄúWhat he regrets is not being more vehemently pro-vaccine, and when he gets back on the air, that‚Äôs exactly what he‚Äôs going to tell people.‚Äù Right. ‚ÄúPro-choice.‚Äù Women not need apply. And of course, no one has to look hard to see that the radio host was, indeed, anti-vaccination. But hey, having his brother beg people to vaccinate isn‚Äôt a bad thing, and we should all be glad they‚Äôre beginning to change their tune. But how to explain away a year of vaccine craziness? See how his brother did it in this Facebook post: Remember it was Trump who caused this vaccine to be available. For the record, I don't believe there is a chip in the vaccine and I don't believe 5G is gonna trigger some sort of mass casualties or any of that stuff. The reason roughly half of the population hasn't taken it is because they (formerly me) assumed we were being lied to for any number of nefarious reasons. The reason I assumed that was because we have been lied to (truncated)

column30: UPDATE ON THE WASHOE COUNTY COMMISSION MEETING RE: BEADLES ELECTION INTEGRITY PETITION/RESOLUTION. Thank you to CINDY MARTINEZ for getting this out. The petition/resolution demanded for the next meeting was not placed on the agenda for the 2/15 meeting. Please tentatively ‚Äúsave the date‚Äù of 2/22/22 to return to the BCC meeting to continue public comment in demand of Election Integrity. The 2/22/22 agenda will not be available until late Wednesday 2/16/22 or Thursday 2/17/22. By that date, we will know if the resolution has been placed on the 2/22/22 agenda. We will follow up next week in that regard. We are not asking for full on attendance at this meeting for that reason, but please keep your calendar open. We will need all who participated last week to ‚Äúclose the deal‚Äù, so to speak! For the meeting 2/15/22 - the agenda is relatively short, but does have two items of great interest: #5 - Update regarding the response to the 2017 North Valleys Flooding; see the attached agenda with embedded link for the PPT presentation. üö®This is an important update for residents of Lemmon Valley. #4 - NDOT presentation with plans for sustainable funding sources for roads & how they will fund road construction and maintenance as ‚Äúthe fleet transitions away from fossil fuels...‚Äù. Lastly, today is closing on the end of **Day 704** of the ‚ÄúState of Emergency‚Äù declared by Governor Sisollini on 3/12/2020. We are still en guard against vax mandates/passports/medical apartheid/medical discrimination. Yes, Directive 52 dropped mask ‚Äúmandates‚Äù (please see Directive 52, link below) for the granted permission to uncover your faces. Of course, we all know he NEVER had power to order that us to cover our faces to begin with! Point being - tomorrow is **Day 705** - remain vigilant, preserve your health and do not be surprised if the ‚ÄúMidterm Variant‚Äù is suddenly discovered in some obscure corner of the world again. ***NOTE:** When giving public comment, please be sure to state your name ‚Äúfor the record‚Äù and consider also the following, ‚ÄúPlease ensure my comments are entered into the public record, per NRS 241.035.‚Äù The clerk MUST take accurate minutes of what is said in the meeting. (Link to NRS below). ****NOTE:** the Washoe County Board of Health next meeting is **2/24/22** at 1p - please mark your calendar for that as well. We do not yet know if it will be a live meeting, or if the fraidy cats will Zoom as they did last month. We‚Äôll let you know! Best regards in pursuit of freedom, Cindy Martinez, Chair Pro Tem County Commission/WCHD Brigade [https://washoecounty.gov/bcc/board_committees/2022/files/agendas/2022-02-15/BCC%20-%202.15.22.pdf](https://washoecounty.gov/bcc/board_committees/2022/files/agendas/2022-02-15/BCC%20-%202.15.22.pdf) [https://nvhealthresponse.nv.gov/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/2.10.22-Emergency-Directive-052.pdf](https://nvhealthresponse.nv.gov/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/2.10.22-Emergency-Directive-052.pdf) [https://www.leg.state.nv.us/NRS/NRS-241.html#NRS241Sec0353](https://www.leg.state.nv.us/NRS/NRS-241.html#NRS241Sec0353) ***On behalf of the ‚ÄúRepublican Women of Reno‚Äù ‚Äì Communication Brigade*** Public Comment [washoe311@washoecounty.us](mailto:washoe311@washoecounty.us)

column35:
So a friend of mine just sent this email...
Have a look (hope the links work).

You folks are probably already familiar with this page but even though I watched the January committee meetings online I didn't find some of the bills listed in olis. This page was not in the regular system of olis. But I did find some new bills I didn't know about at this link, it has all the bills so far:  
https://www.oregonlegislature.gov/bills_laws/listbills/CurrentSessionBills.html

Here are the election bills I have found thus far: 
HB4044: https://olis.oregonlegislature.gov/liz/2022R1/Measures/Overview/HB4044  Reduces number of electors who must be registered as member of minor political party in order for minor political party to retain political party status from one-half of one percent to one-quarter of one percent of total number of registered electors in state.

HB4133: https://olis.oregonlegislature.gov/liz/2022R1/Measures/Overview/HB4133   Requires electronic voter registration system to allow qualified individual to register to vote if individual has Social Security number.

HB4136: https://olis.oregonlegislature.gov/liz/2022R1/Measures/Overview/HB4136   Requires Secretary of State to establish digital voting system to allow specified electors to digitally request, receive, mark, verify and cast ballot.

HB4147: https://olis.oregonlegislature.gov/liz/2022R1/Measures/Overview/HB4147  Allows persons convicted of felony to register to vote, update voter registration and vote in elections while incarcerated.

This goes for the GOP Elephant in the room as well. When the duck turns into the elephant, there is an obvious problem, or difficult situation that Republican Lawmakers do not want to talk about. CORNYN LIES ABOUT VAX TIMELINE Sen. John Cornyn (R-TX) on Friday got called out by many of his own Twitter followers for shamelessly lying about President Joe Biden's proposed timeline for getting Americans vaccinated. Writing on Twitter, Cornyn falsely claimed that Biden said that every American would be ""vaccinated by May,"" and used this to attack the president for asking Americans to hold out until July to attend large gatherings. ""If every willing person in America is vaccinated for COVID-19 by May, as POTUS has said, why put our lives on hold till July the 4th?"" he asked. As Media Matters' Parker Malloy points out, Biden specifically said during his Thursday night address that not every American would get vaccinated by the end of May, but would rather at least be eligible to sign up for a vaccination. FL. REPIG BEGS STATE GOVS. TO REJECT COVID RELIF FUNDS Following the passage of President Biden's $1.9 trillion Covid relief bill, one Republican congressman finds himself with little recourse but to impotently beg his fellow Republicans to return billions in relief aid to the federal government. Sen. Rick Scott, R-Fla., who is set to meet with Donald Trump this week at Mar-a-Lago, is beseeching states and cities across America to refuse federal aid and put politics over policy. In a missive sent to governors and mayors just after the bill was approved on Wednesday, Scott tarred the piece of legislation as ""massive, wasteful and non-targeted."" He encouraged state and local leaders, by way of sending back the aid, to demand that Congress ""quit recklessly spending other people's money."" ""By rejecting and returning any unneeded funds, as well as funds unrelated to COVID-19,"" his letter read, ""you would be taking responsible action to avoid wasting scarce tax dollars. After all, every dollar in this package is borrowed.""

column35:
March 2, 2020 (Monday)

America now has 6 COVID-19 fatalities, and today, a spokesperson for the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) abruptly canceled a press briefing about the coronavirus. A White House spokesperson later said the CDC would brief Vice President Mike Pence on the coronavirus response. Today information about how many people in the U.S. had been tested for the virus was taken down from the CDC website, presumably because it is such a scandal that we have tested so few people when other countries have tested widely. The website now lists only the number of confirmed cases (43, as of this afternoon). 

Trump met with the leaders of ten pharmaceutical companies today to see how they could speed up production of a vaccine. Unfortunately, the tests needed to make sure vaccines work and are safe cannot be rushed, and experts say we‚Äôre still 12-18 months away from one (which is actually remarkably fast‚Äîusually they take at least two years). Trump‚Äôs understanding of vaccines seems shaky: he asked the attendees if the flu vaccine would work on the novel coronavirus. 

In the race for the Democratic presidential nomination, both Pete Buttigieg, the former mayor of South Bend, Indiana, and Minnesota Senator Amy Klobuchar have dropped out and endorsed former Vice President Joe Biden. While tempers are running high over the contest, this sort of jockeying before a nomination is entirely normal, and is usually quite a good way for voters to test out candidates and for candidates to test out new ideas for their party. The way to look at this current struggle is as a contest between candidates perceived to be moderate‚ÄîBiden, Buttigieg, and Klobuchar-- and Vermont Senator Bernie Sanders, who is perceived to be radical and who is not, after all, a Democrat, as Biden is. 

Buttigieg is young‚Äîonly 38-- and now well-positioned for a job in a Biden administration where he can get more experience; Klobuchar is already a powerful senator. It made sense for them to drop out and endorse Biden, who falls closer to their political leanings than Sanders. The delegates already pledged to them at the convention are generally bound to vote for them in the first ballot, but are then released. They might switch to Biden, as their candidate asks, but they are not obligated to. 

Businessman and former New York City mayor Michael Bloomberg and Massachusetts Senator Elizabeth Warren remain in the race.

What will happen tomorrow, on Super Tuesday, will give us a better sense of how the nomination will take shape. For all the attention the early states get, Iowa, New Hampshire, and Nevada offer only about 4% of the delegates at stake, so performing well in them is more about momentum than about final delegate tallies. Fourteen states vote in Super Tuesday, and most of those states are far more diverse than Iowa and New Hampshire, so they look more like the actual demographic that represents the Democratic Party and might hand in very different results than earlier contests. 

By the end of the day, about a third of the delegate total will be allocated. Bloomberg has poured money into ads for Super Tuesday; they might pay off. Warren got a huge bump from her debate performance against Bloomberg just before the Nevada caucuses. Biden and Sanders both have strengths and weaknesses. We‚Äôll see what tomorrow brings.

Will any of this matter? Intelligence officers from Special Counsel Robert Mueller to Russia expert Fiona Hill have warned us that Russia would disrupt this election, and we know they are   already disrupting the Democratic presidential nomination process, trying to affect the way voters perceive the Democratic candidates. 

This attack seems likely to go unchallenged by the administration. Trump has installed as our acting Director of National Intelligence the current Ambassador to Germany, Richard Grenell, who has made clear he does not believe Russia interfered in our 2016 election or that it is attacking us in 2020, either. Trump‚Äôs recent nomination of Representative John Ratcliffe (R-TX), one of the key defenders of the president during the impeachment hearings, seems designed to guarantee an end to any investigation of Russian attacks. Ratcliffe‚Äôs previous run at the office stalled because senators of both parties thought he was unqualified. But if they refuse to confirm him now, Trump gets to keep Grenell, who is even more unqualified, and more in the president‚Äôs corner. Since Ratcliffe has endorsed the conspiracy theory that the Russia investigation was the project of ‚Äúa secret society‚Äù in the Justice Department and the FBI determined to prevent Trump‚Äôs election, Trump has a friend at the head of Intelligence no matter whether he gets Ratcliffe or keeps Grenell, and it seems likely there will be little effort to keep foreign governments out of our election.

Indeed, Republican leaders are actively doing their part to sway the way voters think about candidates, just as they did with their (truncated)

This study is interesting, but everyone needs to assume control of their own health in consultation with a trusted medical provider. An issue I have with this study is that it compares adverse vaccine reactions to adverse risks with the virus--without breaking down the controllable risk factors of the infected. The word ""safe"" is thrown around indiscriminately based on those concerns. We all do not have the same susceptibility to a significant bout with this virus; conversely many who have gambled on those lines have had a severe infection. A spokesman with Baylor Waxahachie has stated that 92-94 percent of their serious COVID-19 admissions are unvaxxed, That seems to agree with what other local hospitals are experiencing. . I took the Johnson and Johnson vaccine on April Fool's Day. Insert your sarcasm here, if needed. I have had short-term and controllable hives several times since. Inconvenient, but not a severe problem. I also have used some alternative and inexpensive medications when I thought I might have been exposed with no reaction. It turned out I was not infected. Converse with a doctor who pays attention to your concerns. I have taken all of the recommended supplements to avoid the virus such as D-3, Quercetin, Zinc, and Magnesium. I have taken them in meaningful doses. ""DrBeen"" on YouTube discusses these on his broadcasts and discusses them with a global network of Doctors and PhD-level researchers. Most of these folks are to some degree pro-vax and some are pro-mask in some circumstances, but they discuss alternatives to expensive therapies as well.

Prior to 2017, neither HHS nor WHO ever performed the kind of vaccinated/unvaccinated (or placebo) study necessary to ascertain if the DTP vaccine actually yields beneficial health outcomes. The DTP vaccine was discontinued in the US and western nations in the 1990s following thousands of reports of death and brain damage. ‚Ä¶ girls vaccinated with the DTP vaccine‚Äîthe flagship of Bill Gates‚Äôs GAVI/WHO African vaccine program‚Äîdied at 10 times the rate of unvaccinated kids. The Danish government and Novo Nordisk Foundation commissioned this study by a team of the world‚Äôs leading experts on African vaccination. The two most prominent names, Drs. Soren Mogensen and Peter Aaby, are both vocal vaccine supporters. They were shocked when they examined years of data from a so called ‚Äúnatural experiment‚Äù in Guinea Bissau where 50% of children die before age five. In that west African nation, half the children were vaccinated with the DTP vaccine at three months and the other half at six months. Dr. Mogenson and his team found that girls vaccinated with the DTP vaccine died at 10 times the rate of unvaccinated kids. column30: Rep. Chip Roy (R-TX) on Monday blasted Democrats who want to police private text messages, following a report that Biden allies want to use SMS carriers to dispel misinformation about the COVID-19 vaccine. Roy appeared on ‚ÄúTucker Carlson Tonight‚Äù in part to address a Monday report from Politico that claimed the Biden administration is ‚Äúcasting conservative opponents of its Covid-19 vaccine campaign as dangerous and extreme‚Äù and plans to work with SMS carriers to suppress anti-vaccine sentiment even in private texts. As Carlson said, per Fox News: On Monday, Politico reported plans from the Biden administration to battle misinformation in regards to the COVID-19 vaccine. ‚ÄúThe White House has decided to hit back harder on misinformation and scare tactics after Republican lawmakers and conservative activists pledged to fight the administration‚Äôs stated plans to go ‚Äòdoor-to-door‚Äô to increase vaccination rates,‚Äù Politico wrote. ‚ÄúThe pushback will include directly calling out social media platforms and conservative news shows that promote such tactics.‚Äù The article continues how pro-Biden groups and the Democratic National Committee will work with SMS carriers to ‚Äúdispel misinformation‚Äù in peoples‚Äô private text messages. ‚ÄúBiden allied groups, including the Democratic National Committee, are also planning to engage fact-checkers more aggressively and work with SMS carriers to dispel misinformation about vaccines that is sent over social media and text messages,‚Äù Politico reports. Describing the DNC‚Äôs alleged tactics to interfere with private text messages as ‚Äúpatently absurd,‚Äù Roy said, ‚ÄúThis whole issue of the vaccine hits very close to home for me. My father, in 1949 when he was seven years old, he was diagnosed with polio. And my grandmother was nursing my grandfather, who was sick with cancer ‚Äî he died that fall ‚Äî and then raised my dad as a single mom, nursed him to health. And he lived his whole life ravaged by it. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm grateful to have a vaccine for me, vaccines for my sons and my daughter,‚Äù Roy continued. ‚ÄúI believe in vaccines, and I‚Äôll be damned if I‚Äôm going to allow Democrats ‚Ä¶ come in and start calling you an anti-vax quack or call me an anti-vaxxer because I dare to believe that it is our duty as Americans, our patriotic duty, to make decisions for ourselves, not have Democrats looking at our text messages, not having them try to shame the American people into taking a vaccine.‚Äù ‚ÄúThis is the danger we face as Americans, the forgotten men and women out here who are getting rolled over by the power of government, but also the oligopoly, these corporate cronies who are trying to use all of this to fatten their own wallets,‚Äù Roy added. Roy spoke out last week against the Biden administration for aggressively pushing COVID-19 vaccines, prompting a White House official to reportedly scoff at his concerns. As The Daily Wire reported: A White House official reportedly dismissed concerns Rep. Chip Roy (R-TX) made this week regarding the Biden administration‚Äôs recent move to go door-to-door pushing the COVID-19 vaccine. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm just sick and God-darn tired of the Left, and this government, dictating to me, frankly, anything at all,‚Äù Roy told RealClearPolitics White House reporter Philip Wegmann in an interview. ‚ÄúBack the F off. That‚Äôs my message to the White House.‚Äù When Wegmann reached out to a White House official to ask if they had a response to Roy, the official texted, ‚Äúlol no.‚Äù

column30: https://www.deepcapture.com/2021/10/letter-to-vax-hesitant-federal-employees/ LETTETR TO VAX-HESITANT FEDERALS Hang on. Help is on the way. There is a hope and a bank-shot. And an opportunity for a bit of elbow grease from some number of you. If all goes according to hope, next week a federal class action lawsuit will be filed against the boss of a federal unit (not the DOD). The plaintiffs will be employees of that federal organization. They will be seeking Temporary Restraining Orders, permanent injunctive relief, the whole nine yards. Here is the bankshot: I want to get it multiplied so the Secretary of Chair or Director of every federal organization is finding himself or herself or xirself staring down the barrel of a federal class action suit along with accusations of Nuremberg Code violations. How do I expect to get it so multiplied? Through the magic of a global grassroots movement known as ‚ÄúTore Maras‚Äù. Many federales likely know who Tore Maras is, but for the newcomers: she runs a podcast that has become a global top 40 political broadcast. In five broadcasts of three hours each per week, Tore discusses events from a perspective that the mainstream would dismiss as ‚Äúconspiracy minded‚Äù (setting aside her ability to predict the future, as she often demonstrates by taking clips from shows three years previously and playing them now). She punctuates her chapters with eclectic but tasteful music samplings. Across all channels her daily listeners now number in the low millions. Hundreds of chapters have sprung up where weekly meetings are held in diners, coffee shops, and city parks, for her fans to discuss her broadcasts. Of approximately 600 chapters, 300 are scattered in cities around the US, and 300 are scattered globally (yes, in Hamburg, Germany, yes, there is a coffee shop where once/week a group of people get together to discuss Tore‚Äôs last week of broadcasts). Tore‚Äôs man social media is Telegram, where here channel Tore Says + has become what Austrian economists would call a catallaxy. It is a self-organizing group organized from the bottom-up. Most impressively, it has demonstrated the ability to do useful work. It was an accidental discovery: Tore was away from home and had a car wreck (or a car theft?), mentioned it on-air‚Ä¶. and her millions of followers self-organized a new Tesla to appear in her driveway. But it has quickly gotten much bigger. Imagine a beehive in the center of which is nestled and guarded a queen bee (Tore). Among the chambers of the beehive are the aforementioned geographic chapters. But there are chambers for physicians, and industrial engineers, and a chamber for many dozens of lawyers (who work in law firms which would never handle cases as controversial as these). Like an enormous open-source software project but this one composed of volunteers of all stripes, the energies of this beehive exceed that of all but the largest lawfirms. It asks for a tiny amount of erg out of tens of thousands of people, and they deliver. Over the last few months, , Tore has been conjuring and plotting with that group, and in the last three weeks it gushed forth: 20 federal lawsuits challenging school mask mandates in 20 different federal districts; 48 state Supreme Courts lawsuits challenging vaccine mandates of any sort within the state. These are serious lawsuits. Drafted by volunteer lawyers contributing time to a virtual law firm shielded within the hive. The suit drawn up collaboratively by lawyers volunteering from several Big 10 firms. With research on varying state constitutional and legislative language done by lawyers and paralegals within the relevant geographic chapters. And the most current scientific research surfaced within the cells holding industrial engineers and physicians and scientists, and injected into the cases. Shielded within the hive and with no more effort than a maestro makes whisking xir‚Äôs baton, Tore has built (or more precisely, around Tore has organized) an open-source mass-movement with a sophistication at which I marvel. Foer her next feat, Tore has agreed to put that apparatus at the service of you vax-hesitant federals. Here is how it is going to work: Early next week a superbly-drafted federal class action lawsuit will be filed on behalf of the federal employees of and contractors to a particular federal department, agency, or commission (I‚Äôm not saying which, but even a youth would have heard of it). Meanwhile, vax-hesitant federals are going to visit learn a bit about Tore World: Her podcast (‚ÄúThe Tore Says Show‚Äù) can be found on Apple Podcasts here (and elsewhere); Her main Social media channel is Telegram (consider downloading the app): Tore Says + ; Her organizing channel is TTT Roll Call (‚ÄúTTT‚Äù being a reference to ‚ÄúTime Traveling Tore‚Äù). In the days ahead you will see created for you cells within the beehive that map not to geographic locations, but to your home agencies. You should join. You likely cannot create social media (truncated)

# **RTPP 11/4 Mtg, Ed Hoffman, ‚ÄúExperience Matters,‚Äù & SCHOOL CHOICE, If Not Us, Who?  If Not Now, When?**

*********************************************************

November 4, 7:00 pm 

Mill Creek Cattle Co., 1874 Mentone Blvd., Mentone

[Please see the CoronaVirus note below.]

OUR MEETING FEATURES: 

**ED HOFFMAN, author of ‚ÄúExperience Matters, Here‚Äôs Mine‚Äù https://edhoffman.net/

Dennis Prager said of Ed‚Äôs book, ‚ÄúExperience Matters is a treasure trove of practical advice. Ed Hoffman has lived a fascinating life. He has turned each one of his many, varied and engaging adventures into a gem of wisdom. Read this book and profit. Then, get your son or daughter to read it. Bribe them if you have to. That‚Äôs how good (and how much fun) this book is.‚Äù

Ed is a great supporter of the Patriot cause and charitable causes.  Ed‚Äôs radio show, ‚ÄúThe Main Event‚Äù is heard on AM 590 Saturday at 10:00 am and Sunday at 8:00 am.  Ed generously sponsors Unite IE Radio.  

**DOUG & JAN HAUSER and DALE BROOME, #SchoolChoice, If Not Us, Who?  If Not Now, When? 

https://www.CaliforniaSchoolChoice.org/

In the #GovernmentRunSchools children are dumbed down academically, patriotically, religiously and morally, indoctrinated to hate America, support socialism and communism, sexualized with #SeXXXEd, and taught to be racists and judge and treat other people based on the color of their skin with #CriticalRaceTheory.

Newsom‚Äôs mask and vax mandates are yet further reason to get your children out of the #GovernmentRunSchools now. 

Homeschooling or private school may save your children from the #GovernmentRunSchools but to save the next generation and our country, the only possible solution is #SchoolChoice.

The #SchoolChoice initiative is out for signature.  We need all freedom loving, America loving Americans to help gather signatures.  There is no political cause more important.  

Our initiative will 

1. Give all parents who want educational freedom for their children an educational savings account with $14,000 per year.

2. Allow parents to choose any accredited school for their children. 

3. Provide that unused money accumulates and can be used for college or post HS vocational training. 

4. Allow home schooling families can use the money certain expenses and save the rest for their children‚Äôs future education.

5. Use money from each child‚Äôs share of state education spending so no tax increase is required. 

6.  Protect private schools and home schools from the government and teacher unions.

Getting America‚Äôs children out of the #GovernmentRunSchools is a national survival issue.

However, while #SchoolChoice is popular, we are attacking the enemy at their core source of power. The enemy, the #DemParty, teacher unions and their leftist cronies will do everything possible to stop educational freedom. This will be political World War IV.

**EDUCATION TOWNHALL: ‚ÄúTake Charge of Your Children‚Äôs Education Through School Choice, Homeschooling and Activism.‚Äù  Ark Church in Redlands, November 13, program 9-12, Homeschooling exhibit hall 9-3.

Our keynote speaker: Rebecca Friedrichs, 28 year teacher, author of ‚ÄúStanding Up to Goliath,‚Äù will address: --‚ÄúThe Government Run Schools Are Worse Than You Imagine; Get Your Children Out Now!‚Äù

Discover Homeschooling: Yes you can, here‚Äôs how, and you and your children will be glad you did. You can custom design education for your children. 

The School Choice initiative: ‚ÄúThe Educational Freedom Act‚Äù provides a $14,000 Educational Savings Account for every child to use at any accredited school. It‚Äôs ‚ÄúYour money, your children, your choice.‚Äù

Learn your rights and remedies if your children are still trapped 

in the Government Run Schools.

Develop effective activism with your school board.

**ADDITIONAL PATRIOT EVENTS AND ANNOUNCEMENTS.

******************************

As always, enjoy food, fun and fellowship with your Patriot friends.  

Our meetings are free and open to the public 

And, Mill Creek Cattle Co. is a great place for dinner, great food at reasonable prices with great service.

******************************

#CoronaVirus is still around.  

Everyone needs to evaluate their own health situation and risk in deciding whether to attend our meeting or go anywhere else.  If you want to wear a mask, that‚Äôs fine, but we will not require them.  We will have some available, although the box says they are not intended to prevent disease.  

******************************

The REDLANDS TEA PARTY PATRIOTS is an all volunteer group of dedicated Patriots committed to Making America Great Again and restoring the freedom and opportunity for you and your children and grandchildren to pursue the American dream through:

‚Ä¢ Personal Freedom and Constitutionally Limited Government.

‚Ä¢ Economic Freedom with Opportunity for All and Favoritism for None.

‚Ä¢ A Debt-Free Future through Fiscal Responsibility (truncated)

column30: Peter Stone in Washington Fri 3 Sep 2021 03.30 EDT Top loyalists to Donald Trump, who frequently push lies about election fraud, have joined forces with conservative doctors touting unproven Covid curesand vaccine skepticism, and like-minded evangelical ministers at a series of events across the US this summer. Capitol riot inquiry to investigate whether Trump‚Äôs White House was involved in attack The conservative ‚ÄúReAwaken America‚Äù tour ‚Äì featuring ex-general Michael Flynn and top Donald Trump loyalist donors ‚Äì has held events in Florida, Michigan and other states. It underscores how Trump‚Äôs allies, anti-vaccine doctors and conservative preachers are amplifying baseless claims that are hurting the nation‚Äôs public health and its democracy with potentially far-reaching impacts, say pandemic and election experts. The tour comes as Covid cases soar and as Republican drives to pass state laws weakening voting rights increase. While the tour has touted Flynn‚Äôs key role, a Tulsa Oklahoma media figure and Christian entrepreneur named Clay Clark has been instrumental in orchestrating the gatherings ‚Äì also dubbed ‚Äúhealth and freedom‚Äù conferences ‚Äì using his ‚ÄúThriveTime‚Äù podcast and radio show and Charisma News coverage. The ReAwaken events have featured talks by vaccine skeptics such as Simone Gold, who was charged for taking part in the Capitol riot and leads America‚Äôs Frontline Doctors, a rightist group that garnered attention for touting dubious Covid-19 cures such as ivermectin and hydroxychloroquine. Stella Immanuel, a Houston doctor who is part of Gold‚Äôs group and who spoke at a Michigan ReAwaken rally on 20 August, gained notoriety last year for public remarks at a Washington rally near the supreme court, suggesting America‚Äôs health problems were linked to alien DNA and sperm from demons. Another doctor listed as a speaker at the rallies is Scott Jensen, a former state senator and Fox News favorite who is running for governor in Minnesota. Last year, Jensen was a candidate for Politifact‚Äôs ‚Äúlie of the year‚Äù for claiming baselessly that doctors were overcounting Covid cases for their own financial gain. Further, the conservative tour has provided new audiences for rich Trump donors such as Mike Lindell, the chief executive of MyPillow, who has stated falsely that Trump would be reinstalled as president by 13 August, and Patrick Byrne, the former chief of Overstock, who bankrolled with millions of dollars a spurious ‚Äúaudit‚Äù in Arizona‚Äôs largest county that has drawn bipartisan fire for lacking merit. The ReAwaken meetings, which each appear to have drawn audiences in the hundreds or more, have also taken place this year in Oklahoma and California, with more slated for Colorado and Texas in coming months. Promotional materials indicate that attendees are asked to pay $250 for general admission or $500 for VIP tickets, with pastors eligible for half-price tickets. Voting rights lawyers and pandemic experts are troubled by the volume of election and pandemic disinformation that the ReAwaken tour seems to be spreading. Clay Clark, a key figure on the Reawaken America tour. Clay Clark, a key figure on the Reawaken America tour. Photograph: Mike Simons/AP ‚ÄúMany Americans believe the 2020 election was stolen, despite numerous failed court cases alleging it and recounts that verified the results,‚Äù said Gerry Hebert, who spent over two decades as a senior lawyer at the justice department handling voting rights. Hebert added: ‚ÄúPeople have refused to wear masks and get vaccinated because of Covid disinformation campaigns. Lies and disinformation campaigns can kill, both our fellow Americans and our democracy, and this ReAwaken America tour seems designed to accentuate these problems.‚Äù Similarly, Covid experts say that the ReAwaken America tour is exacerbating medical disinformation. ‚ÄúThese events are stark reminders of how Trump was elected in 2016 and remains popular to this day, with many now vying to assume his mantle in campaigning for elected office at all levels of governments,‚Äù said Irwin Redlener, who leads Columbia University‚Äôs Pandemic Resource and Recovery Initiative. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm actually embarrassed by the fact that there are doctors fully into this craziness.‚Äù Flynn, who was pardoned by Trump late last year after twice pleading guilty to lying to the FBI about his contacts with the Russian ambassador in the federal investigation into Kremlin meddling in the 2016 elections, has become a fixture at conspiracy-heavy gatherings this year, including one in Texas in May that was backed by QAnon advocates who have falsely claimed Trump will become president again this year. Other Trump loyalists have popped up at the ReAwaken events, including Roger Stone, a longtime Trump adviser who also was pardoned by Trump after he was convicted of lying to Congress and other felonies as part of the federal inquiry into Russian meddling in the 2016 elections, and Charlie Kirk who runs the pro-Trump youth group Turning (truncated)
